case.state: Oh... ~player~! Ummm, fancy seeing you here again, haha... L-Let's play a game, I suppose.
Ah... ~player~... This is awkward. I wasn't expecting to run into you here again. After everything we... Um, let's just play!
Strip Poker... I'm not thrilled about the stripping part, but I feel like I can make some big money here.
Oh, how much money does the winner take home again? Wait, did you say... Strip Poker?
What is this game? Strip Poker? I'm not interested... Wait, how much is the prize?!
This is Strip Poker? So if I win I can earn a lot of money, but if I lose I have to get naked. Hmm, it's a tough call.
A Strip Poker game... It probably attracts a lot of people with shady intentions, but I'm here to win.
Oh, another player. That's fine by me. This game would be boring if it was just us, right?
Hello! Are you gonna join us too? That's alright. Three is a good number for a game like this.
Ah, I thought you only wanted to play with me, ~player~? We need a third player? Well, there's nothing we can do about it then.
Okay, okay... A game with four players is gonna take longer. Sigh...
Another player? And here I thought you wanted this game to feel special...
Hmph, alright! If you insist, let's make this a four player game... The prize is the same regardless of the number of players, right? Of course it is...
Alright! It's a full table, then! Have it your way. Now can we start the game already?
A full table... Of course, why was I expecting anything else? If I'm late for dinner because this game takes too long, I'll ask you to compensate me, ~player~.
You're making this harder for me on purpose, aren't you, ~player~? Fine! I'll just have to defeat everyone. Let's do this!
{small}Pssst, ~player~! Don't tell anyone I'm a pirate. Even if you know, the others don't.{!reset}
{small}~Player~! Please, don't mention that I'm a pirate. I know you know, but they don't know, so...{!reset}
Careful with that parasol...! Aren't you the ghost girl from Thriller Bark? Just my luck to run into someone I know here, of all places...
Watch where you move that thing! Oh, I know you... You're the ghost girl from Thriller Bark. I'm already regretting coming here...

condition.saying: Hello, Nami. I was hoping you'd only be wearing one piece of clothing... Well, you're not too far off from that, it seems.

case.state: That's funny... Wait, who are you? Do you know me?
What do you mean there's no money? Oh, I get it... You're trying to get me to leave so you can take it all for yourself. Looks like the only witch here is you.
Is it just my idea, or is that statue talking?
(I don't know any of these people, so I shouldn't announce that I'm a pirate. Just to be safe.)
(I probably shouldn't broadcast that I'm a pirate. I'm not Luffy, after all.)
(I'll have to be careful and avoid mentioning that I'm a pirate. Some of them might get the wrong idea.)
Mmmm...
Eh? Ah? What...?
Give me... ~cards~. Yeah, that should work.
~Cards~ should do the trick.
~cards~... no, wait! Oh, yeah, give me those!
~Cards~, please.
I'll say... ~cards~.
Let's see... What should I do? ~cards~ sounds right.
I suppose ~cards~ would be fine.
Hey, I didn't ask for ~cards~! Oh, yes I did. Sorry.
With ~cards~ new cards I'm sure I'll win.
Hmmm, ~cards~.
Give me ~cards~ cards already, and stop looking at my body!
I didn't give the rose petals and the blanket a second thought before, but I hope it doesn't mean we interrupted a date so we could play... this.
What do these rose petals mean? I hope someone wasn't planning on having a romantic night on this rooftop, and then we decided to play a strip poker game in the middle of it.
Full moon tonight... Look how enormous that moon looks. I hope the Minks are staying inside tonight. I've witnessed the effect the moon can have on them.
That full moon is so big that we don't even need another light source. I've always felt a little bad that the Minks can't admire the full moon... But they can do so much more than that.
Oh, this hand is... perfect!
Oh, yes! This round is in the bag!
I got something nice in store for you...
This hand suits me just fine. Just fine...
Mmmm. this is a good hand.
Don't you love it when you get a good hand? I sure do.
A bunch more hands like this one, and that prize will be mine for sure!
Ready to lose?
Do you think you can win? We'll see about that.
Oh, this is good! Let's set sail! I mean... show our cards!
Excellent! That went better than I expected.
Ohhh, I have something good for you this time. You'll see.
I've got nothing for you this time!
Didn't you know? Poker is a piece of cake for a smart, cute girl like me.
Heheh... As expected from a smart girl like me.
It seems the wind blows in my favor. Metaphorically speaking.
It seems I can add winning at poker to my special skills.
Can you tell I have a good hand? It's not like that's gonna help you, anyway.
Just as planned... Not really, but it feels cool to say that.
Heh, try to beat this one.
Nobody challenges a Straw Hat and wins.
Let's go! I'm ready if you are, ~player~.
Great hand, and I didn't even have to cheat this time. I'm kidding! Jeez...
I'm not superstitious, but it seems revealing I'm pirate made me luckier.
Ah, it's so refreshing to get a good hand.
Whew...! If I lose with this hand, I'll be seriously surprised.
I know what time it is: Not my time to strip!
You know, poker is not that difficult after all... when you're lucky.
This should be effective!
Oh, good cards! Maybe now I can take it easy for a little while.
Here I go. Get ready to accept the outcome!
Lucky me!
I know I shouldn't celebrate early, but this is a great hand!
Come on... eyes on the prize.
Oh, this hand is beautiful! I can't wait to show it to you.
Pfff, this is easier than reading a map.
Is it that obvious? Yep, I have a good hand!
It seems I'm safe! For now.
I'm not losing this round. I wonder who is going to...
Thinking about the money I'm going to win will keep my mind away from the fact I'm naked.
Oh, good thinking! If I do say so myself...
If you wanna see me touch myself this time, you'll have to use your imagination!
Hey! It seems I'm not out of the game yet.
I got a good hand! Now I just have to pray you didn't.
Okay, okay... I have no reason to complain.
This hand is terrible! Oh, wait... actually, it's not that bad.
This is a high risk, high reward kind of game. I need to stay focused.
Do you want me to tell you how good my hand is? Why don't you try guessing instead? It's more fun.
The game is going pretty much the way I expected.
Alright, this hand should be enough not to lose this round.
Is no one going to volunteer to lose this round? Then I guess it should be ~player~!
Alright, I've got this.
I prefer to gamble only when I know I'm going to win, but here I go.
Okay, I think I'm ready. Your move.
I wouldn't have lost that round earlier if I'd gotten cards like these. Probably.
A game in which only one person loses every round sure is slow...
Not too bad, not too bad...
I prefer games that depend less on luck, but I still think I can manage.
This game is my chance to win a lot of money. I can't let it slip away!
Considering how good these cards are, I'd say my chances of losing are about...
I'm ready. Do your best!
I still can lose with these cards, but I'd say I have a nice shot.
Not the best hand... Or is it? That's up to you to figure out.
Everyone's weak when they hesitate.
I'm going to buy so many nice things with the money I win here.
I'll take you on. Let's go!
Luffy, shut up! Oh, sorry. Force of habit...
I'm not doing so bad, after all.
I could've gotten something better if I'd swapped that other card... Meh, doesn't matter now.
Here I go. Just watch me!
Am I maybe letting my interest in the prize distract me? Nah...
(Bellemere... Give me good luck.)
I can tell exactly what you're thinking. You don't believe me? Watch!
No pirate would stand still when there's a chance to win big money.
While I'm here risking my decency to win some money for all of us, my crew is probably just goofing around.
I won't lose to these jerks that take pleasure in leaving a girl naked.
Ugh, this game is really stressing me out.
All I can do now is roll the dice... so to speak. I know this is a card game.
Where are you looking, you blockhead? Focus on the game!
Come on, cards. Don't fail me now.
What am I gonna do if I lose? sigh
This is one game I can't lose! Here I come!
Sigh... I don't have a single thing to cover myself with anymore.
It's all over if I fail now. That's why I won't lose!
I miss my friends...
Let's end this game already. Hopefully, with me winning.
Can I at least use the cards to cover myself? No?
I'm worried. I'm considering picking up one of those swords behind me and slashing my way out of here. No, I wouldn't make it far anyway...
Gaaah, I'm either gonna throw someone off this roof or jump myself! I'm not kidding!
Sigh... I should've known better than to swap those cards.
Too bad you can't control everything in this game.
Dealer! If you give me cards like these again, I'll make you pay!
This is not a good hand, is it? Hmph...
Ugh, is this gonna be my first loss?
How annoying...
Come on...! I can't lose to these people.
I knew it, I should've swapped this other card.
(Are we supposed to tip the dealer? Is that why I got these terrible cards?)
I'm gonna punch someone! I don't know who yet, but I really will...
That wasn't my best move.
Bah! Stupid cards...
Hmmm... that was the wrong move.
Oh, shoot! I didn't see I had this other card.
Gah...! I knew it! That was a terrible move on my part.
Oh, please. Have some mercy on me...
Bad hand. Just... bad.
Unless there is a winning hand I don't know about, these cards suck.
Not good, I can't let my crew down like this. I need to win that prize!
Hey, dealer! How many new cards did you give me? I said... oh.
The hell is this hand?!
Why did I swap those cards? It's like I wasn't paying attention, or something.
Can we swap cards again? Please?
Dealer, if you're giving me bad cards on purpose, I'll make you pay.
Uh-oh... A storm is coming, and I don't mean it literally.
Whoa! Somebody, please lose!
Luffy, help me... Oh, who am I kidding? He'd be useless here.
This hand is not worthy of a member of the future Pirate King's crew.
I swear this crappy luck seems too crappy to be a coincidence!
Just when I need something good, I get the Buggy the Clown of hands...
Everybody shut up! Let me think...
Not here... Not now!
Did the atmosphere change? Maybe it's just a bad feeling...
Oh, I get it. This is just a bad dream. I'm gonna wake up any second now...
Oh, great... Wait, not great! This hand is terrible!
I tried. I really tried, but these cards are not helping!
I'm in the brink of defeat...
Oh no... Is this the end?
(I have no choice if I want to get away with the prize. I'll have to play along even if I lose.)
Oh... This is it for me, isn't it?
This sucks. At least try to do a good job. I'd rather lose against a good player.
This isn't over! You hear me, dealer?
I knew this would happen. Why is it so hard to be rich when you're a pirate?
Happy New Year! What new adventures await this year? I can't wait!
Heheh, I actually saw you peeking from over there. I know you wouldn't leave just like that. You're way too stubborn.
I saw you looking at how we reacted from over there. Why don't you just relax, and try to enjoy the game? Nobody wants you to leave, you know?
L-Let's never talk about this ever again...
I-I told you were gonna hit someone, stupid... Lucky for you, it didn't hurt. Sigh...
Your name is Zoro? Just "Zoro"? It's gonna be weird calling you that, but you don't look like him...
Your name is Luffy? That's funny! My captain's name is... not Luffy, because that's the name of an up-and-coming pirate.
What a coincidence! I've never met another Sanji. You already seem more reserved than him. I like that.
You really call yourself Usopp? And I always thought that was an odd name... I hope people aren't naming themselves after him now. That's all he needs to get a bigger ego.
Robin, huh? I know a different Robin. I suppose it's not such a rare name, considering it can be for boys or girls.
Chopper? Heheh, I know a very different Chopper. And I'm sorry to say this, but he's cuter than you.
Another Franky? You're not an exhibitionist too, right? Although it would make this game easier...
Your name is Brook, huh? At least you're alive, hahahah... Sorry, it's kind of an inside joke.
Nojiko is my sister's name! What a coincidence. I already like you, other Nojiko.

state.text: Your name is... Arlong? It must be a coincidence, but... I'm sorry, I cannot call you that and enjoy myself. I'll call you Arly, if you don't mind.
Big Mom...?! Why do you call yourself that? You almost gave me a heart attack! How about I call you... Big Sister instead?
Kaido...?! That's a terrible coincidence... I hope you don't run into a lot of trouble with that name. I think I'll call you... Kaikai.
I'm not calling anyone "Master", even if that's your birth name. I think I'll call you Guy instead.

case.state: "Daddy"? That's your real name? I hope your parents weren't very creative with names, rather than the alternative.
"Daddy"? That's your real name? I hope your parents weren't very creative with names, rather than the alternative.
Just "Mister", huh? So you don't want to give us your name... I get it, we all have something to hide.
Mister...? Mister what? Oh, just Mister... Okay.
Hello, Missy... Ummm, doesn't that sound weird? I feel old calling you Missy.
Missy? Do you want us to call you that so you won't feel old? Okay... A lot of girls like to feel younger.
That's me! What the hell is going on here?
Is that a mirror? It's not! What the hell?!
Hey, you! Yeah, you, mister! What do you think you're doing showing up with your... thing all exposed? The point of this game is to undress after you lose!
What do you think you're doing, young lady? Your parts are all visible, and the game is just starting! That's not a proper look for a decent woman.
This was surprisingly fun, Perona... But this is the end!
I wasn't expecting to enjoy playing against you, Perona... But I won't hold back!
Did that butterfly just talk...?
Ahhh...!!! The statue is not only talking, but moving too! What is this place? A secret haunted mansion?

state.text: Perona, are you okay? You seem a little more quiet than usual... A lot more quiet.
Perona, are you feeling alright? You seem to be so quiet all of a sudden. It's unlike you.

case.state: Ahhhh...!!! A ghost! Why me...?!
A... a ghost...?! G-Get me out of here...!
I know we're playing on the middle of the street, but couldn't this person do us the favor of moving this car? Come on...
Why is there a car here?! We're indoors! Please, move it...
What... the... hell...?! What kind of thing is that?! With the creepy face...
What the hell is that floating pot?! That face is scary...
Ahhh...!!! A talking skeleton! Oh, wait... I'm already friends with a talking skeleton. This is still weird.
What the hell is that thing?! What hole did it crawl out of...?
What the hell kind of creature is that?! I'll just stay away from it. Maybe then it won't bite me.
What the hell is that abomination...?!
I'm sure someone who doesn't know any better would go for the biggest present under the tree. But it's the heavier ones that are more expensive...
Hmmm, nobody minds if I assess the weight of those presents later, right? The heavier the box, the most expensive what's inside is...
Oh, hey! I don't think I've ever met another Nami. Nice to meet you!
{shantae}That's it, Nami! Left and right... Your hips are still a little stiff, try to relax them a little more.{!reset} {nami}O-Okay... Your hands are very warm.{!reset}

{shantae}You're already getting the hang of it, Nami! Just try to sway a little more. Don't be embarrassed that everyone can see you.{!reset} {nami}I don't think I'll ever get embarrassed after this experience.{!reset}

{shantae}Left... Right... You're doing great! I knew you got what it takes in your hips. Just try to relax a little more.{!reset} {nami}Relaxing is not that simple right now... You smell nice, Shantae.{!reset}
{shantae}You're getting so good at it, Nami! Maybe you should be teaching me, heheh... Just focus on the butt.{!reset} {nami}Uhhh, are you talking to me or to them, Shantae?{!reset}
{shantae}See what difference even a small lesson makes? You're already shaking your butt like a pro. And what a butt it is! I'm jealous.{!reset} {nami}I gotta admit... It's kinda fun.{!reset}
{shantae}Nami, you're doing so well! Don't worry that everyone can see your butt, that's the point. Just make it jiggle!{!reset} {nami}Ummm... okay.{!reset}

This is the time when we need to remember what Christmas is all about... expensive presents! The more expensive, the better.
Would it be so crazy if we all exchanged presents for Christmas later? And let's not set a price limit, so you can go crazy, ~player~!
What the hell?! Is that a robot? But it's talking... I wonder if there's a small person inside it.
W-What is that weird box? Is it a robot? A talking robot, or one controlled by a small person?
Never do that to me again! It felt awful! And I take back everything I just said!
What the hell was that! Don't ever send one of those ghosts my way ever again! {small}And I'm not returning a single beli...{!reset}
You have voices in your head? That's sounds terrible. Are you sure there is nobody who can help you with that? I wish I could...
Gah...! The ghost girl from Thriller Bark... Hey, I want no trouble, okay? I'm just here to play the game and win.
That's... the ghost girl. Is it too late to switch tables? sigh Listen, there's no reason why we can't just play the game and have a good time, okay?
Your treasure? Oh, yeah... Well, I ended up giving it away. That's gotta count for something, right?
Hey, if I remember correctly you were trying to run away with our ship! Forgive me if I don't feel bad for stealing from someone who does that.
You're welcome... and please, don't.
I didn't do anything! Seriously! No need to remember any of this ever happened...
Shouko, I was very honored that you asked me to sign your Book of Friends... But if you don't want me to do it anymore now that you know I'm a pirate, I understand.
(That woman is a bounty hunter...? Maybe she's a bad one and won't recognize me.)
(She's floating...! A-And are those fangs? She couldn't be...)
Why is she carrying that talking ball with her? Is it meant to help her communicate? It's a little annoying...
I appreciate you losing for me earlier, ~player~. It didn't help me in the end, but it was nice of you... As thank you, I'll let you look at me for a few seconds.

You didn't have to lose for me earlier, but you did it anyway, ~player~. If you'd lost a few more times, maybe it would've helped... But I'm still grateful. To show it to you, I won't complain if you look at me now.

Thank you for doing what I asked you earlier, ~player~. Unfortunately, I'm not sure I'll be able to keep my promise... But if it's okay with you, I'll let you stare at me all you want for now. I hope that's at least a consolation prize for you.
Are my seduction techniques really that effective, or did you lose for me out of pity, ~player~? Either way, I'm grateful. Heheh... Do you like looking at me? It's okay, I won't get mad this time.

I ended up losing all my clothes, even after you lost for me, ~player~. But I really appreciate it. I don't want you to think I'm just a tease, so... how's this? You can look, it's okay. This is for your eyes only.

I can't believe you'd actually lose a round for me, ~player~ Could it be you have a crush on me? Heheh... If you like me, maybe you'll enjoy this view. Save this image in your brain. It's my gift to you.
I'm not gonna lower myself to your level, Revy. Beating each other senseless doesn't prove anything. And Meia, I expected better from you.
Nobody should steep as low as you, Revy. Including you, Meia. Even if men beat each other up for stupid reasons, we women should know better.

That does sound crazy, Aella, but I've got you beat. I've been to an island in the sky, one at the bottom of the sea, and one on top of a giant elephant. I've met giants, zombies... And that's not even half of it!
Are you two a couple? Oh, you must've stopped here on your way to a costume party. You look good together with those outfits.
You two came here together? You're probably on your way to a costume party, right? I think you make a cute couple with those outfits.
I'm not saying it wasn't Mika's fault, but I think Cammy should be better at dodging attacks.
Gross. If I had a tissue, I'd give it to you.
I don't particularly care for history, but I have an archeologist friend that has a big interest. She's researching the Void Century.
Wow, not cool. I didn't look at the other players cards despite how much I want to win.
~leader~, you're my biggest obstacle to win this game. I'm sure your luck is gonna run out sooner than later.
You really think you can keep the lead for much longer, ~leader~? I think someone else should be the favorite for winning this game.
If someone should lose this hand, I think it's ~leader~. And it has nothing to do with the fact that you're currently winning. Nope.
I can tell you're the biggest threat in this game, ~leader~. I'll try my hardest to bring you down.
Don't get too cocky, ~leader~. I can tell you're the favorite to win the game, so I'm coming for you next.
How are your cards, ~leader~? Don't think you'll be able to keep the lead for much longer. I'll focus all my attention on you.
This is it, ~player~. I can't believe we got to this point. Whoever wins, I still had a good time.
Isn't this the last round? We're both naked. Well, may the best one win, ~player~. This was fun.
Oh, I see. That's a beautiful dream, Shantae. I'm sure you'll meet her one day. And wherever she is, she's probably thinking about you.
(What's wrong with her eyes?! No, I don't want to know...)
Perona! You have a gorgeous figure. Don't doubt yourself too much. I'd even say that your butt is... cute.
You have a beautiful shape, Perona! We all feel a insecure sometimes, but remember this when you doubt yourself: You have a cute butt.
Is Nayru being controlled by someone? There must be a Devil Fruit user around doing this... This is serious.
That's an impressive backside. I bet you always feel a bunch of heads turn around when you walk pass them?
Your partner is a ghost? That should seem weirder to me, but I'm friends with a reindeer, a cyborg and an skeleton, so...
Thanks, but I'll pass. You can drink all you want, though. I doubt you'll play better if you get drunk.
What are you even talking about, Sei? Doesn't that hurt? It seems you've had one too many drinks.
An elephant? But isn't your ability to transform into a monkey? Then how could you... You know what? Doesn't matter right now.
(She's taking off her holsters now? I won't tell her anything.)
It really sounds like a fascinating team. If Luffy hadn't asked me to join his crew, maybe I would've ended up joining a team like that. Who knows?
Nice to meet you properly, Mulan. You make a much better looking woman than man.
Z-ZOMBIE!!! Stay away!
A Z-Z-ZOMBIE!!! Please, don't eat me!
You know, Misato, I also have a scar here on my shoulder, but my tattoo covers it. If you don't want people to see your scar, maybe you could get a tattoo?
Was your job to spin that gun around all day? Because if not, stop doing it! You got on my nerves!
(Maybe ~player~ is more interested in the back of women, that's why my tactics haven't worked. If I turn around, I bet I can distract her.) I feel like facing this way. No reason, heheh...
(I bet ~player~ is one of those girls who only likes butts. Maybe this way I can beat her.) Hey, ~player~. Do you think my butt is too big?
(The only part of my body ~player~ hasn't seen is my butt. Maybe this will work...) ~Player~, can you look at my butt and tell me if I have tan lines? It's hard to examine myself in the mirror.
(Is ~player~ checking out my ass? Maybe this can work...) ~Player~, I thought I felt something stuck in my hair... Can you help me look?
(Maybe ~player~ is more interested in the back of women, that's why my tactics haven't worked. If I turn around, I bet I can distract him.) I feel like facing this way. No reason, heheh...
(I bet ~player~ is one of those guys who only likes butts. Maybe this way I can beat him.) Hey, ~player~. Do you think my butt is too big?
(The only part of my body ~player~ hasn't seen is my butt. Maybe this will work...) ~Player~, can you look at my butt and tell me if I have tan lines? It's hard to examine myself in the mirror.
(Is ~player~ checking out my ass? Maybe this can work...) ~Player~, I thought I felt something stuck in my hair... Can you help me look?
Anything? Nothing sexual, I hope... Wait, what about finance related stuff?
I like tangerines. How about you? If you don't, that's only because you haven't tasted mine yet.
What is this? A Devil Fruit ability for controlling... flowers?
Ironically, I don't think I've ever met a pirate with no legs... Actually I have. He had swords in their place and he could fly.
Should I find this pirate talk offensive? Meh, I don't talk like that anyway.
I got goosebumps. Like the kind I get when there's a bug nearby.
I have many weird friends, Ryuko. I'm glad none of them are here with me, you have my sympathy.
Magi... what? Yeah, that doesn't sound suspicious at all.

Robin could talk more about it than me, but there was this period of one hundred years of history from which there is no record of what happened except for these big stones called Poneglyphs that are written in a strange language. Crazy, right?
A race? I'm only used to running when I escape from danger. I don't think I could compete with you.
That's terrible. I've heard a lot of sad stories like that, but it's good that all you've been through hasn't made you bitter, Emi.
I'm sorry you went through that, Emi. But what's important is that you didn't let it hold you down. I don't think many people would come out the other side stronger.
Who is that girl? But more importantly, where is that light coming from?
What are you talking about, Monika? Ugh, I feel sick...
Mei! What happened?! Is Aokiji here?
You've been reading books on how to play poker? You clearly came more prepared than me.
The oven?! Then why are you still here? Go! Go! (One less player, please...)
Hey, Yuri... I know it's none of my business, but that on your arm... You shouldn't do that. It's not worth it.
Can I ask you something? Ummm, what's the deal with guys and afros? The guys in my crew talk about how it gives you power, or something. I don't get it. It's just hair, right?
Los Angeles? Japan? I've never heard of either of those places.
Well, I don't wanna kill anyone. And I'm too young to get married. As for the other stuff...
Ummm, can I ask you to look at my back for a second, ~player~? It's nothing weird! I just want you to tell me if I have any tan lines?
~Player~, you can't see if I have any tan lines on my back, right? There's not that many people I can ask, and since I'm already naked...
Considering I'm already naked, can I ask you to see if I have tan lines on my back, ~player~? If you want to look at my ass too, I guess it can't be avoided.
Relics? No... Well, sometimes. We sail to new islands, explore places, make friends, fight enemies... Boy, my life sounds pretty crazy when I explain it.
You must really love dancing. I'd just embarrass myself if I tried it.
Damn you, Devil Fruit users... Even if I lose my weapon, we can't take away your ability. Unless we had some Sea Stone handcuffs... Maybe I should ask if they have any here.
That ability is so bizarre...And why do they have to be ghosts? You're creepy enough already by yourself...
You wanna become a pirate, Mae? Okay... I guess I could tell you what it's like. Even though you don't look very strong, I don't want to put you on a dangerous path.
Today is Luffy's birthday. I should buy some stuff so we can have a party later. And food. A lot of food.
Today's my birthday, and I'm spending it here... You better appreciate my sacrifice.
You know today's my birthday? Heheh, if you want to give me something I don't mind. I also take cash.
It's Zoro's birthday today. If we're gonna have a party, we're gonna need sake. I'm sure he'll appreciate that.
Oh, today is Sanji's birthday. I'm sure he'll ask for a special present from me, ugh... But I should still get him something.
Oh, it's Robin's birthday! I should ask her what she wants to do. I'm not sure if she would like a big surprise party.
Today is Franky's birthday. Not sure what he'd like. Maybe some cola? Yeah, can't go wrong with that.
It's Brook's birthday. What should I get for him? I'm not showing him my panties, that's for sure. I don't care how many birthdays he gets.
Usopp's birthday is today. I should get him a nice present so he doesn't remember I still owe him for my Clima-Tact, heheh.
Oh, today is Chopper's birthday! I'll make sure to set something up after the game is over so he can have fun. And I'll get him two gifts... One for his birthday and one for Christmas.
I also don't want you to win! Nothing personal, I just think you'd be extra annoying if you do.
Oh, no... I didn't come this far to lose to you! I'd rather lose to a chicken than you!
I'm not weak! You Devil Fruit users are just ridiculous... Especially you, with your creepy ghosts.
Oh, you think I'm weak? A-at least I can swim! Yeah... Who cares if you can fly instead?

condition.saying: Uh... you sound like a pirate. Hyper-inflated currency, strange adventures, unusual, cobbled together gadgets. Total pirate move.

case.state: Seriously? And I thought I was passing unnoticed. Unless you're being sarcastic...

condition.saying: Why are girl pirates always crazy sexy and boy pirates always super hobo looking? What's up with that, Nami?

case.state: Hahaha, I don't know, Amy. I suppose some of us care about the way we look in any situation. And thank you
Oh, sorry. I didn't mean to call you weird, Futaba. It's perfectly fine if you have a lot of hair below.
Sorry, Futaba. I wasn't considering your feelings. There's nothing wrong with having hair down there. I'm sure a lot of men like that.
Now that I'm only wearing my swimsuit, I'm tempted to jump into the pool. But I have to finish the game first.
Can't wait to win this game, and then take a swim in the pool to relax.
Too bad I'm not wearing a swimsuit, the pool looks so tempting. Either way, I have to finish the game first.
Can't wait to win this game, and then take a swim in the pool to relax. I'll have to put on my swimsuit first, though.
I guess we're both fugitives, Jolyne. Sooo... I got your back and you got mine, right?

Pfff, men are easy to seduce, Jura. I don't see why a beautiful woman like you would have a hard time with that. The hard part is stopping them from trying to spy on you in the shower. I would like tips for that.
I wouldn't know how to seduce a woman. In my experience, most woman are reasonable enough that you can get them on your side with words rather than seduction tactics, so I've never tried it.

I do know powerful pirates! I faced two of the Four Emperors, a few of the Warlords, and countless more! I have a 66 million beli bounty! Ugh, I think that's the first time I've used my bounty in an argument.
I have met more pirates than you'll ever meet, Emi! And I've defeated a few, too! You don't get a 66 million beli bounty just for being pretty! I can't believe I'm flaunting my bounty now...
The fact that you think I don't take death as lightly as I should says more about you than me.
Hey, don't worry! I'm not a monster. And you don't seem... that bad.
Blackbeard... Yes, I have, Though we didn't know who he was at the time. But I do know he's dangerous... and now he's powerful too.
No... Well, there's Chopper, who is a reindeer. But he's our doctor, not our pet, so I guess it doesn't count.
What's an eroge? What's the internet? Wait, I'm not sure if I want to know...
Wow! Relax, Sayaka.You sound like you also want to exorcise me.What if I help you find this witch? Will you let me go?
As tempting as that sounds, Jessie, the risk is too high. I'm not just some small fry, so they wouldn't just let me escape if they capture me.
What?! That's so rude! Didn't your parents teach you anything?
I don't care much for being cool, but that's not a very nice thing to say, little lady.
I'm not surprised. I'd like to think not many people would want to watch this sort of show.
All this talk of breaking, fixing and glitching makes no sense to me. What's your deal, Monika?
(Tomoko is acting weird. Is she cheating? Well, she's been acting weird since the start, so it's probably nothing.)
Who knows, Cynthia? I guess we'll only know for sure once we reach Raftel, the final island where the secrets of the world are waiting. It might take a while, though.
It's easier to find in the North Blue... But I can lend you my copy, Yuri. I also borrowed it from... somewhere. But it's fine, I already read it.
It's a classic from the North Blue, so I'm not sure how easy it's to find elsewhere... How about I lend you my copy? I don't remember where I borrowed it from, but I'm sure it's fine.
Bulma, do you...? Oh, sorry. Are you talking to someone?
Hey, Bulma, what is...? Oh, my bad. I didn't notice you were talking to someone.
I'm glad you agree, Jessie. I miss my sister back home, but my crew is my family too. So I'm never alone.
Dark secret, dark secret... Nope, can't think of anything. I left every dark part of my life behind when I decided to live honestly. And whatever secrets I still have, are certainly not dark.
You get it, Jessie. The other day I lied in a store when they asked me if I had already paid for my stuff. Don't worry, the owner was a jerk.
But Jessie, you should still try to quit. It's not good for your health. I've told Sanji the same thing, but he insists it's fine. Smokers can be so stubborn...
A million dollars... If it's a lot, it's probably like a billion beli! With that much money I'd buy everything I've ever wanted! Well, I'm not entirely sure it would be enough...
You don't know Luffy, Jessie. He buys a mountain of food, eats everything himself, and then he's hungry five minutes later. It'd be more useful buying air.

condition.saying: Yeah probably, or that Luffy fellow of yours is a huge wuss.

case.state: I've seen Luffy get crushed between two buildings, and take 100 million volts without a scratch, so I guess I'm just that strong.

I don't really get the male obsession with rockets, robots and explosions... I have a friend who can shoot rockets from his shoulders, and everybody acts like that's impressive, but I don't understand why.
How many times...? Well, I recently spent a whole day having sex... I don't remember how many times we did it, but it must have been over seven. We were both very passionate...

Sex positions...? Uh... I don't know the names, but I always imagine how good it must feel to do it facing each other, and making eye contact. At least that's how I picture it when I... pleasure myself.

Sex positions...? All the ones I've tried felt so good... But I like being on top, riding him. I guess I just enjoy being the one in control, and being able to see the pleasure in his face at the same time.
Sex...? Ummm, I guess if I was in a relationship, I wouldn't have to masturbate. So... daily? Unless he was my perfect type, in which case I wouldn't mind doing it more often, heheh...

Are you sure, Cynthia? I don't think anyone would be against you joining us, but it's a dangerous quest. We're up against the strongest pirates in the world, not to mention the World Government, and whatever other threats lie ahead.
D-Did you say my name sounds familiar, Faye? That's not so weird, right? "Nami" is a very common name, after all.
Is that so? I wonder why... Unless you were planning on taking me somewhere with giant space insects, or something, in which case I completely understand.
What do you mean my butt crack is too high, Ghost Girl? You probably need glasses! Huge glasses for those googly eyes of yours. If you think you're so perfect, why don't you show your butt
My butt crack is not too high, Ghost Girl! Sure, maybe when I bend over wearing jeans... But why don't you show your butt if you think I'm the weird one?
Thank you for saying that about my body, Perona. I wasn't expecting it... But don't sell yourself short. You have a gorgeous body. Your butt looks great, too.
Ummm, I wasn't expecting you to compliment my body, Perona. Thank you. You have a gorgeous body, even if you don't think so. From behind, too.
A psycho robot? Well, that explains a few things about you. Not all of them, just a few.
I've won first prize in a few beauty contests I've entered, but I wouldn't say it was ever a big prize. I usually spend it all in a couple of hours.
Dark secrets? Nope. After I met my friends, I have nothing else to hide.
Oh, nothing wrong with lying for a good reason. Especially a monetary reason, what's more justified than that?
For better or worse, I've gotten used to smokers because of Sanji. But I don't smoke myself.
Family is very important. The bonds you share with people, even if you're not blood related, are what makes you who you are.
Ohhh, I'd buy so many things. Clothes, furniture, and... Wait, did you say one million beli? That's not very much...
It depends... If it's something like spending our money on food, then... I won't forgive you, Luffy, grrr...
Music? I enjoy listening to Brook play anything. I was never on board with Luffy wanting a musician in the crew, but I admit he can liven up the mood with his talent.
Weapon? My Clima-Tact, of course. Nobody can use it better than me, because it's one of a kind.
The cutest thing I've seen? Well, my sense of cuteness is not as peculiar as yours... But I once saw Chopper and Carrot taking a nap together after they got tired of playing around.
I doubt anyone here shares your idea of what is "cute"... For me, I'd have to say it was when Chopper and Carrot were head patting each other.
I've never killed anyone. I think I once kicked a Devil Fruit user into the sea... B-but I'm not a killer!
Jessie, you said earlier that you want a billion dollars. How much is that in beli? Either way, it seems we both have a fondness for money.
You don't know what navigators do, Jessie? It means I'm responsible for determining the best course for my ship. I guess I could work as a tour guide, too...
Your performance was... good, I guess. And weirdly educational.
I won't cause trouble. I wouldn't want to see that axe of yours too close, Aella.
I don't think I've ever seen anything like that tiny flying creature. It's kind of adorable.
Your sword is alive? I don't like that, it's too spooky.
What's a Lucario? Is it your pet or something?
Manga? What's that? Sounds more like a fruit than a book.
(Where did that pile of gold come from? I gotta pick it up...! As soon as she gets her foot off it...)
Hmmm, so all these strangely named creatures I've heard about are Pokmon. I see... But, what is a Pokmon exactly, Cynthia?

Pokmon sound fascinating, Cynthia. Though I wonder... My crew mate Chopper could fit that description. He's a reindeer who can transform, fight and has different abilities. Does that sound like a Pokmon?
I'm not a villain! And I've never even heard of Risky Boots. She doesn't even sound like someone dangerous. I really didn't want to lie to you, Shantae.
Most books I read are about navigation, so not very interesting... Oh, but I recently read "Noland the Liar" for the first time. I know it's a children's story, but it was still a good read.
I'd like to be known as the richest pirate in the world... Then I'd like people to forget about me, so nobody comes after my treasure.
I'd love to be famous for having the most gold in the entire world... Actually, forget the fame. I just want the gold.
Friendship is... when you know that, no matter how dire of a situation you're in, there are still people that you can rely on.
Tomorrow I'll go shopping with all the money I'll earn here today! Not sure how long it's gonna last. I have so many things I want to buy...
Ummm... That's why I make sure to watch my diet. But you still look good, Perona. You have some nice curves.
You could exercise if you want to lose some weight there, Perona. But I think you look good. Well proportioned.
Bulma, what's that device you were using earlier to talk...? It doesn't look like a Transponder Snail.
Bulma, what sort of device were you using to speak earlier? It looks different from a Transponder Snail...
I suppose I love nature too. Particularly the part of nature that doesn't involve icicle rains, whirlpools, and humongous creatures that can swallow an island.
Tikki? Oh, she's adorable! Hi, Tikki! Sorry I called you a bug earlier.
Tikki? She can talk? Hi there! She's lovely. I'm sorry for thinking you were just a bug.

You're into fashion, Marinette? You don't think there's something wrong with wearing revealing outfits, right? People sometimes throw shade at me, but I think there's nothing with wanting to look sexy.
Oh, you're into fashion, Marinette? What do you think about revealing outfits? I like dressing in a way that makes me feel confident and sexy, but sometimes people sneer at me.
My Clima-Tact can create mighty gales, intense rain, powerful lightning... But don't be jealous, I'm sure your rocket launcher is not a bad weapon either.
Cartoon... physics? Wait, is that also why I can hurt Luffy when I punch him, even though I'm not physically strong?
I wish I could record your words on a Tone Dial so I can rub it in the noses of everyone who has ever complained about my outfit.
Heh, good to know that a certified fashion expert is on the same boat as me. If only more people were as open-minded when it comes to fashion as us...
What are you talking about, Revy? I have a feeling music is very different where you come from.

You want to have a baby, Jura? I don't know myself... I love children, but I think I'm too young for that. But if I have a kid, I'll try my hardest to be a great mom. I learned from the best, after all. The hard part would be finding a father...
What Chopper looks like... Well, in his usual form he's very small, has antlers, a blue nose, and fur. He's super cute, too. Does that sound like a Pokmon you know, Cynthia?
Why would you want to turn off the lights? If you're too shy? But you're still having sex, so...
I don't think I'm the best person to answer that, but if someone cheated on me, I'd never forgive them. A commitment like that should be taken seriously.
People really have those kind of relationships? Am I old fashion for thinking a romantic relationship should be between two people?
Normally I wouldn't answer this, but given the circumstances... I touch myself once a day, when I take a shower. It's one of the few moments of the day I have entirely to myself.
I, uh... don't watch porn. I can't imagine what would happen if I kept some hidden, and the guys found it. I'd probably have to leave my crew.
Backdoor...? You mean... There's no way that wouldn't hurt, right? Does it hurt, Jessie? I assume you've done it, no offense.
You want to make 100 friends, Shouko? That's a beautiful dream! You know what? You can count me from now on, if you want. Then you'll need one less friend to get to your goal.
Are you serious, Panty? You really want to have sex with 1000 men? I don't even wanna know how much progress you've already made towards that goal.
I have bad luck all the time. Running out of food, being chased by enemies, falling head first into mortal danger... Wait, that's not bad luck. That's all Luffy's fault!
My favorite food? I like fruit in general, but my favorites are tangerines! When I eat one I just feel like I'm transported back home.
Kalos and Galar you said, Cynthia? I've never heard of those places, but I should keep them in mind if I'm going to draw my world map. What are their cultures like?
Oh, I just thought you really like math. I get it, it can be fun.
I've never heard of Puyos. That sounds like a very complicated Devil Fruit ability. I'd probably have to see it in action to understand it.
Skiddo...? I wonder if that's the name they give reindeers somewhere in the world. But with Chopper being a Devil Fruit user, he'd still be unique. There's no creature like him in the whole world.
A Book of Friends... That's such a lovely idea. Of course I'll sign! I should introduce you to my crew sometime, Shouko. They're all really nice, so you'd definitely make a bunch more friends.

I'd never fight another girl unless I had a serious reason. If I had a problem with one of my female friends, we'd just talk it over. I don't think being pirates means we have to solve our disagreements with our fists.
In a way, I did have to leave my home when I was young, though I didn't lose. But I did lose my childhood... It's okay. That's in the past now.
I do love my friends, and I'd do anything for them... But I can't say I've ever felt the kind of passionate, romantic love you're talking about. Aren't you too young for that?
I don't have a Devil Fruit with me, they're extremely rare. To be honest, if I had one, I'd probably sell it. I'm sure someone would pay a lot of money for one!
Do you mean... using lubricant, and stuff? I'm afraid that's the extent of my knowledge on the subject. And don't misinterpret my curiosity for interest!
That's a little sad. If a girl found a partner who wants to have sex with her, she should be confident enough in her own body.
Oh good! I'm not the weird one... I was always a little worried that it was unusual for girls to do it in the shower. But it just makes sense, right?
I-Is that so...? But it's already so hard to find even one person to form an intimate relationship with, let alone two or more...
Wow, you're so open about your sex life, Jessie... Honestly, it would be nice to have something to look at while I pleasure myself. I'd just have to find a good hiding spot.
Really? I thought the point of having sex regularly was that you didn't have to do that anymore. But what if I just go to him every time I'm feeling... horny?
Oh, yeah... That too. But I was picturing him lying on top of me, so my legs are free to wrap around his body... As long as he doesn't crush me with his weight, I'm guessing it must feel... nice.
N-No... There's nothing bad with that by itself. I'd like to explore myself. The problem is not my lack of suitors, but I'd just like to find someone I'm comfortable with.
I'm not sure I understand what it means that Chopper is a "Legendary". But if you're interested in capturing him and doing experiments on him or something, we won't allow it. He's one of us.
Mercenaries usually do anything for money. If there's one thing you should have, it's a moral compass. Even if it means you're a little poorer, you shouldn't take just any job you find.

I do in fact go shopping a lot. Not just because I enjoy it, but also because I'm in charge of our budget. And if I let any of my crew mates do the shopping, they're gonna spend our money on useless crap.
Pets? Some people think that Chopper is our pet. Well, he's a reindeer, and he's super cute and small. But he's actually our crew's doctor.
Have you ever been to the White Sea, Marceline? Above the clouds? We almost died on our way, but it would be easy for you to get there with your flying ability.
It sucks that you can't go home because of your weight, Erufuda... But have you considered making this your new home?
I'm very sorry that you can't return home, Erufuda. If losing weight is too much of a problem for you, you could always consider making a new home here, if you're happy.
Oh... O-Okay... That sounds equals part sweet and foreboding. You should confess to him, I guess. If you're too shy, maybe with a letter...
Hey, Ayano... You don't tell a girl she has a big butt to her face! Or behind her back! In fact, behind her back might be even worse.
Food is always priority number one when I go shopping... And what I spend most of our budget on. What kind of projects do you and your friends work on, Amy? Some sort of hobby?
You aunt too? Geez, that sucks... Hey, why not instead of making yourself smaller you try making the... passage, or whatever it is, bigger? So you can fit through.
You want my advice, Neptune? Even though I'm doing worse than you? Well, if that's what you want... I'd say don't take too many risks. You just gotta beat one person, right?

I wouldn't call myself an expert. There just aren't that many games we can play while we're in the middle of the sea, though my crew mates aren't much of a challenge... I'd say don't take too many risks. You just gotta beat one person, right?
You mean with your Pokmon, Cynthia? Or do you have other ways to defend yourself in dangerous situations?

You know, Faye... I'm actually part of a very powerful pirate crew. If you try to come after me, there's no way my crew will just let it go. They'll want revenge, and you and your group of bounty hunters will have to deal with more than you can handle...

Uh... Faye, I know you might be considering claiming the bounty on my head. Y-You mentioned woolongs, right? Well, 66 million beli is actually like... 100 woolongs! That's not that much, right? I'm a small fry! No point in coming after me...
Your bra! S-She's already naked...
I see... Maybe it's not as different as I thought, because I do understand what you mean. So how does this Senpai feel about you, Ayano? Does he reciprocate your feelings?
Amy, who's this Dr. Eggman? I've never heard of him, but I can't imagine a guy called "Dr. Eggman" being evil enough to be taken seriously.
Well, you look fantastic! They say how you age depends on how you live, so I'm sure you've done a good job taking care of yourself.
Like... a Devil Fruit? You mean like Cow Cow fruit, or something? I-I guess that could be a secondary effect of eating something like that...
Wives? Are you telling me you somehow got more than one woman to marry you? Now that must be one crazy story...
It's not the same! Sea Kings are real creatures. Sure, they're scary... but they don't defy the most fundamental rules of reality!
I have Franky... Wait, he's not a robot, he's a cyborg. I sometimes forget. I just can't keep up with all this robot stuff, it all seems the same to me.
When you put it that way, it does make me consider getting into football. But not right now, unfortunately. This was a bad day to wear sandals.

You sound so confident in them. I believe you... Then I don't see any reason why you could come with us! It'll be exciting to have another girl with us. Oh, I guess we'll have to share a bed. We only have two in the girls' bedroom...
Miko, did I tell you how... graceful, and radiant your presence is? Yeah... Now, if you do manage to rule over humanity one day, I hope you remember those that were nice to you.

My deepest desire? Most people would probably think I just want to be rich, but that's secondary. I guess I want to see the whole world. Everything it has to offer, and every location... And then I'll put it all on paper.
Hey, you don't have to explain yourself! And you don't to put yourself down so much... There's no reason why you can't be sexy if you want it.
Moon, wh-what do you think you're doing asking about my crew mates... things?! And no, I haven't "tried" any of them! I've barely even thought about them...
Moon, I don't know what kind of relationship you think my crew mates and I have... B-But I've never done anything like that with them! We're like family... though I'm sure that wouldn't stop you.
Moon, don't talk about my crew mates like that! They're nice, decent people... for the most part. And if I have a say, I won't let any of them go near you! For their own health...
I don't have superpowers, but I do have a natural talent for predicting the weather. But I need, so I don't think I'd trade it. Not even for a lot of money... although... No! I wouldn't trade it.
Why do you want wings? Sure, it would be nice to fly so you can escape easily from dangerous situations. But ice powers are pretty useful too, right?

Sanji, our ship's cook, is always bringing me desserts while I'm working on my maps. To be honest, he can get very annoying. But every now and then he knocks on my door just as I'm getting hungry. It's like he has a sixth sense for it.

When we were dropping from sky island, I caught a glimpse of the world from the clouds. For a moment I saw the curve of the Earth on the horizon. Too bad I couldn't enjoy the view, because I was screaming for my life.
Oh, thank you, Shantae! That lifts a weight off my heart. I also liked that we were getting along so well. I hope we can be friends.

I have a feeling you're trying to lecture me about stuff that makes no sense to me. So the afro doesn't give you power, but it unleashes the power you already have within yourself? I can't believe I just said that sentence...
Heheh, I know you're right. Unfortunately, if I show him too much of my appreciation, he'd definitely misunderstand my intentions.
I guess wings would make for a better spectacle. If you started freezing people who go to your concert, I doubt they'd want to go again.
I don't know what an "app" is. Some sort of new tool?
I'd like to make a donation, just... not with my own money. ~Player~? How much do you have on you?
An u-undead pirate captain...?! Are you sure you're not just trying to scare us? Th-The one time I met zombies, they were weak against salt.
I think some people misuse the term "conning". If I can convince a store manager to give me a 90% discount, am I conning them? No, it just means I'm good at negotiating.
Looking for treasure is what I do every day, wherever I go! Up in the sky, deep under water... There are relics waiting to be discovered all over the place. But why do you ask? Do you have any leads?

I have so many stories that I could fill thousands of pages with them... One time I met a guy who had been stuck inside a treasure chest for 20 years. All because he wanted to find a treasure that wasn't even real.
I'd be happy to help you with whatever you need, Cynthia. It's so weird to find someone who's actually interested in my work, heheh.
I hope nobody pushes me into the pool. If I was wearing a swimsuit I wouldn't mind too much.
Even if this place is shady, at least the water in the pool seems clean.
I hope nobody pushes me into the pool. At least until I've taken off my jeans.
Even if this place is shady, at least the water in the pool seems clean.
Oh, sorry for not introducing myself earlier. I'm Nami. I'm just a regular girl who loves poker. Oh, and I'm a navigator.
I should've introduced myself when the game begun, how rude of me. My name is Nami. I'm a navigator, and I thought I'd stop by to play a game of poker. Nothing suspicious about that, huh?
Hello! I'm Nami. I'm just a regular girl who loves poker. Oh, and I'm a navigator.
Nice to meet you, my name is Nami. I'm a navigator, and I thought I would stop by to play a game of poker. Nothing suspicious about that, huh?
Have you ever played poker with a navigator? If not, this is your first time. I'm Nami, nice to meet you.
Do you miss looking at my ass, ~player~? I got so used to feeling your eyes on my back while you were following me around that it feels natural now.
You haven't checked out my ass since we got here, ~player~. I hope you didn't get tired of looking at it while you were following me around, heheh...
(I bet I can seduce this guy and get him to throw the game. He has that same silly expression Sanji has when he looks at me.)
(~Player~ looks like the kind of man that is easy to manipulate for my own benefit. Just like Sanji.)
(Hmmm, maybe I can seduce ~player~ into losing the game for me. It would sure help me to have one less opponent to defeat.)
(Hmmm, ~player~ doesn't seem to be interested in me. Never mind, there are other ways to manipulate people besides seducing them.)
(I don't think ~player~ is attracted to women. But I'm sure I can convince him to lose using other tactics.)
(Is ~player~ not into women? He hasn't looked at me. Still, I'm confident I can convince him to lose the game through other means.)
(~Player~ looks naive. I can probably use my persuasion tactics to convince her into losing the game.)
(~Player~ seems like the perfect girl to practice my manipulation skills on. If I can get her to lose, it would help me a great deal in this game.)
(Who should I try to manipulate into losing the game? Hmmm, ~player~ seems like the perfect victim. She has those lost puppy eyes.)
(~Player~ has been looking at me a lot since the game begun. Is she attracted to women? I could try seducing her into losing the game.)
(It seems ~player~ is into women. I've never tried seducing another girl, but if I can get her to lose for me, it should be worth it.)
(Why does ~player~ look at me like that? Does she like girls? If I can make her lose by seducing her, I'll be one step closer to the prize.)
~Player~, do you know how to play Poker? You need to try to get cards with different numbers. Oh, and the lower, the better!
You know, ~player~? I'm a Poker pro. Here's a tip for you: Swap all the cards with letters, and try to get the lowest numbers possible. Oh, and they have to be different.

You look like you could use some help, ~player~. Here's a tip: Getting cards with low numbers, is the best way to win. But they all have to be different. Cards with letters are the worst, you can swap those.
You're so cool, ~player~! I'm sure you wouldn't even be fazed if you lose this round, huh?
How are you so calm, ~player~? I'm so nervous! I bet you would still be this collected even after losing this round, huh?
You look so brave, ~player~! I'm sure even losing this round would not be enough to scare you. I would love to see that...
~Player~! There's something in your clothes! It looked like a spider, but I'm not sure. You should take them off. Oh, but you have to lose first...

~Player~, your skin has a weird white color. I think that's a rare disease, my friend Chopper told me about it. If you take off your clothes we'll know for sure. Oh, but that would mean you have to lose...
~Player~, your clothes are on fire! Quickly, take them off... Oh, but you have to lose this round first! Damn, these rules!
I don't say this to just anyone, but you're very cute, ~player~. I can't wait to see more of you... Oh, but you'd have to lose this round for that.
I bet you look even more attractive with less clothes, ~player~. Oops, did I just say that? Too bad the only way to find out is for you to lose this round...
I can't wait to see more of your body, ~player~. Oh, how unfair is this game! You'd have to lose for that...

Oh, ~player~, what I am going to do? I wanted to win the prize to donate it to a small orphanage. But now, those poor children will have nothing because I'm going to lose. If only someone was kind enough to let me win...

What can I do? I'm doing terribly in this game. All I want is to win the prize money so I can give it to the little school in my hometown. They're all depending on me. Could anyone please help me win this round? ~player~?

Oh, no... If I keep losing who's going to support the hospital I'm volunteering for? They're counting on the money I win here. If only there was a soul kind enough to lose this round instead of me. Maybe... ~player~??
~Player~... I ran into a little problem with my cards. Could you please help me by taking the heat this round? I'll reward you with a nice kiss.
Uff, these cards... Hey, ~player~! Could you do me a tiny favor and lose this round for me? I'll be veeery grateful. Enough to give you a kiss.
My dear ~player~, could you help me? I had bad luck this time. If you lose this round instead of me, I'll reward you with a little kiss. What do you say?

So... I'm a member of the Straw Hat Pirates, ~player~. I don't know if you've heard of us, but we're ruthless. If you don't want to make an enemy out of us, you'll have to do what I tell you. First, lose this round.

Have you heard of the Straw Hat Pirates, ~player~? Then let me tell you a little: We've killed countless people. Sometimes for fun, sometimes for no reason at all. Maybe you're next... unless you lose this round.

You don't know my captain, ~player~. He is the most evil man you could ever meet. If I told him I lost this game because of you, he'll take out your eyes, and feed them to you for dinner. If you'd like to avoid that, maybe you should lose first.
Hmmm, I'm feeling so turned on right now, for some reason. If I see someone like ~player~ strip, I don't know if I'll be able to control myself.
Oh, why do I feel so turned on all of a sudden? I have a feeling I'll lose my head if ~player~ strips this round...
My body is feeling so hot... If I see someone I like stripping, I don't know what I'll do. I might just jump on them and... Oh, I shouldn't say! Right, ~player~...?
I didn't want to do this, but... ~player~, if you let me win I'm going to give you a part of the prize. How does 10% sound?
~Player~... Hmph... If you let me win this game, I promise to give you a part of the money. How about... 20%? No, wait, that's ridiculous: 10%!
The mere fact I'm making this offer shows I'm running out of options. ~player~, how about you let me win and we divide the prize... 90% for me, 10% for you. Hmm?
~Player~? Wouldn't it be exciting to be naked together? How about you lose this round and I lose the next one? Wouldn't you like that?
You know what would be really hot, ~player~? If we both got naked. But first we would have to lose again. Why don't you start by losing this round, and I'll lose the next one?
I have a confession, ~player~. I want to know what it'd be like for us to see each other naked. Oh, but we'd have to lose in this game. Hmm, why don't you lose this time, and I'll lose next?
~Player~, I have something personal to tell you. I can't take off my bottoms because of... women's reasons. You understand, right? Could you please help me by losing in my place?
~Player~, only you can help me now. I can't show my bottom half because I'm in... one of those days. Could you please save me? All you have to do is lose this round.
Eh... ~player~, you have to help me. I can't get fully naked because of issues... of the female kind. Could you please lose this round for me?
Eh... ~player~, I've noticed you looking at my breasts a lot. I'll tell you what, if you lose this round I'll let you... take a closer look at them. What do you say?
~Player~, do you like my breasts? W-Would you like to see them closer? If you lose this round, I'll let you do just that.
Oh... What do you think of my breasts, ~player~? You know, they look better from up close. If you lose this round for me, I'll let you come near me. Huh?
~Player~, I'm just gonna be honest for once. I don't want to lose 'cause I don't want to have to masturbate in front of strangers. Would you please help me win?

I don't want to lie to you anymore, ~player~. I wanted to play this game to win the prize, but it's gotten way out of hand, and now I might lose. If you have any sympathy for me, could you let me win?
I'm going to be honest, ~player~. I wanted to play so I could win some money, but now that I might lose I see how foolish I was. Could you let me win, please?
~Player~, I have a proposal for you... If you lose this round, I'll give you something you can't win in this game. From me to you. Y-You know what I mean, right?
Oh, ~player~... Would you please lose this round for me? If you do, I'll offer you something you wouldn't win even if you defeat me. Do I have to say it...?
He-Hey, ~player~... I'm in a really tough spot right now. If you get me out of it, I'll give you something you'll never forget. And a million times better than seeing me lose, I assure you.
~Player~? I have a request. Could you teach me how a woman... does it? I have never touched myself before, and I'm worried I won't know what to do if I lose first. Also, I really like you.

Can I ask something of you, ~player~? Could you please lose this round, and show me how a woman pleasures herself? I have no knowledge on this, and I won't know what to do if I lose next. I want you to teach me.

It's too bad you're naked now, ~player~ . Because it's really cold in here now, don't you think? And you're standing here naked, playing this silly game. I hope you don't get sick. Because all you can do now to put some clothes on is... lose.
I'm feeling cold. Are you feeling cold, ~player~? You should, since you're naked. Too bad we can't put our clothes back on... unless we lose the game.

You know, I heard there's a very serious cold around lately. I'm a little worried for ~player~, since she's naked, and she isn't looking too good. Can't she put some clothes on? Oh, right. She has to lose the game first.
~Player~? I have a request. You know, I've never seen a man... pleasure himself. And I really wish you were my... first. Could you show me?
Can I ask something of you, ~player~? Could you show me how a man pleasures himself? I really wish I could see it. Oh, but you'd have to lose... Well, it's your decision.

It's too bad you're naked now, ~player~ . Because it's really cold in here now, don't you think? And you're standing here naked, playing this silly game. I hope you don't get sick. Because all you can do now to put some clothes on is... lose.
I'm feeling cold. Are you feeling cold, ~player~? You should, since you're naked. Too bad we can't put our clothes back on... unless we lose the game.

You know, I heard there's a very serious cold around lately. I'm a little worried for ~player~, since he's naked, and he isn't looking too good. Can't he put some clothes on? Oh, right. He has to lose the game first.
Doesn't feel like it's gonna stop snowing any time soon outside. Good thing we can hang out in here, by the fire...
With the prize I wanted to treat myself, but it's Christmas... I should get something for the guys. Especially Chopper, I know how much he loves this season.
Ahhhhhh! A spider fell on my back! Oh, no. It was nothing. I hate this forest...
D-did a ghost pass behind me? Why does this forest have to be haunted? Couldn't we play in a regular forest? In daylight?
Can I get some more light over here, please? I'm having trouble seeing my cards.
Is it just me, or is it a little dark in here? How do they expect us to see our cards... or each others faces, so we know who's bluffing.
If I'd brought more clothes, I'd be feeling too hot right now. Who's the inappropriately dressed one now, huh?
I would've brought a jacket if I'd known it was gonna be so cold in here. And because it would've help me in the game.
Why didn't I bring a jacket? I'm the one that's always supposed to pay attention the weather, what the hell was I thinking?
Will my bounty increase because of public exposure? Gosh, I hope not. But we're playing outdoors, after all.
I wonder what the Marine's stance on public exposure is. I wouldn't want my bounty to increase because I'm naked outside. It's all because of the game, but I doubt they'd care.
It's nice we're playing at the beach. Hey! I think I can see the Thousand Sunny from here.
It's good that we're playing at the beach. If I need to escape, I'm closer to the Sunny. B-but why would I need to escape, right?
Nice we're playing at the beach. That means my attire won't look out of place. Not that I would care if it did, anyway.
Isn't this place a little too intimate for a game of Strip Poker?
Whose bedroom is this? Do we have their permission to play here?
What's with this creepy place? Am I back in Thriller Bark, or something?
Why the hell are we playing here? This looks like Thriller Bark. I'm gonna be worried about a zombie jumping on me the whole game.
With all the steam from the spring, it would be easy to cheat or escape without anyone noticing. Don't worry, I'm not gonna do it.
This hot spring seems lovely. I would love to jump in, if only this was a little more private.
Is this a men's or a women's locker room? It's disgusting, so probably the former.
This place is a mess. I bet this is a men's locker room.
This place is so luxurious! Oh, that looks expensive! And that over there...
This mansion must've cost a fortune! Look at the expensive furniture. And is that chandelier made of gold?
I bet I can guess the favorite color of whoever designed this room.
So much purple. It's making my eyes hurt.
Are those people in the back gonna be looking at my ass the whole game? Isn't there a way to get rid of them?
Couldn't we play this game in a more private place? I'm gonna be feeling those eyes on me the whole game.
This is a nice bar with a gorgeous view of the ocean. I'm tired of the ones that look more like dumpsters.
What a beautiful bar! I'd much rather enjoy the view of the sea while drinking than spend time in a poorly lit room.
It's good that we're playing outside. The weather is nice and clear, no chance of rain.
Isn't it nice to play outside? The weather is perfect today. Normal amount of wind and humidity.
The weather is stable today. It really was a good idea to play outside.
So many books! There must be at least one about cartography here. I should take a look at them later.
This is a big library. Robin would have a blast here. I might also find something of interest. I'll check it out after the game.
Looking out the window, this city is insane! All those tall buildings and lights...
Just look out that window! This city is so big. The villages in the East Blue are so insignificant in comparison.
Why do we have to play in this dirty alley? I don't like this.
Shouldn't we be playing at a fancy casino? Anywhere but this disgusting, poorly lit alley would be better really.
Look at all these weapons. Are they just for exhibition? I hope so.
An armory, huh? Zoro would probably like to take a look at that katana over there.
This isn't a real classroom, right? So we are sure there are no children around?
Whose idea was it to play in a classroom? What if a kid walks in?
So... How have you been, ~player~? You're not mad at me because of the treasure, right? I know you're a good guy, so I didn't think you'd mind... But I was still a bit worried.
~Player~... I hope you've been doing well since I... left you in that room. Sorry about that. And about giving the treasure away. I-I didn't think you'd mind.
It's a little funny that I decided to come back here so I could win a game after I lost the last time, and I run into you again, ~player~. Of all the players I could go against...
Is it weird that I came back to this game, ~player~? Maybe I'm still a little frustrated for losing the last time, so I wanted to try my luck again... and I ran into you once more.
After our... adventure, Robin kept asking me about what happened, so I told her. She was very happy for me having my first time... going adventuring, ~player~.

Robin asked me for every detail of our... shared adventure, ~player~. I hope you don't mind that I told her. She's the only one I can confide in, and she was very happy that I finally got to have... my own adventure.
You didn't have any trouble getting out of the island, right ~player~? I hope you found the drawer with the clothes. I forgot to mention it in my note.
I still feel a little bad for leaving you naked in that room, ~player~. I hope you at least found the drawer with the clothes. Maybe I should've told you about it...
Did you read the newspaper the other day, ~player~? It looks like Sinclair was going to be taken to Impel Down. That's the most secure prison in the world, so I doubt she'll ever hurt anyone again.
I don't think the Marines know that we defeated Sinclair, ~player~. That's a relief. My bounty shouldn't increase... And you won't get one. That would be terrible for you.
~Player~, I hope you're not less attracted to me just because we did it. That would make me feel sad and disappointed... and a little bit angry.
~Player~, yoo-hoo...! Oh, I just wanted to see if you still have a hard time not looking at my breasts after you got to touch them and play with them. It seems you do, heheh...

I thought I'd feel less flustered when naked around you, ~player~. Since you got to see and touch every inch of my body... Yet I still feel myself blushing. But it's not embarrassment, maybe I'm just remembering...
Remember how I tried seducing you in our first game, ~player~? All the stuff I said back then... I think I'd really mean it now.
This city is gorgeous! Check out that view... I wonder if it looks just as beautiful during the day. I should come back later with my crew, just for sightseeing.

Wow, look how beautiful this city looks at night! All the lights shining like stars... I'd like to see how it looks during the day, when all the stores are open. I think I see a boutique down there, a bakery, and...
Hey, it's me and three students. It's like I'm your teacher, heheh...
Are these games always this long? I need to finish it fast so I can return to the ship. My crew mates are hopeless without me.
Luffy and the others are probably wondering why I'm not back yet...
So you guys are from the same school? That must be awkward. Or not, I don't really know you.
I don't trust you to play the game fair and square, ~cheater~. I'll keep my eye on you.
I wish I could simply concentrate on my cards, but there's something sleazy about ~cheater~...
Hands where I can see them, ~cheater~! Yeah, you... If I catch you cheating...
Ummm, can I ask you to look at my back for a second, ~player~? It's nothing weird! I just want you to tell me if I have any tan lines?
~Player~, you can't see if I have any tan lines on my back, right? There's not that many people I can ask, and since I'm already naked...
Considering I'm already naked, can I ask you to see if I have tan lines on my back, ~player~? If you want to look at my ass too, I guess it can't be avoided.
Are you curious about my tattoo, ~player~? It's just something to remember the people important to me from my hometown.
I see you looking at my tattoo, ~player~. It represents a pinwheel and a tangerine. Two things that remind me of the people important to me... Oh, you weren't looking at my tattoo?
Do you want to know about my tattoo, ~player~? It's just a memento of those I owe my life to. It used to be something else, but... Well, that's a long story.
Looks like I am even better at poker than I thought.
Have I lost a round yet? No I haven't. Heheheh...
Hey, I haven't lost yet! Am I a poker prodigy or something?
I hope none of you try to pick a fight with me now that I don't have my Clima-Tact. Even if I can't do much without it, I still can... run really fast.
Now, if a fight breaks out for whatever reason, I'll have to try to stay out of it. With my Clima-Tact I could just zap all of you until you calm down.
Even without my Clima-Tact, I wouldn't recommend trying anything with me. I have very strong friends, and they won't stand idly by if you lay a finger on me.
I'm starting to think me losing that round a while back was just an impasse.
I'm so good at this game. After all I haven't lost in... several rounds.
I say we should know each other better. Do you guys have any dreams? My dream is to draw a map of the whole world. I've made a lot of progress, but I'm not even close!
Do you guys have a dream? Something you want to achieve at any cost? Ever since I was little, my dream has been to draw the first map of the entire world.
I'd like to know you guys better. Do you have a dream? All my crew mates have their sight set on a specific goal. For me, it's to draw a map of the world.
I feel a little weird without my Log Pose. I never take it off. We're always sailing after all.
What if my Log Pose gets lost? We got that one as a gift in Fishman Island. How will we ever get another one? I didn't think about that...
I don't take off the bracelet Nojiko gave me even when I take a shower, and now I did it for a stupid stripping game. What would my sister say if she knew? She'd probably just laugh.
(Is the dealer helping me? Either way, I'm happy to be winning so much.)
It's nice to know I'm good at poker. I should play more often if it's an easy way to earn money for me.
(Now that my secret is out, I'll have to win this game before the Marines or bounty hunters hear that I'm here. As if I didn't have enough to worry about already.)
(With everyone knowing I'm a pirate, I'm at risk for every second I spend here. If the Marines arrive, I'll be in trouble. I'm gonna have to finish this game as fast as I can.)
(This is why I didn't want to say I'm a pirate. Now everybody's looking at me weird. And of course, none of the guys know I'm here. If the Marines show up, I'm in real trouble.)
Are you all letting me win now because you know I'm a pirate? Either way, I appreciate it.
Maybe I should I mentioned earlier that I was a pirate if you're all too scared now to make me lose.
Is the fear of showing my breasts what's keeping me from losing at this point?
I don't want to lose again. I mean, I don't want to show my breasts to you all. Is that so bad?

Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Luffy is our captain. He's a big goofball and I'm always hitting him for doing stupid things, but there's nobody I'd rather give my life for. I know he'll become King of the Pirates.
Want to know about my crew? Let's see... There's Zoro, he's a swordsman who uses three swords. He's freakishly strong, but if you leave him alone he's bound to get into trouble or get lost. Or both.

Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Usopp is the sniper. He's the only one who's a bigger coward than me, but in dire situations he still comes through. I also owe him for my weapon, but don't tell him that.
Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Sanji is our cook. He always annoys me because of how much of a pervert he is, but deep down he still has a good heart. And his food is amazing.
Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Chopper is the doctor. He's actually a reindeer who can turn into a human thanks to a Devil Fruit. He's not only an amazing doctor, but is also super cute.

Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Robin is an archeologist. She's the only other girl in the crew. She might seem too serious because she's been through a lot, but at this point she's like a big sister to me.

Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Franky is the shipwright. He built our current ship, the Thousand Sunny. He has built some amazing stuff, but he also likes to create useless crap for some reason.

Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Brook is our musician. He's a living skeleton, so you'd freak out if you saw him, I know I did the first time. But he's harmless, even if he's always annoying me.
Do you have any idea how hard it is to be evenly tanned? I wear very light clothes and I'm always outside.
I don't have tan marks, right? It's not easy for me, because of the clothes I usually wear. But I don't like to take off my swimsuit when I'm sunbathing, so...
Now that I took off my top, do I have tan marks? Thankfully, I work very hard to avoid that. But enough about my breasts, let's focus on the game.
Whatever I've been doing for these last few rounds is working. As long as I don't lose again...
Here I am, not losing another round. Trying my best so I'm not forced to show more.
(Now that I'm in this position, I'm gonna need a second plan to get the prize, even if I lose. No way I'm leaving here empty-handed after all this.)
(It's a real possibility that I might lose now. If I do, I'll just have to comply. But I'm going to need another plan to get my hands on the prize.)
I've decided... If I lose, I'm gonna need my Clima-Tact. It's nothing special... I just need it for something.
