Starfire is a pretty name. Suitable for such an, umm, exotic looking girl like you.
You seem really strong. It's a relief to know you're on the side of the good.
Did you say earlier you're an amazon? Luffy spent some time on the amazon's island and met the pirate empress. That's not you, right?
You're clearly used to these kind of activities. The stripping part, at least.
You look exactly like the kind of woman that I'd expect to see in a place like this.
It's refreshing to see another normal woman like you in this crazy place, Ini.
But you can still win, Ini...
Hey, little girl. Are you lost? Did you get separated from your parents? You really shouldn't be here.
Hey there, little girl? Wh-why are you here? Did you get lost? Everyone, let's stop the game. There's a little girl here.
A female warrior... You look strong. It's refreshing to see a tough looking woman for a change.
An elegant woman like you is the last type I'd expect to see enjoying this sort of activity.
You seem very classy, Cynthia. Just seeing you here, I'm a little less worried about the type of establishment this is.
For someone so colorful you're pretty snarky.
A model, huh? So they make you wear those strange clothes as part of your job?
I've met a few princesses, but none of them was quite as... burly as you.
What's your homeland like, ~name~? I imagine it must be a scary place.
What's a Video Game, Chiaki? I've never heard of them.
You lost, huh? Why don't you put that weapon down? Is not like you're gonna use it h-
Oh, boy... Here we go again.
Can't you just... not? This one time?
Again?! You nutcase...
sigh I gotta find some cover again.
What's a virtual idol? Does it mean you're not really here?
Uh-oh... Seems like one of those experiments from Thriller Bark got out of the island.
I also care about fitness, so it might be good to have someone here who can give me some tips, even if I came here to win some money.
Just because I came here to earn the prize, doesn't mean I can't learn something from you, Trainer. I'm looking forward to hear what you have to say.
Are you really a cat woman or is that just a costume?
So you're just a student, Mahiru? You don't work for the World Economic News, or something?
What's with the wings and that whole getup. It's creepy...
Really? A woman wearing a mask? I thought only guys were into that kind of stuff.
It's so weird seeing a woman wearing a mask. Guys are always gawking over stuff like that, but I thought women were different.
(A pirate! But I don't recognize her, so she's probably not very strong...)
Hey, no need to get violent. It's just a game.
I gotta say, your whole aesthetic almost fooled me into thinking you're a vampire. The fangs, and all... Oh, you even have bite marks on your neck! Well done, Marceline.
Okay, you were very close to convincing me you're a vampire. You went into a lot of detail, even with the bite marks! Hehehe, I'll hand it to you. Well done.
You look smart. And it's not just because of the glasses, it's also because of... Umm... It's the glasses.
Uhhh... How's the life of a bounty hunter? I imagine you make enough to eat well... As long as you're good at it.
I-Is it tough being a bounty hunter? Some of those bounties seem pretty expensive to me, so I can't imagine you live an austere life.
You fight crime and stuff? In that outfit? Interesting...
Why are you so intense? We're just playing a game.
Tights, sneakers, a headband? Were you working out and then you decided to stop for a game?
Mia, you seem like a serious respectable woman. I don't know why you'd want to pay this game. Wouldn't you rather play something that doesn't involve people undressing?
You really don't seem like the kind of woman I was expecting to see here, Mia. Why would you choose this type of activity, over something less... indecent?
So you're a defense attorney? That means you defend criminals and such, right? Could I get your info? Just in case...
You're a defense attorney, right? I guess I wouldn't mind having your information. Well... You never know.
What is that stick you're holding? If you're young enough to play with toys then you shouldn't be here.
D.Va... Oh, like diva. I get it.
So you pilot a giant robot? Just like Franky... I thought only boys were into that sort of stuff.
Where did that briefcase you were holding earlier go? I hope there wasn't anything valuable inside...
You ride a pegasus? Like that old man from Skypiea. I thought there was only one of those creatures.
You're not really broadcasting this game, right? I don't see you having a Transponder Snail, so probably not...
Aren't you a little young to be a detective? You can still be good, but...
Why can't you take off your gloves? Are you hiding something?
Oh, so you are hiding something under those gloves. Like a bunch of extra cards, or...
You act like you're tough, but in my opinion you don't seem very strong...
You're very upbeat for someone who just lost a round. I also think it's better to be that way.
You keep talking in this weird way. Are you part of a cult or something?
I'm not sure what your deal is, but you really should relax a little.
I don't say this to anyone, but those big eyes of you are very captivating, Mae. Sort of like a cat's.
You study the weather, Mei? We should definitely have a conversation after the game. I'm sure we can learn a lot from each other.
Hey... you look way too innocent to want to play this game. You didn't walk in here by mistake, right? Or because you were forced?
Ummm... I gotta ask... Nobody forced you to come here, right? Do you know what this game is?
Heh, did you know that your hair forms the shape of a heart?
Heheheh... Your hair is heart-shaped. It's cute and funny.
Saki, right? Are you feeling okay? You don't have to play if you don't want to.
Hey, don't say that. I'm sure lots of guys would like to see you naked. Well, some of them are perverts, but you get what I say.
Saki, you don't have to put yourself down so much. I think you're very pretty. Sure, you could fix your hair a little, but that's it.
I feel there's something unique about you, Zizou. But I can't tell what...
Why that monochromatic look, Blake? Is that in fashion these days.
Something wrong?
Wait, how can you be a human but at the same time have cat ears? Are you perhaps a mix between a human and a mink? Is that even possible?
Are you feeling okay? You weren't drugged before coming here, were you?
Are you okay? You seem a little... uninhibited. You're not always like this, are you?
Hey! Can't you just take it easy?! You already took off your bra!
Is this why you took off your bra first? Girl, you need a long, cold shower...
Have you learned nothing?! They already told you...!
W-Wait! The rule, remember? Oh my goodness, this girl...
I don't want to look. I know that'll only make it worse.
Of course you still haven't lost your excitement. It's only growing...
Your name really is Kim Possible? That can't be a coincidence.
Did you say you work as a babysitter? I have a feeling I'd be good at that.
Ruby is a beautiful name. It reminds me of... nice things.
That's an interesting accent you have. Where is it from?
(What kind of bounty hunter dresses like that?)
(Is she really a bounty hunter? She doesn't seem to have any weapons on her.)
(A prosecutor... Doesn't that mean she gets criminals convicted? I better be careful.)
Are you never gonna get rid of that thing you keep slapping around with? It's dangerous.
Finally a normal looking girl. Nice to meet you.
With that attire you must be from Wano, am I right?
A princess dressed in armor... Your country must be plagued by war.
Sorry, but I've seen enough crazy inventions for a lifetime thanks to Franky.
Hey, you look like you haven't been outside in a while. A little sun doesn't hurt, you know?
Uhhh... Are you not used to going outside very often, Tomoko? I just get that feeling... It doesn't hurt you to get a little sun every now and then.
I don't know what this talking butterfly is doing here... Should we wait for it to leave before we continue?
This talking butterfly... It's not really gonna play the game, right? We should probably wait for it to leave. Because, how...?
I think butterflies are cute, but a Devil Fruit that allows you to transform into one doesn't sound very useful to me, Yuelia. What if you get swatted by accident?

case.state: Butterflies are adorable, but a Devil Fruit ability that allows to transform into one doesn't seem very useful. If you get swatted in your butterfly form, you could be seriously hurt.

state.text: What's the need to be so sarcastic? Typical villain.
I'm sorry, but I just don't see you fighting horrific creatures or whatever it is you said.
You must be a student from a fancy school. That uniform looks more like a ceremony dress.
I know you've lost most of your clothes already, but you should stop with that attitude.
You're very young for a model. I suppose they need young models too.
Is that you, okama? What did I tell you last time about copying my body? Especially for this kind of stuff!
I don't think a young girl should be talking about spiders so much. It's unladylike. And gross.
Spiders are so gross, and creepy... I don't think you'd be very popular if you talk about them so much.
Do you live here, Mary? Oh, it's just that you dress the way I'd expect someone to dress when they're at home.
A schoolgirl from a wealthy family, huh? How rich are we talking about here? Do you live in a mansion?
...Oh sorry, I didn't mean to stare at your metal arm. For what it's worth, I'm sure some members of my crew would find that very cool.
I love your look, Shantae. Does everybody dress like that where you come from?
Now that I've looked at it more, your outfit really reminds me of the one I wore in Alabasta, Shantae. Is that where you're from?
All this talk about "contracts" and "targets" doesn't exactly make me feel comfortable around you.
Nice to meet you, Shouko. You're not very talkative, huh? It's okay, I don't mind reading.
Pleasure to meet you, Shouko. I see you use a notebook to communicate... Well, I don't mind reading.
Fairy Tail? I've never heard of it. I don't know what you guys deal with, but I know it's not magic. So what is it really?
I don't know what Fairy Tail is exactly, but did you say it has to do with magic? So you're like performers, or something?
Hey! How did you do that?!
So you're a lab assistant... Who do you work for again? It's not Dr. Vegapunk, is it?
I know you mentioned you're a robot earlier, but I don't buy it. I thought those Pacifistas look real, but you'd be on another level.

case.state: Finally someone here who understand the importance of money. But keep your hands off the prize, I saw it first.
Do you really make a lot of money as a shopkeeper? Not unless your prices are really high, I guess. Good thing I'm excellent at haggling, so that wouldn't work on me.

state.text: Sorry for overreacting earlier. I just have a fear of living statues... among other things.
I'm sorry for screaming. I have a crippling fear of living statues. Not the only thing I'm scared of, but it's up there.
PA-15? That kinda sounds like the name of those Pacifista things. PX... something. Then are you also a machine?
Are you finally getting rid of that gun? I feel like I'm in a hostage situation with you holding it all the time.
You're already a queen? You don't look any older than all the princesses I've met.
Are you really a swordswoman? No offense, but you look like you just came back from a study session at a library.
So where's your sword, Connie? Or swords, if you're like Zoro.
Why is that knife red...? Wh-Why is that knife red?!
That knife looks an ominous red color... Right? Is anyone else concerned about that?
That's a very unique uniform, but I like it. What kind of school do you go to, Bernie?

case.state: I'd understand wearing an extra piece of clothing so you can last longer, but a box? It's a little too much.

state.text: Isn't it about time you get rid of that box? This is getting ridiculous... Even more ridiculous.
So what does "half-genie" mean, Shantae? Is there a race called "genies"? Is that why you have those pointy ears? There's no way you mean actual genies...
I've been thinking about what you mean when you say you're a "half-genie"... Are the genies a race with pointy ears? Not like the genies from lamps, and all that... right?
Shantae, aren't you worried that with you dancing, and with that long hair, you might hit someone with it if you make a fast move?
I'm only saying this because I like you, Shantae, but you could always count your earrings and your tiara as items if you want to last longer in the game.

case.state: Why did you take off your pants before your top, Shantae? You do have a great posterior, but I hope you're not self-conscious about your chest.

state.text: What exactly are you? At least you're human... right? I can't believe I have to ask people that now...
Ummm, don't be offended, but I just have to know... Are you human? It's just that... everything about you look so... Uh... unusual.
If I remember correctly, the last time I saw you, Kuma made you disappear. Back then I thought he killed you.
Last time I saw you, Kuma made you disappear in front of me. I had no idea back then what happened.
In the end, did you abandon your former crew? Good riddance. What a group of freaks that was...
So I guess you left your crew, huh? Is that why you're alone now? Good for you. That band of freaks wasn't doing you any favors.
I've been thinking... Why are you wearing those thigh highs with a garter belt? Aren't they elastic?
Hmmm, I didn't notice before, but I don't understand why you'd wear a garter belt if you have those thigh highs that are elastic.
What's wrong with you? Just take off your thigh highs! No need to be so stubborn.
Just remove your thigh highs, then. Nobody will say anything.
Seriously, just take off your thigh highs. At least you can get more time.
You'd really rather people here see you naked than go back on your word? I weirdly find that inspiring.
So your ghosts only work on people as long as they're not already negative, right? Heheh...
I've heard that ability of yours doesn't work if you use it on someone who's already negative... Am I wrong?
You couldn't look any more different from the last Neptune I met. Maybe if you had a beard, hahaha...
Hey, you're the second Neptune I've met! But you look nothing like him. Probably because you don't have a beard.
You seem quite mature for a schoolgirl. They really develop younger every time, don't they?
Are you really in school? You're not just wearing the uniform? Huh, I seem to remember schoolgirls looking smaller.
You're part of the Literature Club? That must be nice, having people to talk about books with... Well, I have Robin, but two people is not a club.
You're in your school's Literature Club, huh? Man, I'm jealous... I'd love to be able to discuss books with other people. Aside from Robin, of course.
You're very upbeat for someone who just lost a round. I also think it's better to be that way.
I like how upbeat and cheerful you are, Yang. But are you sure you're not also a little nervous?

case.state: It's nice to meet a woman with a sense of humor. At least your jokes are better than Brook's stupid bone jokes.
I like a woman who enjoys making jokes. I think I like your puns more than Brook's silly skeleton jokes.

state.text: That's a nice looking armor, but wouldn't you rather wear something that would offer more protection? Like on your head, your arms, your midriff...
Hmmm, why would you wear armor that leaves so much skin exposed? I still like how it looks, but I'm not sure it's worth it...
Didn't I see you appear out of a door in mid-air earlier? That's an interesting Devil Fruit ability.
How did you appear out of mid-air earlier? I don't think I've ever seen a Devil Fruit ability like that.

case.state: Did your friend convince you to come here? That's not very nice... This isn't a good place for a meeting.
Did you come here because your friend told you to meet her here? Why would she do that?

state.text: What's the range on your teleporting ability? Can you appear anywhere, or is there a range limit?
So... how far can you teleport with that ability of yours? Is there a limit to how far you can travel, or is it anywhere you want?

case.state: I'm not sure what you're expecting to discover by playing this game. Remember if you lose, you have to do this... I'm not hating it as much as I thought I would, but it's still embarrassing.

state.text: So have you really been staying with Dracule Mihawk for two years? Living with a Warlord of the sea?
Have you really been living with Dracule Mihawk these last two years? With one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea?
Are you seriously a goddess? It's tough to have my beliefs challenged like this... Would it be rude to ask for proof?
Are you really a goddess, Neptune? That isn't just a title? I met a self-proclaimed God once, and he was just a narcissistic tyrant.
Are you nice, Ms. Ghost? Y-Y-You aren't gonna drag me to a graveyard and twist my neck?
Are you friendly? Y-Y-You... you aren't gonna hurt me, right? Like remove the skin from my body, or eat my fingers...
You're not really a robot, right? Franky is a cyborg, and he looks way less human than you. Wh-Who made you...?
Are you joking about being a robot? You look so much more human than Franky... Where do they have this technology? Who created you?
So what can you do? Can you shoot lasers? Jump super high? Rocket punch?
I'm curious as to what you can do as a robot... Can you fire lasers? What about jumping high into the air? Oh, maybe shoot your punch like a rocket?

case.state: Bulma, you seem like an important woman... Am I mistaken to think you might be a... president, or something?
Hmmm, I have a good eye for important people, and you seem like the type, Bulma. Maybe some sort of... president? Am I wrong?

state.text: An archer? You must be very skilled with that bow. I have a friend who has perfect aim, but he uses a slingshot instead.
I take it you must've had a lot of practice to use a bow properly. My friend never misses his target, though his weapon of choice is a slingshot.
What's your forest like, Lyralei? Is it a beautiful place to visit, or is it filled with bugs, horrifying creatures and... talking trees? Ugh...
Is your forest a nice place to visit, Lyralei? By nice, I mean there won't be bugs, monsters, and trees that come to life and try to kidnap me... again.
Are you telling me there's someone out there who made a fake school that supposedly teaches kids how to become "wizards"? Who would do such a horrible thing?
I can't believe there could be a monster who'd create a fake school that teaches kids "magic"... That's a horrible thing to do.
While it's admirable that you're a good student, wouldn't you rather learn something... useful? Like science?
I respect that you're the best student in your school... Although I think it'd be better to learn something real instead of "magic". How about science?
Is that stick you're carrying the one that supposedly allows you to use magic? Did you have to pay a huge amount of beli for that?
That stick you have in your hand is the one that focuses your magic powers or whatever, right? I bet they made you pay a ridiculous price for that.
So... Where are you staying now? You're not back at Thriller Bark, right?
Ummm... Where are you living nowadays, Ghost Girl? I hope you didn't go back to Thriller Bark.
Wow, you're adorable! I'd believe it if you told me you were on your way to your grandma's house.
What an adorable girl! Did you wander in here by mistake? You look like you were on your way to visit your grandma, or something.
So, Neptune... What kind of games do you enjoy? Aside from strip poker, I suppose.
What kind of games does a goddess enjoy playing, Neptune? I can't imagine strip poker is your favorite...
That mask is so creepy! Th-That's not really blood on it, is it? Your voice sounds so kind, why would you dress like that?
A-Are you wearing that mask as a prank? Hahah, very funny and scary... Ummm, now why don't you take it off?
Are you okay, Susie? I have a feeling you've been through a lot... Maybe I can help.
How are you feeling, Susie? If you have suffered a lot, perhaps there's something I can do...
This outfit you're wearing... Is it some sort of uniform for your crew? This design is so unique. It looks... futuristic.
Meia, is your outfit a uniform, or something? I don't think I've ever seen something quite like it. It feels like an outfit people would wear far in the future.
Meia, you mentioned you come from a "planet" of women. Are you sure it isn't an island of women? I know that's where the Pirate Empress lives.
Did you say earlier that you come from a "planet" of women, Meia? You said planet, right? Not island? 'Cause I know that exists. That's where the Pirate Empress, Boa Hancock, lives.
Cough, cough...! I'm used to Sanji smoking next to me, but at least he has the decency to blow the smoke away from me, and standing down wind from where I am. Have some respect, Revy.
Cough, cough...! Okay, I've waited long enough to say something, but you keep blowing that smoke my way, Revy! Compared to you, Sanji is a model smoker.
Where does you obsession with pirates come from, Emi? I know why some people are obsessed with pirates. What about you?
You're far from the first person I've met who loves pirates so much, Emi. Where did you get that from? Did you meet someone in your childhood that embedded it into you, or...?
Cynthia, you remind me a lot of a friend of mine. She also has this dignified aura around her, and she's a huge history buff. You two could probably talk for hours.
You remind me of a friend of mine, Cynthia. History is her whole life, and she's also very sophisticated and smart. I can picture you two leaning over a stack of books, and talking for hours.
Megumin, sorry if it seemed like I was teasing you earlier. I think you're gorgeous. You don't need to have big breasts to be beautiful.
I didn't mean to tease you earlier, Megumin. You shouldn't feel insecure about your body, 'cause you're gorgeous. Having big breasts or small ones can't change that.
So you have some sort of explosion ability, Megumin? Isn't that dangerous? You probably get hurt all the time.
You have an ability to create explosions? That sounds extremely dangerous. How often do you get hurt, Megumin?
I don't remember the last time I asked someone this, but... What's wrong with you? Why are you this way?
Why... are you like this? So detached from everything... I'd like to understand.
Are there more like you out there, Galatea? Living statues, I mean. A family, maybe?
Galatea, do you happen to have... a family? Or at least, is there a group of living statues out there, like you?
Has it been hard making friends for you, Shouko? On account of... not speaking? I imagine it can't be easy, but if you meet the right people...
I imagine you've had trouble adapting to people your age without being able to speak, Shouko. But have you managed to make any friends yet? It's all about meeting the right people.
Are you famous where you come from, Cynthia? I'm afraid I haven't heard of you... What are you famous for?
So you're famous, Cynthia? I'm sorry, but I don't think I've seen your face on the newspaper... Are you a famous actress, or a model?
Chara, where do you come from? I've met people who live under the sea, above the clouds... and you're like none of them.
There's something different about you, Chara. Even people who live on the sky or under water aren't that different. Where are you from?
This Tadano sounds like a special young man, huh Shouko? My life also turned around when I met my captain. Oh, but it's not romantic... Not that I'm saying it is in your case... It's just a feeling.
Sounds to me like this Tadano is very important to you, Shouko. I also have a very important man in my life. Oh, but he's just my captain. It sounds to me like you like this young man, huh?
So you like fries, huh? I can... see that.
From what I see, you like fries a lot.
While I admire that you're trying to lose weight, Erufuda, I admire you even more for being so confident. You have good reason, considering how cute you are.
I hope you can lose weight so you can fulfill you goal, Erufuda, but I don't think you'd have to otherwise. You're already super cute, but you already seem to know that.
So what are the poems you write usually about, Yuri? I'm sure they're great, but I hope they're not too depressing.
What's your poetry style, Yuri? I know poets find inspiration in different places, but I'm not really a fan of the more depressing poems.
I really wasn't expecting to see a schoolgirl here. Wouldn't you rather hang out with your friends than play this sort of game?
What interest could a schoolgirl have in this kind of activity? If I was you, I'd be hanging out with my friends, doing normal stuff that doesn't involve... stripping.
Do you work in intelligence, Pauling? You seem to be very well informed... I hope it's not for the Government, or I'll have to excuse myself.
Pauling, you seem to be more knowledgeable than the average person here... I hope you don't have access to such intel because you work for the Government. If so, it was nice meeting you...
Is Strip Poker really a good way of dealing with stress? I also spend most of my day stressed... I wouldn't want my hair to turn gray by the time I'm 30.
Do you really know how to deal with stress, Pauling? I don't know if Strip Poker is a good way... But I'm willing to try new things, since I also have to deal with a lot of stress daily.
I'm kinda glad that I never had a "tomboy" phase... Ummm, no offense. It's just hard to stay in touch with your feminine side when you're always hanging out with boys.
Thank goodness I never felt the need to act more tomboyish just to fit in with the guys... My style also never rubbed off on them, but it could've been worse. Uhhh, but you look good, Saki.
What's a video game, Aoba? I don't think I've ever heard of that. Must be something that was invented recently, right?
You work making video games, Aoba? I know games, but I can't imagine where the "video" part comes from. Are they some new invention?
So I know you're a fitness trainer, but what does "Wii" mean? It's a funny word...
The fitness trainer part I get, but I've never heard of a "Wii", so I don't understand where that comes from. Sounds like a weird word.
Did you say earlier that you're a Captain's apprentice? But you go to school, right? It must be some sort of military school, then. Sounds tough.
What kind of school do you go to, Leonie? You said that your teacher is a Captain. Are they training you to become a soldier? I imagine it must be bitter work.
Those ears are so cute, heheh... What animal are you, Amy? Hmmm, you seem more human than a Mink.
Hehehe, I like your ears... But I can't figure out what animal you're supposed to be. Usually I don't have any trouble recognizing Minks, but you seem like a human aside from the ears.
Are you happy being a vampire, Marceline? Or would you rather be normal? If the legends are true, vampires can't be exposed to sunlight, eat garlic, look at crosses... That could be tough.

If you had a choice, would you rather just be human than a vampire, Marceline? Sure, you have all those powers, but there's also stuff you can't do because of it, right? If the superstitions are correct...
Did you come here on a bike, May? I swear I always see girls dressed like you riding their bikes around... Where did you leave it?
That's the perfect outfit for biking, am I wrong? Where did you leave your bike? Somewhere safe, I hope, so nobody steals it.
You're basically an adventurer, right May? What kind of places have you been to? I'd like to hear them, especially the most dangerous ones.
If you've been on a lot of adventures, you've probably visited a lot of places, May. What was the most dangerous place you've been to? I'd like to know so we're better prepared if I ever go there.
Ayano, if you're getting bullied by a girl at school, that's very serious. Especially if they're doing that to you...
I know this isn't the right place for this conversation, but if a girl is bullying you at school and cutting your body, that's serious business, Ayano.

case.state: Not sure what kind of emotion you expect to find in this game, other than utter humiliation and embarrassment...
What sort of feeling are you looking for by playing this game? Humiliation? Embarrassment? Some people are into that, I guess.
What do you think you'll find by playing this game? I already lost and... Well, it wasn't bad at all, but I don't think I learned anything new about myself. And it was still embarrassing...

state.text: Smiling is not hard, Laevy... Can I call you Laevy? I also rarely smiled for a long time, but that changed when I met my friends. Just being close to them makes it so much easier.

Smiling should come naturally to you if you surrounded yourself with the right people, Laevy. Do you have a lot of friends? If you find people who make you happy and you spend time with them, smiling becomes very easy.
You mentioned you have a younger sister, Mia? What's she like? Is she also a lawyer? I could see her being inspired by you, and following on your footsteps.
What's your little sister like, Mia? Did she become a lawyer too? Must be nice working alongside your family.
You have a really nice body, Neptune. That doesn't seem like the body of someone who "plays games and eats sweets" all day... What's your secret?
Do you really spend most of the time playing and taking it easy, Neptune? How do you stay in such good shape then? You have a gorgeous body.
You're a light mage? Did I hear that right? What other kinds of mages are there? I wonder if I could be considered one, with my weather abilities...

A light mage... Does that mean there different types of magic and mages? Supposedly... Though I'd like to know what they are. My weather abilities might seem like magic. I wonder if I'd qualify as a mage.
All these light related puns are not some sort of defense mechanism because you're afraid of the dark, right? Well, I don't love it either, so I wouldn't blame you.
What's with all the light puns, Lux? Hmmm, I've heard some use humor as a coping mechanism. Could it be you're afraid of the dark? I get it, it can be scary.
A sky woman... Nice to meet you! Huh...? Those wings don't look like real wings... Do you not come from above the clouds, Angela?
It's always nice to meet a sky person... Wait, are those real wings? They look mechanical... Are you not from the sky, Angela?
I've met some strange looking doctors, but you're on a class of your own, Angela. With the way you're dressed, I would expect you to have some revolutionary method for healing people.
I didn't think I'd meet yet another unusual doctor so soon... What's your method for healing people, Angela? Somehow, I can't picture you mixing herbs or making potions.
A normal girl! That's refreshing... There seem to be a lot of weirdos around lately.
I-It's so scary... But I can't stop looking at it.
What a plain looking girl! Almost... too plain.
Are you okay? You look a little... dizzy.
A mime, huh? I could use some quiet right now, so this suits me just fine.
Oh, you're a mime. That's why you haven't said anything. It's better than playing with someone who yaps nonstop.
Hey, you haven't said anything since we got here. Are you tired...? Are you hungry...?
I, uhhh... am not sure I understand your dialect. Where did you say you're from, Derpina?
I'm sorry, but I only understand half of what you're saying. I don't think it's because you're a cat girl. I've had no trouble understanding other animal people.
So you're an average henchwoman for this organization? I've defeated many grunts like you without batting an eye... Sometimes it's easy to forget you're people too. I feel like I should apologize.
No judgment, but I wouldn't want to play Strip Poker with my mom... I don't know if that's common in... Alola, was it?
N-Ninetales...?

case.state: I think I'd have it easier trying to understand what an actual cat than you...

state.text: What's with that suit? Hahaha...! Sorry, I don't know if it's meant to be funny.
(What is that?! No, I shouldn't judge... There are many different races around the world.)
You're so young for being so knowledgeable. Do you really know everything about everything? 'Cause if so, I might have some questions.
I can't imagine how much you'd have to study to know so much. And I thought I was hardworking... Maybe you know more than me about certain topics. Can I ask you a few questions?
Do you work out, Yuri? Surely you do more than reading and writing all day to have a body like yours, right? Especially with those legs.

Even if you spend most of your time reading, I'm sure you do at least something to stay in shape, right Yuri? I'd be jealous to learn that you can have legs like those without putting some work into it.
Wiki, do you ever get tired of people asking you questions about random facts? It's great that you have all that knowledge, but I'd understand if you sometimes wanna take a vacation.
So your job is to give information to anyone who asks for it? Doesn't that get tiresome? If I was you, I'd be dying to go on a vacation, Wiki.
What's your training routine, Connie? You don't seem that buffed.
Hey... ball. You better not be manipulating this girl into doing whatever you want. It doesn't seem like she can talk.
Ball, what are your intentions ordering this poor girl around? From what I've seen, she can't say no... or anything really.
Is it common for you to get confused with a man because of your title, Miko? You're clearly a girl, but I imagine that must get annoying.
Do people often think you're a man before they meet you, Miko? Because of the "Prince" title? You probably get used to that sort of stuff, but I still think it would bother me.
You know, Tomoko... If you want to become more popular and be sexy, I can give you some tips. Only if you want...
Tomoko, if you want people to notice you, and have more sex appeal, there are some easy things you can do. I can help you with that, if you want.
Those ice powers, do they have anything to do with your music? The musician in my crew also freezes people... but that might be because he's dead.
Where did you get your ice powers? Are they linked to your music? I'm not a musician, but I have seen something like that before.
If you have a flyer for your band, or something, I can take it. I can't promise I can go to your event, though. My crew is always on the move.
Did you bring flyers for you band, Darling? Or some way to promote it? If I have a chance I can go check you guys out. But I can't guarantee, since my crew never stays in one place for long.

case.state: Hey, if poker is not your thing, I could help you. I wouldn't want to see a girl who doesn't know the game lose because she doesn't understand the rules, even if I intend to win in the end.
Hilda, if you need my help with the game you just need to ask. Even if I'm here to win, I'd hate to see anyone lose too quickly because they have no experience with these sort of games.

state.text: Hey, if poker is not your thing, I could help you. I wouldn't want to see a girl who doesn't know the game lose because she doesn't understand the rules, even if I'm already out of the game.
Hilda, if you need my help with the game you just need to ask. Even if I already lost, I'd hate to see anyone lose too quickly because they have no experience with these sort of games.
If you're a benevolent deity, does that mean you can give me good fortune? I'll gladly make a small offering at your shrine if I can get countless riches in return! I'd consider it an investment...

So if I understand how it works, you promise to give me something in return if I leave an offering at this shrine of yours, right? I don't really believe in deities, but I can take the risk if there's a chance I'll get rich.
Asuna, what kind of game did you say you play again? I've never heard any of those terms. VRR... something. Is it some new sport?
What game was it that you play, Asuna? VRR... something? I'm not an expert in games, but I've never heard of anything like that.
Gwen, do you do your superhero work by yourself? Or do you have a team with you? I can see both options having their ups and downs...
Do you work solo, Gwen? As a superhero, I mean. I'm sure it would help to work with other supers, but maybe it's easier to not rely on others with what you do.
I bet you get a lot of attention because of your outfit, Shantae... especially with the transparent pants. Do you ever get annoyed by that?
Say, do you think one of these videogames would make for a good gift? I feel like I want to do something nice for the guys. What do your recommend, Aoba?
I'm feeling generous. I think I'd like to buy something nice for the guys, and maybe they'd like on these videogames. Do you have any recommendations, Aoba?
I've been thinking, Wiki... Is there a specific topic that you love to talk about, but people rarely ask you about it?
You clearly love giving information about lots of different topics, but do you personally have a favorite subject, Wiki? Maybe something that you wish people would ask you about more often.
Are there other gh-ghosts around? I think I'd like to know in advance. Like a ghost butler, or gardener...?
Is Tojiko the only ghost that came with you, Miko? It could save me from a heart attack to know beforehand if there's another one around.
You don't look any more uncomfortable now that you're in your underwear, Neptune. Well, that is some cute underwear, but do you not get embarrassed at all?
Did you forget you're in your underwear, Neptune? You look just as confident now as you did fully dressed. Are you not fazed by nudity at all?
Do you wear that armor every day, Lux? I'm sure it keeps you safer, but do you ever wish you could wear something a little more... girly? I know I would.

I don't know if I could wear an armor like yours every day, Lux. Do you ever wish you could wear a dress, or something different? I like wearing girly outfits, even when they're not the most practical choice.
Do you ever go to the beach, Shouko? I don't get the feeling you get a lot of sun, but I'm sure you'd look great in a two-piece swimsuit.
You're so pale, Shouko. You should go to the beach with your friends more often. I'm sure you'd make a lot of heads turn wearing a bikini.
Seriously? You didn't know? Well, I guess if you want to back down now is the time.
Ugh... S-Sorry, that wasn't directed at you. I've just had bad experiences with women with horns and dinosaur features...
Oh, damn... N-Nice to meet you. It's just you aren't the first woman I've met who has horns and dinosaur-like features. It awakens some bad memories.
What a weird creature... Good thing Luffy isn't here, or he would ask her to join the crew.
What is that? The sea really is a vast place...
A fighter, huh? I'm sure you're no match for Luffy.
So you're a fighter. It's a good thing my crew mates are not here, or some of them would be eager to get into a fight with her for no reason.
You're a princess? You wouldn't happen to know Vivi, right? She's the princess of the Kingdom of Alabasta. I haven't talked to her in ages.
You're a princess, right? I've met a few, I know what they look like. No big deal.
Oh, a princess! I bet your kingdom is rich and powerful. Those clothes you're wearing look expensive...
You... look a little young to be here. If you're as young as you look, you should leave now.
Doesn't that uniform mean you're still in school? Then what do you think you're doing here?
I doubt anyone would have the nerve of saying I dress inappropriately with you standing next to me... That's still a cute outfit, though.
I don't see anything indecent about that outfit, but I also don't consider my own look inappropriate, and yet people are always bugging me about me. What do you think, ~player~?
Did I mention I really like your hair, ~name~. Heheh... I'm not biased, I swear.
I'm very happy that you're here, ~name~. People often say "It was the orange-haired woman that did it!". But this time, they won't know which one of us they meant.

case.state: Very well. I'm on the right track here.
How many more times do I have to win to get the money?
You won't pose a challenge if you don't focus, ~name~.
Great! Another round won.
I'm doing great! Aren't I?
That seemed to work for me.
Sorry, ~name~. But you got in my way.
Look at me go! I'll have that prize in no time!
Winning in this game will never get old.
Oh, yeah! I'm unstoppable.
Hey, don't feel bad. Maybe you won't lose the next round.
Looks like I won this time.
Yes! Let's keep on winning!
Can we bet on what ~name~ is going to remove? It would be another chance to earn some money.
Aren't I great at this game? Seems that way!
Good job, everyone! Well, except for ~name~.
I can already feel that exciting treasure nearby... I mean, prize.
I'm much more than meets the eye.
I made it! Another one is in the bag.
Hehehe! I love winning!
Mmmm! I love it when things go right for me.
I told you, I'm not messing around anymore.
It's unfortunate, but there's things in this world you can't do anything about but comply.
Good, now I can relax. If only for a second...
Yay! Winning is the best feeling!
Heheheh, big catch, big catch!
Sorry, but I can't afford to play around anymore.
I knew ~name~ was gonna lose. How? I don't know... Woman's intuition?
Sweet victory, here I come.
Even if I'm half naked, I'm not gonna give up... Especially because I'm half naked!
This victory is mine! Any complaints?
Everything's okay for now! Now I just need to keep winning.
Sorry, but I'm not gonna lose just yet.
Sucks to be you.
Yes! I'm down, but I'm not defeated yet!
Hey, remember I had to take off everything. Now it's your turn.
No complaining, young lady. We all have to suffer in this game.
Someone has to lose, ~name~. You should know the game at this point.
Oh, right! You're still playing the game. But for how much longer? I wonder...
Loser! I guess I'm a bigger loser since I lost way earlier. But still, hahah!
My favorite part of losing the game, is making fun of the ones that are still playing.
Oh, man! The game is still going strong after I lost.

state.text: Seriously? A tie? I didn't know that was a thing in this game. Well, no harm done.
A tie, huh? Does that mean there are two losers in this round? Oh, no one loses! That makes more sense.
Hey, stop flying around! You're bothering everyone and you're making me dizzy.
What are you doing?! Just stay in your spot! If you keep flying around like that you're gonna bump into someone.
A puzzle, huh? If I solve it, can I keep whatever is inside?
But then what's all that stuff for? It almost feels like a threat...
That's a relief... Then why do you carry all those weapons? Just for show?
The Koprulu sector? Where is that? I've never heard of it. But the name sounds so foreign...
In what sea is this Koprulu sector? I've never heard of that name, much less a war happening there. But how far away can it be?
Huh, so it's exactly what I thought it was. But... why? Is it like a macho thing to carry a rocket launcher with you?
I was just gonna say it looks like a rocket launcher boombox... Why do you need something like that? It seems overly macho to me.
Don't worry about it! Just don't turn around until you find a mirror.
Oh... Forget I said anything! Maybe it's not too bad... but you should probably check with a mirror before you turn around.
Huh?
(How is he doing this?)
Yep, exactly like Franky.
Hmmm, now that I look at them, those wings are much bigger than the ones the Skypieans had. Are you from a different sky island?
What sky island are you from, Pit? Your wings seem bigger than the ones from the citizens of Skypiea.
That sash looks valuable! Mmmm, I miss that beautiful sky gold...
That golden sash must be expensive, right Pit? I still remember we got a lot of money from selling that sky gold.
You sure have a lot of weird artifacts. I have a friend who'd probably like to examine them.
I was wondering what that weird device is. Well, it doesn't matter if you're taking it off.
Warmblood? Oh, you're probably different from the Minks that live at Zou, so you have a different name for your race.
For a tough looking guy you sure wear a lot of accessories. What's up with that?
I somehow doubt that's actually gold. But I would still like to confirm it.
What's all this talk about booty? I sure not turning my back with you here.
Is that your weapon?
DAMMIT, BROCK!

case.state: WHAT DID I JUST SAY?!

state.text: Hmmm, I was just going to ask about those keys... Of course, they must open something very important, right? And there's so many of them...
I noticed those keys right away... May I ask what they open? Maybe a treasure chest... No, a lot of treasure chests?

case.state: Heh, I think I'd look good in a skin tight cat costume. What do you think, Cat Noir?
Mmmm, I bet you're not the only one who looks good in a cat costume, Cat Noir. I'm sure I'd look even cuter inside a skin tight feline suit.

state.text: Hey, where are you going? Come back here! She just left...
Where do you think you're going, Perona! Come back here, right now!

case.state: Is that all? Are you sure?
I knew you were going to count your measly ~clothing~.
Alright. If that's how you wanna play, I'll rise up to the challenge.
Oh, so that's how it's gonna be, huh? Fine.
What? Hmph...
This is annoying. Almost as annoying as Luffy when he's hungry.
Oh, you're taking that off? So I guess you don't really care if it gets "lost"...
You're taking that off now? You're more unpredictable than the Grand Line...
Ugh, for once I was hoping you'd take off something else.
Still with the ~clothing~?! Grrr...
Could you sink any lower?!
You're pushing my temper to new limits...
Of course you're taking off your ~clothing~. Why are you like that?
Your ~clothing~... what a crappy move.
That's it? Is that seriously, it?!
Why are men so insensitive...?
Inconsiderate jerk!
I swear, men make an even bigger deal than women about showing a little skin.
Figures you're trying to grasp every small opportunity you have to show less skin.
I know I shouldn't care about the game anymore, but something about this really pisses me off!
This is just sad. I don't look cute when I cry, you know?
Are you trying to make fun of me? I think you are...

state.text: Oh, well... I guess our Ghost Girl couldn't take the stress from this game, after all. I don't blame her.
It seems like Perona wasn't able to handle this game in the end, so she decided to leave. Don't think any less of her, please.
Of course you got dizzy! You were flying around like a cannonball. It doesn't seem like you're going to apologize, so I'll do it for you: She's sorry.
Do you feel better now? Sure, you're dizzy. What did you think would happen? At least you didn't hit your head.

case.state: I swear, if you bump your head somewhere I'm not gonna bother... Ah...!
If you keep flying like that, you're gonna bump into someone! You better don't cry when... Ah...!

state.text: You're kidding, right? You don't look like someone who comes from outside this planet. I-I just guess I'd expect them to have weirdly shaped heads, or something...
For real? Normally I wouldn't believe that, but I don't get the sense that you're lying... How could you even travel here from that far away?
I think I understood like 50% of that... Okay, more like 20%.
That's true... Although most people think my Clima-Tact is just a baton. They don't take me seriously until they see me in action.
Can't argue with that. But unlike your huge revolver, my Clima-Tact looks like a baton. People don't really fear me until I use it on them.
Your belts disappeared. Is that an ability? But how...?
(Is he stopping time or something? No, that would be too far-fetched and terrifying for a Devil Fruit ability.)
And I thought I'd have a chance to relax in this game without dealing with weird individuals.
Wow, a sky archipelago! I'd love to see it one day, but there's no way I'm going to the White Sea through the Knock Up Stream again.
A sky archipelago! That must be a sight to behold. But if I ever go above the clouds again, I hope it's through a different route. The Knock Up Stream almost killed us.
Don't worry, I have no intention of stealing it. No matter how expensive it looks.
I'm not gonna steal it from you. I'm just kidding. Ah... But I do miss looking for sky treasures.
That card isn't from this game, dummy. I have a feeling you won't last long.
You have nice eyes. Why would you want to hide them?
What kind of sword is that? It emits light. Zoro would probably be freaking out if he saw it.
How can you be so careless with that thing? It's a mystery to me how you're still alive.
This isn't the first time this has happened, is it? sigh

case.state: Well, as long as I haven't lost a round yet...
It's no big deal, I guess. But if things go south for me later, I'll remember this, ~name~,
Next time I lose, I'm taking off my bracelet. Let's see if you like that.
If I lose another round, I'll take off my bracelet. It's only fair, after all.
Maybe next time you'll remove something bigger and stop wasting our time. Wouldn't that be special?
You seem to be determined to extend this game as much as you can. What's your deal, ~name~?
Everyone seems to be conspiring to make this game as long as they can.
Good thing I'm used to dealing with weird individuals. I bet you're no different, ~name~.
Alright, I don't have to worry about what you take off. I'll just focus on defeating you enough times.
Okay, I guess I don't have to play fair if you won't. I'm a pirate after all, remember?
When I get my Clima-Tact back, I'm gonna summon a storm to follow you around.
Great, now I'm in a bad mood.
You know, if you were a little nicer to other people, they might treat you better too.
You won't earn any points with me by acting like a jerk.
That's it, ~name~! I'm going to kick your ass! In the game, I mean. Unless you provoke even more...
I hope your dream is becoming fish food, ~name~, because I'm gonna make it come true!
I'll kill you after the game!
It's just your body. Are you really ashamed of it?
Whatever, it's not like I want to see you naked.
Maybe I should steal all your clothes before I leave. That would be a fitting end for you, ~name~.
I bet you think you're so funny with your goofy ~clothing~. Oh, it's not a joke? Then forget I said anything.
I think it'd be very ironic if someone stole all your clothes except for your ~clothing~. Hey, you'd still have something to wear at least.

state.text: Hey, stop flying around! You're bothering everyone and you're making me dizzy.
What are you doing?! Just stay in your spot! If you keep flying around like that you're gonna bump into someone.
What are you waiting for, ~player~? Help her.
Woah! What's happening? It suddenly got a little too cold in here.
Oh yeah?! What about that invisible creep that tried to get his hands on me and even force me to marry him?
How can you defend them?! Especially that invisible bastard that tried to force me to marry him!
He didn't just tell me, he bragged about it for days! It was kinda hard to get him to shut up about it.
Yeah, he talked about how he "kicked your butt" for a looong time. It was pretty obnoxious, to be honest.
Oh, are you guys... together? I guess it would make sense.
A man and a woman, living together in a castle... I take it you two are together, right?
Eh? Where did she go?
Hey, have a little respect. Not only for us, but for yourself too.
Ahhhhh!!! I hate bats!
Ah, my eyes!
Ah...! What is that light?!
Yeah... But the other Neptune is a king and a very nice guy too, so not really a bad person to share a name with. No matter how funny it is, heheh...
The Neptune I know is a king... Oh, but he's still a good guy. If you have to share a name with someone, he's not a bad match. It's still a little funny, though. Heheh...
Oh, I don't think he was named after you. I don't know his age, but he looked kind of old... I'd say at least 70.
Oh, but he wasn't young as you. He looked like he was in his 70s... Maybe his 80s? He has a big beard, so...
That place sounds awful! At least when he did the same thing to me later, he sent me to a better place. You probably made him angry.
Doesn't sound like an island I'd want to visit. Why didn't he have the courtesy of sending you to a better place? I don't think you annoyed him that much.
Good for you! The Florian Triangle is a horrible place... So terrifying, and gloomy.
Wherever you're living now, it's gotta be better than the Florian Triangle. If there's one place I don't want to visit again, it's that horrifying, dark sea.
Why would you be wearing a witch costume if you're not a girl playing around?
Oh, you're not a kid? I just thought, given your size and the witch costume...
Another world...?! But... Huh...? W-What's this world you're talking about like?
Did you say another world? But how...? Ummm... What kind of world are you from, Ringo?
Oh, so it's not blood. That's a relief... Wait, what do you mean red like your soul? Souls have colors?
A red soul? Souls have colors? I'm not sure what that means, but I'm glad it's not blood.
Oh, I wasn't referring to your height. More like your... Umm... Y-You're very pretty!
Hmm? Oh, yes. I guess you're tall too. But I was talking about your... A-About how pretty you are!

You don't need to get so defensive, I was just curious. There's nothing wrong with taking some time to yourself, especially when you spend every waking minute with others. But maybe you can make new friends here...

I did come here on my own to take some time away from my friends. That doesn't mean I don't love them, you just need some time to yourself every now and then. And this might be a good place for you to find new friendships, right?
A pink hedgehog? That's adorable! You'd think I'd find that unusual, but I'm already friends with a humanoid reindeer, heheh...
Oh, a hedgehog! I've never met a pink hedgehog before... or one who can talk. Are your friends part animal too, Amy?
It's great that you found your vocation at a young age! I'm sure you'll do great with that enthusiasm. So do you already have any plans for after you graduate?
I'm sure it makes a big difference to have an role model in that career. My mom was in the military, but she retired so she could raise my sister and me. It's a tough life.
Thanks! Not that I think I'd need your services! I'm just curious. Heheheh...
Great, thanks! Oh, but I'm an upstanding citizen! I doubt I'll ever be in need of a lawyer, heheh...
Are you worried someone at your workplace mind find out that you participated in this kind of activity, Mia? I'm not what you'd call a traditional woman, and I'm still a little worried...
What if a rumor starts circulating at your workplace about you playing this game, Mia? Would you just quit and move to another country? I'm not sure I'd blame you...
Well, that's good! So what do you spend most of your money on? It's never a bad idea to save some of it...
G-Great...! Uhhh... Did you say some of your bounties die? Does that mean you can't turn them it? But those posters do say "Dead or Alive"... I-I am not giving you any ideas, I hope!
Artificial wings? That's amazing! Did you build those yourself? I don't think I've ever heard of something like that existing.
Are you serious? You explain it so casually, but I'd never imagined that someone could build an actual pair of wings! Did you make them?
Let's see... There's Chopper, my crew's doctor. He's a reindeer. I also once met a doctor who lived inside a whale. Then there's Traffy, who can remove a person's heart without killing them...
That sounds impressive! Can you cure any type of wound? If I was fighting on your team, I wouldn't move from your side, heheh...
That's so unfair... Wait, so you still gotta work out? You can't, like... change your appearance at will? If you could, then maybe there would be a part of your body you'd want to change, am I wrong?
Hmmm... So being a goddess doesn't mean you can't change your appearance any way you want? Huh... If you could, would you like to change anything about your body?
A request? Heheh, sure... Should I tell you what I can do first? I don't want to disappoint you... Well, just tell me your request anyway, but keep your expectations low.
You have a request for me? Sure, you can ask... N-Now I'm a little nervous. What if I can't fulfill it? Well, I can hear it at least...
Creatures from the dark? I'm not sure I wanna hear about them, but I feel like I have to... If they even make you worry, then I should probably know about them.
Wh-What kind of creatures? You look strong, and you're still wary of them, so I feel like I should be too...
So Alola is an archipelago? I love warm regions, so I'd love to visit one day... Ummm, these beaches are not nudist beaches though, right?
So you really love your work, huh? Wait, did you say you went on strike? Why was that? Bad working conditions? Unfair compensations?
Well, don't work yourself too hard, Wiki... Uh, did you say "strike"? Can I ask why that was? If you're so workaholic, it must've been something serious.
You must be quite wealthy... Am I right, Cynthia? Few things say fancy like a nice looking scarf.
That scarf looks expensive, Cynthia. Do you happen to be wealthy, by any chance?
I wasn't scared of statues at first, but then I saw one come to life in a haunted castle, and... Wait, it wasn't a statue. it was a painting. Maybe I'm just scared of art in general.
It's probably because one time, a living statue started chasing me... Or was it a painting? Ah, yes... I guess you could say I've had bad experiences with art coming to life.
1970's... Oh, come on. You're making it sound like some futuristic thing. So how do you play video games? Is it with chips? Ropes? Cards too?
Uhhh... I definitely haven't heard about them. And I know all the modern card and board games... Okay, I don't really know them. But how different can these video games be? How do you play them?
Oh, your face lit up when you mentioned your sister. She clearly means a lot to you. Do you think about her often?
Sharena? So you do have friends who care about you. I'm sure that's the case if she wants to see you smile more. What's she like?
Seriously? That doesn't sound very believable... How real is it? Can you feel pain there?
A world created through technology? That's crazy! But it can't be too close to reality, right? Like, can you experience pain there?
I do feel more relaxed seeing how sweet you two look together. It's nice to know that love isn't determined by how, ummm... "alive" both parts are.
You're really into each other, huh? That's heart-warming... I never knew that love could even transcend death, I guess.

case.state: Hang on there, I wasn't born yesterday... You weren't just pretending to be bad at poker so we'd go easy on you, right? Because if that's the case...
Are you trying to take advantage of my generosity? Nice try, lady! But if you're only putting on an act, we're gonna have a different conversation.

state.text: Hey, if they're okay with me making it rain here, they should also be okay with their stuff getting a little wet. We all should, in fact.
What the...? Your outfit...
Huh?! You clothes...
AHHHH!!! What is that on your back?!
That bag doesn't look expensive, but...
It is tight. And if I may say it, it's riding a little high on the back.
So that's your natural hair? Sorry, I didn't mean to imply it's weird, or anything. It's actually very normal and... pointy.
Oh, I have a friend who fights using kicks. (Look at those legs...)
That choker... It doesn't look very valuable. Does it have some special meaning to you?
I just need to make sure, but you have nothing to do with Buggy the clown, do you?
Wow. You look innocent and cute, but you're actually a pervert, aren't you?
Eh? What happened to you?
Not a Mink, huh? Then are you a Devil Fruit user...?
Are you really gonna keep your camera? Why? Y-you're not gonna use it, right? Heheh...
Oh, a ladybug! That's makes more sense. Wait, is that a yo-yo? I'm more confused now.
Oh, you're a ladybug! I don't know why I thought you were a strawberry... I still don't understand the yo-yo, though.
So... how come you can fly? Devil Fruit? Science? Some sort of illusion?
You clearly don't look like a conventional pirate, but you still have a sort of eye patch, heheh.
That's a very... unconventional outfit for a pirate. But hey, at least you're wearing an eyepatch. Kinda...
Nice beret. Maybe I should get myself one. Oh, but is it part of your uniform?
Yeah, very manly... I'm sure you're the envy of every man, Ping.
You're the picture of manliness, Ping. I'm sure you have a lot of... ummm... hair on your chest.
Those aren't emeralds, are they? There's so many...
Oh, sorry! You just seem a lot younger at first glance.
I didn't mean to imply I have a problem with that. I just don't want to you get in trouble with your boss.
So do you live on a Sky Island? Is it on the Grand Line?
(She's wearing all these expensive looking accessories... But she's a goddess... But they look so valuable...)
This is why you brought your butler? Talk about spoiled...
He-hey, nice tattoo you have there, sister. I have one too, see? On my left shoulder?
Hi...! Revy, right? Ummm, that's a nice tattoo you have there. I have one too. We have something in common!
So... two guns, huh? Is one not enough?
Two guns seems like overkill to me. You only need one to kill people, right?
Oh, Luffy is my captain. He can also stretch his arms, since he's pretty much made of rubber.
Why is she on the floor taking off your shoes? I thought she was your friend, but she's acting more like a slave.
Mako!
You don't have any grenades in there, right? What if one goes off?
FIRE! Let me use my Clima-Tact to extinguish it!
Hey, that's your head!
It doesn't look like one of the ghost of that girl from Thriller Bark, but it has a knife...
This thing you call Quirk is your Devil Fruit ability, right? It must be a cultural difference, like how in Wano they call them sorcery.
Ohhh, very rich! That necklace looks expensive...
Your hairpins? But you're in your underwear! And...
Just the ribbon? Come on, you can do better than that.
You have a toy wand and all. That's kind of adorable.
So that's where all those fries are going...
You probably eat a lot of fries to get this... form.
Are you just using made up words to try to sound smarter?
Those gauntlets look really valuable. They must be made of silver, right?
It's a very pretty hat! Did your mom make it for you?
I honestly like your hat? Did you mom make it? My mom made clothes for me all the time when I was a kid.
That sun symbol on your armor... What does it mean? It reminds me of a similar symbol, but it's not exactly the same.
Oh, so your shoes are supposed to be of different color! I thought you'd made a mistake when you put them on, but I didn't want to say anything.
Those muscles might rival Zoro's.
So you're a video transmission, or something? But I don't see a Transponder Snail anywhere.
Oh, and more important question: Can you make money with videogames?
Who's this LeChuck? Name doesn't ring a bell.
I know, taking off your shoes while wearing a skirt is the worst.
Magatama... So that's what that's called. I could swear I saw it glowing a little...
A Magatama? What a strange stone. Was it just my imagination, or did it glow a bit earlier?
Not that there is anything wrong with it. It's just that the guys are always thrilled over stuff like that, but I've never seen the appeal.
Right, you don't need a gun here.
I can't believe you'd rather show your whole body than take off your sunglasses first.
I've met so many people who can fly one way or another that it doesn't surprise me anymore.
Scarf and cleavage, asymmetrical socks... You have an interesting sense of fashion, Yang.
Oh, did that thing run out of batteries?
Are you gonna do it again?
Oh... Don't tell me you're... bald.
I can't believe even this establishment is putting limitations on your behavior. Just goes to show how much of a deviant you are.
Oh... I wonder how many times they've enforced this rule in this establishment. You're definitely a special case, so...
How many times is this going to repeat? I won't remind you next time. Maybe then you'll get kicked out...
Can we get someone else to take this girl's clothes off for her? Uhhh, any volunteers?
I can only imagine what sort of sick things you keep in that bag.
Take off your bag. Just please, for everything that is holy, don't show us what's in there.
A utility belt? Like you keep gadgets in there, and stuff?
You forgot you've been seeing orange the whole game?
V-vampires? What are you talking about? Vampires are not real...
Manni Katti? Is that the name of your sword?
#98? How many of these things have you made?
Hey, hats are important for some people.
That could've saved you some time of being exposed, but I don't think it'll make much of a difference in the end.
I'm sure I'd have been a good model.
Hey! I was just trying to be nice. If you want to look like you've been living inside your room for a year, fine by me!
I wasn't saying anything terrible! I was just concerned for you. You shouldn't spend every day inside your room, for your health.
Those are called crocs? Are they made of crocodile skin, or something?
Do I want to know what sort of dangerous stuff you keep in there?
So this Vault you're hunting... How much stuff does it contain? It must be very valuable if it's so rare to find, right?
Did you say key? For what? Could it be a secret treasure?
Franky looks way more robotic than you, and he's still more human than machine... I think.
I hope that's the only use you have for that knife.
Ah, you're using the knife to... cut your belt. Better than stabbing someone, I guess.

case.state: I didn't know what to expect when I came here, but it sure wasn't this.

state.text: What good is wearing that box if it doesn't even hide your panties?
Android, T-Doll... All of those sound like synonyms for "danger", in my opinion.
Okay... Is nobody else going to ask? Uhhh, what's with the four arms?
I... don't know what that is. But what's with the four arms?
Scarf and cleavage, asymmetrical socks... You have an interesting sense of fashion, Yang.
You're wearing an interesting outfit, Yang? Did you pick it yourself? Your socks don't match...

case.state: Was this friend also the one that convinced you that you're a wizard? Geez, some girls can be so mean...
Did this friend manipulate you into believing you're a wizard too? That's one of the meanest pranks I've ever heard of.

state.text: Yeah, I'm telling you. That's probably a Devil Fruit ability. You maybe didn't even realize that you ate one.
I know. I saw you do it earlier. That's gotta be because of a Devil Fruit. Don't you remember eating a weird fruit at one point?
Do you also have a hybrid form, Yuelia? Something that is halfway through between human and butterfly?
Zoan Devil Fruit users have hybrid forms. Do you have one, Yuelia? Something closer to your human form, but with the wings?
Ahahaha... (Gosh, now there's two of them...) Is there a reason why you enjoy making puns so much, Yang?
Haha...ha... (I haven't heard that one...) When did you start making puns, Yang? Was there a reason for it?

case.state: So it really is blood? Ummm... As long as it's not human blood, then maybe it's fine. I'm just glad you're taking it off.
Is it really blood, then? I'm not sure I want to know more about what it means... I'll just assume it's not human blood.

state.text: You probably don't keep anything valuable in that bag, right? Seeing as how you're taking it off first, without a second thought...
What do you keep in that bag? Supplies, food...? Nothing valuable, then.
Secrets...? You already seem to know about my... occupation. I hope that's what you meant, because I have no more secrets.
Me? Secrets? I guess you mean me being part of a crew of you-know-whats... I thank you for not mentioning it. But I don't have any more secrets, if that's what you're implying.
Secrets...? You all already know that I'm a pirate. I hope that's what you meant, because I have no more secrets.
Me? Secrets? I guess you mean me being part of pirate crew, but you already know that... I thank you for not mentioning it. I don't have any more secrets, if that's what you're implying.
Oh... Well, at least you can cover that scar with your bangs. Problem solved, right?
Your... name is Default? I-I'm sure your parents had their reasons.
I don't know why... Maybe you just seemed too friendly? That's not a bad thing, right?
Don't beat yourself up. Maybe you just give a very nice vibe that doesn't seem very deadly.
Don't call me greedy. I thought you'd be happy if we could both do something for each other. But maybe I can ask for something else... I guess a massage would be nice?
I thought that was how it works... Quid pro quo, and all that. But if I can't ask for riches, then... I'd like a massage. My shoulders are a little stiff.
Hey, where are you going? Come back here! She just left...
Where do you think you're going, Perona! Come back here, right now!
Why didn't you take this off before showing your other parts? I don't understand.
Alright. You clearly don't care about what to show first.
If only you'd had this when you still weren't naked. Oh, wait, you did. Then...
Really? But why did you have to be naked before you remove your ~clothing~? You're weird.

case.state: I see you came prepared to lose a few rounds, ~name~. Smart.
Hey, I bet you wore that just in case you lost a few rounds, you clever girl.
Did everyone come overly accessorized in preparation for losing?
Your ~clothing~? You do what you can, sister.
Oh, your ~clothing~. I see, I see...
I bet you're going to remove your... ~clothing~! Ah, see? I was right.
What do you call that? Oh, right.. Your ~clothing~.
Your ~clothing~, huh? Okay, okay... I'm not gonna say anything.
I know I removed my Log Pose last time, which is also small. But it's really valuable.
Are you waiting for me to complain about this even though I removed a small item last time too? I don't care, I'll still do it.
I liked you when I first saw you, ~name~. But you're really pushing it!
Just what are you up to, ~name~?
You think I can't figure out your game, ~name~? Huh? Well... Umm...
Ugh... I can't help but feel this is my fault for not bringing more accessories.
If only I'd been wearing more clothes. I should've expected my sense of fashion wouldn't help me in this game.
Everybody thought about wearing accessories except for me. Well, I did have my Log Pose. And my belt...
I know what I'm going to do with your ~clothing~. I'll steal ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ and sell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ to anyone at a very cheap price!
How would you feel if I steal your ~clothing~ and sell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ to the first person who wants ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~?
Wouldn't it be fun if someone stole your ~clothing~ and sold ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~? If it was me, I wouldn't even ask more than a measly price for ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
Why are you taking that off now? Are you mocking me?
You think you can make fun of me by removing your ~clothing~ now?!
I'm not used to smacking women, but I'm considering making an exception.
If I'd come here covered in accessories, I would probably still be playing.
I'm a fashionable woman, and I still don't wear this many accessories.
Where did you buy that, ~name~? I would love to go there, buy 100 of them, come back here and win this stupid game!
Hmm, you sure held on to your ~clothing~ for a long time. It must be valuable, huh?
I wasn't paying much attention to the items back when I was playing the game, but some of them look very valuable.
This place would be a perfect target for an skilled thief. Good thing there isn't one among us.

state.text: Oh, well... I guess our Ghost Girl couldn't take the stress from this game, after all. I don't blame her.
It seems like Perona wasn't able to handle this game in the end, so she decided to leave. Don't think any less of her, please.

case.state: I swear, if you bump your head somewhere I'm not gonna bother... Ah...!
If you keep flying like that, you're gonna bump into someone! You better don't cry when... Ah...!

state.text: Of course you got dizzy! You were flying around like a cannonball. It doesn't seem like you're going to apologize, so I'll do it for you: She's sorry.
Do you feel better now? Sure, you're dizzy. What did you think would happen? At least you didn't hit your head.
So you're a Devil Fruit user who can control ice? But this isn't the first time I've met someone with that ability...
That bastard... I wish I could zap him again. Can you imagine me marrying someone like that? Or getting married at all? It's not for me.
Yeah... No way I'd ever marry a man like that. Or anyone really, at least for a loooong time.
Wait, wouldn't that make him vulnerable to your ability? That's gotta be the most selfish reason why someone would wish another person well.
Huh, that's nice of you... Wait, that would make him vulnerable to your ghosts! That's just selfish.
Well, very nice of him to let you live in his castle for no reason. He's probably a decent guy.
Oh, either way... It's very nice of him to let you live with him. If it was me, I'd at least make you pay rent.

case.state: You tried to run away?! That does it, I won't feel sorry for you anymore.
Delete what? Your shoes? What are you talking about?

state.text: You're not very bright, are you? Kinda like a female Luffy...
A butterfly that transforms into a woman is easier for me to swallow than an actual talking butterfly, for some reason.
Ummm, so the butterfly was a woman... I'm okay with that. I'd have more questions if there was an actual talking butterfly.
That's a good goal, there can never be enough doctors. If it wasn't for Chopper, my crew's doctor, I'd have died a long time ago.
Maybe I should tell Luffy and the others about it. Becoming temporary Vault Hunters sounds like a fun and rewarding detour.
Hmmm, he'd probably see the humor in it... Honestly, I think the name Neptune suits you better. It sounds kinda girly.
He'd most likely laugh. I never thought about it until now, but Neptune does sound like a girl name. I think it suits you better than him.
Are you serious? You don't look much older than King Neptune's daughter... Is it okay to ask you how old you are?
For real? But you seem to be around the same age as King Neptune's daughter... C-can I ask you how old you are?
I see... There's no accounting for taste, I suppose.
Ah... okay. So maybe Kuma did you a favor by sending you to a place you'd like.
Stop! Why do you gotta be so weird? Talking about creepy stuff so casually...
Enough! I don't wanna hear about stuff like that. Why can't you be normal for once, and talk about nice things?
I've never heard of that place. Do you know on which sea it is? If you do, maybe I can find it in one of my maps.
I don't think I remember seeing that town in one of my maps, but if you know the sea, or the island it's on, I might be able to help you.
Uhhh, yeah. Sometimes. I guess it's normal when you're... ummm, "pretty".
Well... It's not uncommon. It's just natural for us... "pretty" girls.
That sounds awfully similar to Big Mom's ability to remove people's souls and put them into inanimate objects. I've had enough of that horror for a lifetime.
That reminds me of Big Mom's Soul Soul Fruit... Brrrr, just being able to manipulate human souls like that is terrifying.
How much does a Magatama go for these days? I've never heard of such a thing, so it must be rare... And expensive... W-Wait, did you say "ghost"?
It's gotta be valuable, right? A one-of-a-kind, maybe? That would mean it's very expensive... Uhhh... d-did I hear you right? You said "ghost"?
Upstanding citizens, huh...? What about people that might be criminals according to the law, but are actually really nice human beings... Would you defend them?

case.state: I see... What if the law says someone is guilty, but they're good people, who do good deeds? Would you help people like that, Mia?

state.text: What do you expect to gain from this game? If you're after the money too, you better give up. I'd say you have a better chance of making a new friend here than getting that cash.
I hope you're not expecting to earn the prize money, Ayano. That's already mine. But if there's anything else you're after, I wish you the best.
That's kinda sad. I know that members of the Mink race are very proud of their fur. I don't know what you looked like before, but I can assure you you're very cute now.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope your friends don't treat you any different now, because you're crazy cute.
Even alligators? I don't remember seeing half human, half reptiles before... I hope you all get along, and you don't have the predators raising trouble.
Alligator people? I didn't know there's also a race of reptile humans somewhere... Hopefully you don't have conflicts among yourselves with all kinds of animal people living together.
I've never heard of Overwatch. I hope you guys use that technology for a good purpose, because in the wrong hands it could be terrifying.
Overwatch... So there's a group of people with access to this type of equipment. Thankfully, you guys use it for good... right? I don't want bad guys to have this power.
For real? If you're the healer of the group, it makes perfect sense to stay close to you. Aren't your teammates professionals? What other dumb stuff do they do?
Are you serious? I'm no soldier, but it just makes sense to me to stay close to you if you're the healer. Is that the only complaint you have about your teammates, Angela?

Actually, it looked surprisingly normal inside the whale. It took us a minute to realize we were swallowed. But the doctor was living there to treat the giant whale from the inside. He was a nice guy.
Haha, not at all! Chopper is actually the one that causes the least amount of trouble... which is very ironic, now that I think about it. He spends most time studying and taking care of his herbs.
It's his Devil Fruit ability, but I guess it takes a lot of skill to use it properly... He even once had me and my friends switch bodies. I'm still not sure if I've forgiven him for that experience.
I agree! I can't transform my body, or anything. But even if I could, I wouldn't. No matter how many times people mention how big my boobs are.
I feel the same way. People always tell me that my boobs are too big, but if I had a choice I still wouldn't change them. I like them, and that's what's important!
Well, even if you were filthy rich, I wouldn't steal from you. You seem nice... And I'm not a thief! Of course not...
Hmmm, no matter how rich you are, I still wouldn't steal from you... Or anyone! Because I'm not a thief, heheh...
Not at all. Now that I've talked to you, you seem to me like a very nice a soothing presence. I'm sorry again for screaming, especially if that's the way people usually react when they see you.
Oh, don't worry! I just feel bad for screaming. You seem a lot more pleasant than a lot of people I've met. Is it common for people to be afraid of you at first glance?

A rainbow is caused by the reflection and refraction of the light in raindrops. For it to happen twice... If it's at the right angle, a double rainbow should be visible. If we find an open area with lots of sunlight, I should be able to do it!
