A double rainbow... It would depend on the angle, the area, the amount of sunlight, and the size of the water droplets... But yes! I should be able to create one. That's a relief.
Oh no... Nooo... I don't think I'm gonna be able to sleep tonight. How do you sleep at night, Lux? Is there a secret?
Oh, I immediately regret asking you... I don't know how I'm gonna sleep after hearing this. What do you do, Lux? Don't tell me you only sleep during the day...
Console...? Controls...? Oh, so you control something with buttons and stuff? Like a robot? I don't really know much about that sort of thing, but sounds like something the guys would be into.
I don't know what a PC is, but you mentioning controls reminds me of robots. If it's something like that, the guys would probably like to play these videogames.
I'm not sure I got that right, but you were protesting against an act to stop piracy? Uhhh... Well, piracy clearly didn't stop, so I guess you got what you wanted... right?

Wait... So you were protesting against people who wanted to stop piracy? Don't you think piracy is bad? I mean, not every pirate is terrible, but protesting in their defense seems more controversial than against them.
That doesn't sound like a great experience. Aren't games supposed to be fun? Why would you want to play something like that?
I don't think that's a game I'd like to play. Why are people drawn to it? Is it still fun for them?
That's a Devil Fruit ability, right? Transforming clothes... It's kinda like Kin'emon's.
That's gotta be a Devil Fruit ability. To change clothes in an instant... It's a little like Kin'emon's ability, but probably better.
So you are a Devil Fruit user? A snake woman, or something?
How expensive would you say it is, exactly?
Fine! You know what? Your leotard is skimpy, and your ass is completely exposed. Happy?
If I did, would my legs become as... strong as yours?
Sentimental value is not something you can understand unless you feel it. I would never steal something that important to another person.
His red nose is real, can you believe that?. What a freak... I'm happy Luffy kicked his ass.
I don't know that many perverted woman, and it's a little baffling to meet one that looks like she jumped out of a children's book.
Don't shoot right next to me, you crazy woman!
Hey! Don't just drop that, it's a loaded gun!
Not a Devil Fruit user either? Then... what are you?
I have nothing personal against your look, but I don't like bugs very much.
I think I preferred thinking you were a fruit. I'm not very fond of bugs in general...
Fair enough. I guess there isn't such a thing as a conventional pirate. Still, there's something different about you.
Good point. You'd think that after seeing pirate clowns, zombies and dinosaurs I would know better. But I feel that you're different from them in some way...
Where do you work, Misato? That's a cute uniform.
(I don't know why she's disguised herself, so I'm not gonna try to blow her cover.)
(I'm not gonna be the one to ruin her disguise. Maybe she has a good reason for it.)
It was just a misunderstanding. I didn't mean to comment on your small size...

case.state: I, uhh, have a question, Palutena. As a goddess, how would you punish a human for stealing?

state.text: You have hands, don't you? You don't need someone else to undress you just because you're rich.
Y-your tattoo is better than mine. I wasn't trying to compare mine with yours.
I... I wasn't trying to imply that my tattoo is as nice as yours! If anything, yours is better. Ye-yeah...
W-Well, one of my crew mates uses three swords, which is a lot weirder. So...
Uh... Zoro uses three swords. Three swords is even weirder than two guns, so I should probably keep my mouth shut.
Well, not only his arms. He can stretch anywhere. Wow, that sounded kinda dirty...
So your school still makes you wear a tie even though you can't take it off by yourself? That doesn't make sense.
Stripping together, huh? That's some friendship.
She's fine? That really scared me, I thought you hit her with the sword for a second.
You don't have any other weapons hidden, right? I mean, if you're going to be drinking...
What? You did that on purpose? Didn't you receive any burns?
Ghosts without knives are still scary...
I've met Devil Fruit users who can float before. Could it be your outfit that allows you to fly and you're just pretending it's you who's doing it?
Are you looking for new friends, Weiss? Me too! You can call me Big Sister Nami.
Well, if they're expensive hairpins, I guess I can forgive you. Your hair looks great, by the way!
Oh, you're actually removing something else too. I honestly didn't think you would.
I mean... what a nice wand! You must be able to do all kinds of magic with that! (She seems like a nice girl, I'll just play along with her fantasy.)

case.state: And that lasso is so shiny... Is it gold?

state.text: It would've been a little ironic for a model to put on different shoes by accident.
But Zoro is training whenever he isn't sleeping. How did you get like that?
I'm sorry, Alpha. But I understand half of the stuff you say.
I had enough creepy stuff for a lifetime back in Thriller Bark.
I should definitely look into it.
I don't recognize these names. I wonder what sea you come from... It's a big world out there.
Wow... Just when I thought we had something in common, Velma.
But who knows? Maybe if I learn more about it I'll like it too.
Just put your equipment down carefully. And far away.
Even Franky takes off his glasses every now and then, and he wears only briefs.
I still would like to try it once.
Oh, I'm not saying I don't like it. In fact, I might try a similar look later.
I don't see how that staff could be a weapon. But I also have a weird looking weapon, so I shouldn't judge.
Whoa, you hat turned into butterflies! It's... beautiful.
They're so pretty... Can I touch one?
That's what you were hiding? Those ears are so cute! C-can I touch them?
Getting dropped on the head as a baby is a serious thing...
Can we call this girl's parents and ask them to come pick her up? It just feels like the right thing to do.
They should lock you up at the last level of Impel Down... Maybe even that wouldn't be enough.
You are the kind of person that should have a wanted poster... I think 3 billion beli would be a good bounty for you.
This is the first time I've met such a pervert girl. But even when it's guys, they can still keep it in their pants most of the time.
Guys who are perverts make me mad. I guess now I know that when it's a girl, I just feel sad for them...
I guess mine is no different. But I'm not a spy.
That suit really covers your whole body. It could be paint and we wouldn't even notice.
Don't scare me like that. Vampires don't exist. They don't exist...
I've never understood why people name their weapons. It's just a tool... Should I name my Clima-Tact?
As long as nothing explodes, I'm fine with them not working.
That's a cute hairstyle. Maybe I should try it sometime.
I saw that bow, but I just assumed it was too important for you to take it off.
I mean, still. I still could be a model, I'm not old.
You can't tell me not to worry and then say you have something called a Deathtrap! What even is that?

case.state: Umm... That's a... considerate employer you have.

state.text: (I wonder what she's thinking about...)
(What's going through her head right now?)
Your skirt fell off. So, going back to this key and treasure...

case.state: How do we know you don't have an infinite amount of items inside that box? If you mysteriously remove another tie, I'm personally unboxing you.
Scraping your legs from all the crawling around, hiding inside a box... Sounds more like something a snake would do.

state.text: I'm sure it would be practical to have four arms, but I just find it creepy. Probably because of my fear of spiders.
There's something so creepy about it... Maybe others will like that look, but for me they remind me of my crippling fear of insects... spiders, in particular.
Oh, I'm not saying I don't like it. In fact, I might try a similar look later.
Hahah, it must be nice to be so carefree... I like your style, but I have a feeling if I wore different shoes one day people would just think I wasn't paying attention to my clothes.

case.state: It's okay... Some people loving taking advantage of the more insecure just for entertainment.
I'm sorry... I don't appreciate bullying. Especially when it's against young, insecure, gullible girls.

state.text: Oh, you're so pretty! Seriously, that awful mask wasn't doing you any favors. If you have to hide your face, you can wear something better. But you shouldn't.
You're very cute! It's like day and night compared to that horrifying mask. Why would you hide such a pretty face?

case.state: Oh, I get it... This must be one of those "cosplaying" things. Okay, I'll humor you. Wow, you're an... Arc Wizard, or whatever! That's soooo amazing.

Oh, I think I understand. You must be one of those cosplayers I've heard about. I'll play along. What is it like being an... Arc Wizard? People from all over the world must bow down to your power, or something.

state.text: Hey, no need to feel embarrassed. Before long you're gonna miss the times when you mother made clothes for you to wear.

case.state: Don't be embarrassed, Megumin. I wish my mom was still around so she could make more clothes for me to wear.

state.text: Though I'm not sure what all the flashing and sparkles are all about. Probably just an effect of your ability?
I still don't understand where all those sparkles come from, or why you need to wave your rod. But I'm sure there's an explanation for that too.

case.state: Hey, if you can have a butt like that while stuffing your face with fries, I call that an absolute win!
Sorry, I wasn't trying to say anything bad. To be honest, I think you have a great butt. Sure, it's big, but it has a nice shape.

state.text: How would it attract...? I mean, it's not a terrible scar... But is someone actually into that?
Can't you talk... normal?
Well... Perhaps it's for the best that you don't look intimidating. Doesn't that make it easier for you to catch your target off guard?
Uhhh, okay... I'm sure you have an easier time infiltrating if you don't give off a deadly aura. Isn't that better?
Gold does make me very happy, but... I know there are more important things in life. It's just easier to focus on those that shine, and can be counted.
I know very well that there are better ways to be happy than being rich. Hell, I can never hold on to my treasure for long, and yet I'm still a happy girl most of the time.

case.state: But let's see if you can hold on to your accessories after losing over and over.
Just keep in mind that if you lose more and more, that won't make a difference.
I have a few accessories too, in case I lose once or twice. Looks like we had the same idea.
I don't blame you for not wanting to strip, but you gotta admit this is a little infuriating for us.
You're the kind that enjoys making new enemies, aren't you?
Now let's hope this doesn't come back to bite you in the ass. How, you ask? I wonder...
Hmmm, this is still kinda disappointing.
Earlier I would've found this amusing, but not anymore. It's time to get serious.
This makes me feel a little uneasy. And I'm usually the patient one in my crew.
I'm just saying if we're gonna play the game like this, we should just switch to regular Poker. It would be less of a hassle.
Ugh... Why is everyone like this?
I won't let this get to me. I'll prove it on the next round.
You never really know a person, do you?
Hey, maybe I have something in...? Hmph, what am I thinking? I don't even have pockets anymore...
Now I have no choice but to give it my best shot.
Hey, I'm still wearing my earrings! Oh, they don't count? Shoot...
No, what am I saying? I'll sell it at a good price, of course!
Hmmm, that's not true. I'll try to get as much out of it as I can.
Yeah, maybe 30,000 beli? No, 50,000!
There's so little difference in clothes between wearing a bikini and being naked, and yet it feels completely different.
Do this again, and I'll make you physically unable to get dressed by yourself.
Pray that nobody finds your body at the bottom of the sea 100 years from now, ~name~.
Okay, I'll just be the bigger person here and admire this move. Well played, ~name~.
(Hmmm, maybe I can snatch her ~clothing~ after the game is over and sell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~. Wouldn't that serve her right?)
Eh, whatever. It's not worth it. Water under the bridge, as they say.
Say, where are the items we stripped kept until the game is over? No reason for asking, just curiosity.
Would I still be playing the game if I'd taken off my bracelet and my Log Pose separately? We'll never know.
I bet you're too scared to strip another time, ~name~. Boooh...
Oh? This is definitely gonna get interesting. I may not be as experience at gambling as you, but I have a huge track record of taking money from swindlers. That's gotta count for something, right?
Heheh, we'll see... It's been a while since I took money from a swindler, but I doubt I've gotten rusty. And I don't think your gambling skills are gonna be of much use against me.

state.text: Are you flirting with me, Fate? Mmmm... Maybe if you win, you can ask me out for drink at a expensive bar. And maybe I'll say yes. Not like it would be much of an inconvenience if you get your hands on the prize, right?
Ahahahah... You got quite the charm, don't ya? It'd be hard to resist an invitation from such a delightful man. Especially if you also get your hands on the prize.

case.state: Is it really smart for a gambler to rely on luck so much? It's not like there's much you can do sometimes, but it's always better to have some control over the outcome.
Don't you feel helpless relying on good fortune so much? If you have honed your skills enough, maybe you wouldn't need to leave it up to luck. At least not all the time.
You can look if you want. If I'm enough to get your attention, then beating you should be a piece of cake.
Really? Do you see something you like? You can keep your eyes on me all you want, Fate. That just means you'll be looking at your cards less...

state.text: Oh, you're cute Plagg... Is there something you like besides cheese? Maybe I can give you something else.
Heheh, you're so cute, Plagg. Is cheese everything you care about? If you like something else, maybe I can help you.
Oh no... That sounds real! Aliens! Wh-What if they attack Earth? We gotta prepare! What's their weakness, Jim? Please, tell me it's something dumb like water...

Ah...! There are aliens out there?! They're gonna invade us, aren't they? W-We gotta start preparing right now! They can be killed, right? If they're weak against something that's everywhere, like water, I'll relax...
That cape is way too tacky for my taste, same as the glasses. I don't know why you saved it for last.
By any chance, that logo on your shirt isn't an emblem for some sort of organization, band, or... pirate crew, right?
What wrong with taking off the hat? It only covers your face. And if I may say it, it's not very stylish.
Please, vampires are not real. Heheheh...

case.state: Alright, if that's all you are capable of...
Psst, just what I was expecting.
Maybe you just want to feel more comfortable. That's why you're taking off your ~clothing~.
Sure, go ahead, get comfortable. It's better to feel good if you think you have a chance to win the game.
I'm so bored...
Why is this game moving so slowly now?
Your ~clothing~. huh? Is that your attempt to prolong your modesty, ~name~?
If that's your way to avoid getting naked...
Your ~clothing~, huh? Is that where you keep your money by any chance?
Hmmm, I wonder if you could keep your wallet hidden inside your ~clothing~, by any chance.
The odds are not in my favor anymore...
This is gonna be an uphill battle for me from now on.
Okay, we get it. You're taking off your ~clothing~. Now hurry up and do it.
Good, you're taking off your ~clothing~. It doesn't even look that good on you, anyway.
Oh, you're taking off your... ~clothing~.
So you're taking off your ~clothing~? Okay, okay.
Yes! Take that off, ~name~. You look good, as always.
Good, good. Time to strip, buddy.
Nice ~name~, ~clothing~... I mean, nice ~clothing~, ~name~, hahaha...

state.text: Are you sure you don't want a hug just so you can feel my breasts? Yeah, I know how men think.
No idea where it came from. I only know how to make items disappear...

case.state: Oh, I know that very well. That's why I'm taking this seriously. It will be hard to focus on the game, and making sure you don't cheat at the same time, but it has to be done.
Believe me, I'm very aware of that. Just make sure you don't cheat, huh? And if you, make sure you don't get caught by me. Or you might lose more than just your clothes.
Y-You've already seen more than you deserved... But I can still be the one who get the big prize in the end.
Y-You've gotten enough of eyeful to last you your whole life. But you still can lose more than I've had so far, and that's what I'll aim for.
This can go one of two ways, you know? Maybe I'll be the one looking at your naked body, though I would hardly call that a prize. But it's something...
Remember that you might lose your clothes before me, Fate. Then I'll be the one who gets the prize of seeing you naked, if you can call it that. But now I do feel a little curious...
I see... If it was that easy to seduce you, I wouldn't respect you as an opponent. This just makes things more interesting.
Sounds too much like superstition, if you ask me. Unless you're talking about cheating... Because I do believe in that, but I won't allow it!
I can't tell if you're just superstitious, or you're implying that you're cheating... Well, you did lose this round, so you can't be that good.

state.text: Weapons then... Cannons! Big cannons! These aliens can be blown up... right?
Then we're gonna need all the weapons we have! Could an alien withstand a cannonball? Definitely not two, right? Or three...?
(I hope this guy never meets Luffy and the others. They'd get along immediately, and then annoy me to no end.)
See? You're a lot cuter without the hat. Garchu!
Well, I guess I've seen other creepy stuff, so...

case.state: Don't think making that creepy face is going to scare me. I'm only scared of bugs, ghosts, zombies, monsters...
I bet you aren't capable of taking off something bigger next time you lose. If you want, prove me wrong.
This is boring. Let's just continue with the game.
I do feel lighter without my belt and my Clima-Tact. I don't blame you.
Make yourself at home, ~name~. Before you lose again...
To entertain myself, I'm gonna think about all the stuff I'm gonna buy with the prize.
Maybe I should come up with a game to distract myself from the real game. Like counting the times ~player~ does something dumb.
How many days has it been since it last rained? Hmmm...
This won't work, you know? I guess you can't know until you try.
You gotta do what you can, I suppose.
I'm kidding, I'm kidding! I'm not here to steal. (Unless I lose the game...)
No, don't tell me. I'd rather guess.
It's no good. But the only thing I can do, is try harder not to lose.
It's gonna be hard to win after this, but dammit if I'm not gonna give it my best shot!
I feel like such an idiot watching you strip while I'm all naked.
This game is not helping my attitude in any way.
What if... you take off something else? For me?
You're so cruel, ~name~.
Uhhh, this is so humiliating. I'm such an idiot.
So... how good is the security in this place? Hmmm...
(What would be the best route to escape from here after I take the money? I should figure that out now.)
How many security guards work here? Oh, it's just a question.

state.text: Sorry, I didn't mean to offend you... I'm just naturally skeptical. Uhh, do you have any duties as a goddess?
Oh, sorry if I offended you. Meeting a nice goddess is new for me. Are there any responsibilities that come with your... position?
Hey, don't just throw your coat away! It looks like it's of high quality.
Ah!!! A bee! Someone get it out of here!
Oh, really? I can't imagine ~player~ writing poetry, for some reason. What does ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ write about?
~Player~ is into poetry? Hahahah... Oh, sorry. What are ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ poems about, Yuri?
OH MY GOSH!!! HER HEAD...!!!

case.state: You really like ~player~, don't you? (I should be careful trying to seduce ~player~ into losing with her here...)

state.text: Are you gonna dance again...? Oh my... A monkey? Where did Shantae go?
How are you gonna take off your shoes while dancing? Huh? Where did this monkey come from?
Getting out of your comfort zone... I suppose there is nothing more uncomfortable than stripping in front of strangers, so you probably came to the right place.
That's a good reason. Sometimes you can fall into a rut if you do the same things every day. Not that i would know what that's like. My life is crazy.
I'm sorry, I'm afraid I haven't seen any of your movies. But if you have fans, then you must be very popular, huh? And rich?
Oh, I'm sorry, Jessie. I'm not into those movies. Not that there anything wrong with them, I just prefer using my imagination. But you must make a lot of money out of them, right?
Oh no, I'm not saying it's wrong. It was just an observation.
Nothing wrong with that, I just found it curious. Relax, ~marker.nickname~.
I believe I've heard of that style. Aren't you worried the meaning of your poems might be lost to some people if you rely too much on metaphors?
I think I know what you're talking about. It doesn't sound like it would be easy for just anyone to comprehend your poetry. Are you concerned that their meaning might fly over people's heads?
Underground?! I've never been to an underground country. How could there be life in a place without sun? W-Wait, did you say monsters?
An underground kingdom... And filled with monsters?! That sounds like a nightmare. How could there be life down there without the sun?
Oh, so you're more like a sports legend. Is that the main purpose of these Pokmon creatures? To fight each other? Sounds to me like that would be a morally gray area.

Wow, I'd never heard of Pokmon trainers until today, but that sounds impressive. I had not considered that Pokmon are used for competing in battles. Is that all they're used for? If they're sentient creatures, that sounds a little questionable...
Wait... They're not directions to some ancient hidden treasure, right? Sh-Should I be writing them down?
Relax, Saki. I was trying to say how nice it is that you can be yourself, not being peer pressured to act girly because it's expected of you.
You're just proving my point, Saki. You're a tomboy even though you hang out with girls. I'm a refined, girly girl even though I hang out with boys... And that's perfectly fine.
Wow, you sound totally smitten with him! And he knows that you like him? Maybe he's more into the sexy type than the cute one. Have you tried a different style, Amy?
Oh, I see this isn't just a simple crush... If he doesn't respond to your advances, maybe the cute style isn't what he's into. Have you tried a different look Amy? Like a more sexy one?
Stuff that has been written... This might be a good opportunity to learn more about our goals. What can you tell me about the "One Piece"?
Oh, I see... I kinda wanna test your knowledge. What information do you have on me? "Nami". Or "Cat Burglar Nami", as some people call me. I'm not self-indulgent, I'm just curious.
You sound like the kinky one to me! So... you're actually into that kind of stuff? I-Is that how you died? Doing something like... what was it again? Auto erotic asphyxiation...?

Oh, so you're a pervert... That makes you less scary, I guess. So if you're still into that sort of stuff, does that mean your body is solid? Uhhh, if not there wouldn't be a lot you can do to have fun.
You never get embarrassed? Really? Not even when your towel accidentally falls off in a bath house full of strangers, and you're the only one with her body exposed there?
Have you never really gotten embarrassed? What if you're the only naked person in a room full of strangers because your towel accidentally fell off? That's just a hypothetical situation...
So they're not from a Devil Fruit, or something? Then how did you get your powers? You weren't born with them, right?
I guess your ice powers couldn't be from a Devil Fruit, since Aokiji has that ability. How did you obtain that ability, then? You did get it from somewhere, right?
So you're still a fairly small band, huh? That's okay. We all gotta start somewhere. If you keep playing, you'll probably reach the ears of someone who can help you get famous.
There's no shame in starting small. As long as you're persistent, I'm sure you'll hit the jackpot at one point.
Oh, you can fly too? S-so what?
I completely forgot you have prosthetic legs. That's why you kept your socks on, huh?
I forgot about your legs... Now I understand why you didn't take off your socks earlier.
I always thought I was young for a navigator, but you are even younger, Futaba. Though I have been drawing maps for as long as I can remember. But it's not a competition, right?
You seem so young for a navigator, Futaba. I've been drawing maps since I was little, but I was working under different circumstances then. You seem to be doing pretty good for yourself.
What's your crew like, Futaba? Since we have a few things in common, I'm guessing they might be a bunch of lovable morons too.
I'm interested to learn more about your crew, Futaba. Maybe you're also part of a group of lovable misfits. That would be another thing in common between us.
You're shaving off our wool? I guess you really aren't a mink. They're very proud of their hair, after all.
So you like red and black, huh? I prefer lighter colors.
I would like to see your ship. Judging by your outfit, I bet it has some interesting design for sailing.
I can't imagine what your ship looks like, Meia. Anything that matches that peculiar outfit you're wearing must be something else.
Ah... G-G-G-G-Ghoooost...!!! Everybody run!!!
AHHHH...!!! A ghost is behind you! It's going to strangle you!
(Her panties are showing again. Is she doing this on purpose to try to entice ~player~?)
You have so many jewels that I doubt you'd miss a few if they get lost, huh?
Do you keep a weapon or something there, or is it just for the look?
Still, I wouldn't wear an outfit like that. Not because I don't like it, but because I'm sure it would make the guys think I'm going to do all their chores for them.
Oh, she's your wrestling partner? I see... What else do you two do together?
Huh...?! You can fly...?
Y-You're flying...!
What's wrong, Sakura? Your skin... Is that a rare disease? I have a doctor in my crew, I'm sure he can help you...
Magic? Sure... But seriously, what is that thing?
I just wanna make sure you know what you're getting into. You look like a nice girl, if maybe a little... lost.
AH! What was that noise?!
Is that sweater as comfortable as it looks? It's also super cute.
It's a big dress. There should be an easy way to take it off.
Obsession with food is not good for you. At least Luffy doesn't get fat with all the meat that he eats.
It's not good for your health eating so much. I don't know how Luffy does it, but not everybody is like him.
I've met a few people who can fly through different means. How do you do it?
You're a musician, right? Does everybody who's into music got a screw loose?
Wearing a jacket like that... I'm not sure if it's fashion or just random. You're not making a statement or something, right?
That's not how you wear a jacket... It's not like it bothers me or something. It just feels... random.
What do you mean?
Stop being so damn mean and just take off your headband!
(Wow, that thing is short. It doesn't even qualify as a mini skirt.)
Oh, I'm so sorry. I had no idea...
Is that jacket as comfy as it looks?
That hat is probably the only cute thing about you. I wouldn't mind having one just like it.
If there's one compliment I can give you, is that that hat is very cute. I'd like to get one like it.
I bet. That's one of the reasons why I prefer dressing lightly.
That seems like the technology from Germa 66. Can you also shoot fire and stuff?
Feliz Na... What?
Dancing while stripping is kinda... Umm... You know what? Just do what you enjoy.
Are you taking off your tights...? Huh...?
Time for your tights, huh? Hmm...?
Can you really remove your crown? Are you worried you'll be treated any different now, Your Highness?
I guess there's no such thing as a stereotype. After all I know this one swordswoman who wears glasses, so...
I guess seeing the loser undress is not part of the rules...
I've never had a robot come onto me... I... don't know how to react.
Why not? It's just a hat, isn't it?
What's the big deal? It's a hat...
Oh, I'm sure they're quite convincing. That's why you're wearing a uniform and all... But magic is not real.
They pulled off a really convincing scam... Making kids think that magic is real. Sure, there's stuff that looks like magic, but it's not the same.
Oh, so they teach you science at school too? So it's not just fake magic stuff.
Ah, so you have a science class? It's a relief to know they don't just teach the students fake mumbo jumbo stuff.
Hmph, where does this seller of "wands" live? Maybe I'll pay them a visit, and relieve them of their income.
I wouldn't feel a bit of regret stealing from someone who sells sticks at a high price. Where can I find this fraud?
What the hell?! I definitely saw it this time. Where did you clothes go?
Are you telling me you're a character from a comic? I... normally wouldn't believe that, but given the circumstances...
So you're really gonna strip while dancing? I-Is that what you do for a living, Shantae? I'm not judging, it just seems... surprising.

case.state: Okaaay, I'm making some progress here.
I was just going to ask you. Where did you get your ~clothing~?
Alright, not too shabby. Good effort, ~name~.
Seeing all these people wearing different clothes makes me want to go shopping.
So many women wearing different clothes in this place. Should I increase my inventory?
With all these different clothes everybody's wearing, I'm thinking if my closet is too samey.
One of my favorite parts of this game is seeing all the clothes everyone wears.
It's so quiet here compared to the ship! It's feels nice for a change.
I know this is my first time coming here, but I don't think I'm doing so bad.
Cute ~clothing~. But I bet it looks better when you're not wearing it.
Alright, I have no complaints.
Looking at the different clothing you all wear is one of the most interesting parts of this game.
Oh, your ~clothing~? For me? Ah, you're just taking it off. I was kidding, of course.
I might have ~clothing.ifPlural(similar|a similar)~ ~clothing~ to yours in my closet. Wait, do I? I'm not sure anymore.
Hmmm, ~clothing.ifPlural(those | that)~ ~clothing~... Classic ~name~ move.
Ha! I knew it. The ~clothing~ is coming off.
I won't say I'm happy with this, but it makes sense.
This almost feels like... nothing.
So you're removing... nothing? Oh, sorry. You're taking off your ~clothing~. Well, it's kind of the same.
That's all? Why don't you save us all the time, and we just move on to the next round?
Is your ~clothing~ comfortable? Okay...
Oh, your ~clothing~. I never realized how pretty ~clothing.ifPlural(they were|it was)~.
I would've taken my time removing my clothes if I'd known I'd end up like this.
Ugh, some water got into my ear.
You still think you can win, ~name~?
Ah, the ~clothing~. Of course you still had that.
(Did I put the lock on the fridge so Luffy couldn't get into it...? Oh, yeah, I did.)
(Did Zoro walk out on his own this morning? How will he return to the ship, then?)
(Didn't Chopper ask me to buy something for him? Was it medical supplies or candy?)

state.text: That sounds just like me! I guess every group of outlaws needs a big sister.
Looks can be deceiving, alright! That's always part of the strategy.
Oh, then he would fit perfectly in my own crew. We have a bunch of tough headed goofballs... no offense, Skull.
She sounds like Robin. Every team needs someone who can keep their composure in times of crisis.
Hahah, he couldn't be more different from my captain! Still, I wouldn't replace Luffy for anyone.
Mysterious... If a little scary, too.
I can already tell you have more smart people in your crew than mine. I wish I could share some of the responsibilities that fall on me all the time. I'm a little jealous.
Those names make them all sound so mysterious. I guess they're nicknames, since you're a group of thieves.

Wh-What the hell...?! That's so much information about me! You even know my dream, and my feelings...! A-And you said this information was available to everyone? Uhhh... Th-That's an invasion of privacy!

STOOOOP...!!! I-I didn't expect you actually had an answer... If Luffy doesn't want to know what the treasure is, neither should I! All I heard was something about "manga" and a guy named Oda. No idea what any of that means...
I'm not a great dancer. My friend Robin is way better than me. But maybe I can get better if I pay attention to your moves...
Oh, that's a relief... You just look too innocent to do something like that. I've been offered money before to do that kind of stuff, but I could never take it. I value my body too much.
I get your reaction, Florina. I also hate bugs. Especially the ones that destroy your clothes.
What a mess. Too bad I don't have a hair brush to loan you right now.
Shining Beauty? Should you really call yourself that?
Really? You think the face-painting will help you play better? This is just like Luffy with the afro...
I don't know how to play an instrument. I guess if I wanted to learn, I could ask Brook to teach me. I do enjoy music every now and then.
Well, I don't know about ~player~, but you clearly have a way with words. I'd gladly read a book written by you.
I believe you're a poet, Yuri. You don't speak like any schoolgirl I've ever met. I'd love to read a book written by you one day.
Haha, that doesn't sound bad at all! I know some that probably wouldn't mind becoming devout believers of a goddess like you.
Oh, that actually sounds pretty good to me! I was a bit worried you'd turn out to be like the Goddess of War, or Destruction... Even if you don't look like it.
I'd expect all of you adult movies people to be filthy, considering how many people are into that. I've stumbled upon Sanji's stash more than once. Hey, I'm sure he's your fan, Jessie.
Hmmm, I thought you'd be set for life. I have seen Sanji's collection, and it's huge. I'm sure he'd recognize nice you, Jessie. Ummm, I wonder if I should ask for your autograph for him...
What... is happening?
Huh? What's with you? I never said I didn't like them...
You like gambling, Cynthia? I've also been to a few casinos, but we only gambled with money. This here feels more high-stakes, don't you think?
Do you gamble, Cynthia? There must be at least one casino where you're from. I'm used to them too, but I've never bet something this valuable before.
Parallel worlds? As in... multiple worlds that are different from each other? I still have a long way to go to finish exploring this world, but that would be insane. Can you imagine that?
What...? I've seen a lot of crazy things, but they're all in this world. The idea of there being multiple worlds is just too crazy not to be funny, hahahah...
I'm afraid I also don't know what that thing you mentioned is... Maybe I should go to school. But at least I'm glad you're educating yourself, Hermione.
I understand, I also put an effort to learn new things, even if my peers don't. But I must admit I don't know what that thing you mentioned is... I suppose you can always learn more.

I'd never considered just how difficult writing poetry is. If it's too hard to write something that appeals to everyone, then you should probably focus on the people you want to get it. What about ~player~, Yuri?

Writing poetry is no joke... ~Player~, you've read Yuri's poems, right? Does ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ have a hard timing understanding them, Yuri? I think it'd just be easier to focus on writing for a specific type of people.

I see... These Pokmon must be a lot tougher than I thought then. But if they're so strong, then wouldn't there be a risk of people using them to attack other people? What if they have nothing to defend themselves with?

Oh, I get it. I thought they were like regular creatures, but they sound way stronger. If Pokmon are meant to fight, then wouldn't it be possible for someone to order one to attack another person? That has to be a risk, right?
An underground prison... Who put you in there? Even Impel Down, the world's biggest underwater prison, is meant to hold the worst criminals. What did these monsters do to deserve that?

The idea of an underground prison sounds awful. Even if they're monsters, maybe they didn't deserve it. I've heard stories of the world's greatest underwater prison, Impel Down. It's meant to hold the worst of the worst... What reason was there for such torture?

case.state: Keep talking! I'll be rich! What was the first one you said again? Was it left or down?
That's good, isn't it? Were your friends also outcasts in their own way before you found each other?
Then it's good that you met each other. If your friends were also alone before you found each other, I'm sure they're grateful to now have you in their lives.

state.text: Oh, I don't think asking him what he likes is the best idea. Some men are just shy, and others prefer women who take the initiative. If it's the latter, asking him would be the last thing you should do.
Really? Do you think he's just shy? If you want my opinion, don't ask him what he likes. Just take the initiative, and go after him. There's a good chance that's exactly what he's into.
Hmmm, I didn't think I'd say this, but you can probably gain something positive from this experience. At the very least, I think you should smile more.
Well, if there's someone here who could benefit from playing something like this game, it's probably you. If I see you smiling more often by the end of the game, I'd call it a win.
Your shoes came off on their own? Well... That is a little impressive, but I'm sure someone could make shoes that do that. I've seen crazier inventions.
You removed your shoes without touching them... That's not bad, but I'm not sure what waving that stick had to do with it. It can't be that hard to make shoes that do that.
(Why the hell am I trying to pick a fight with her? I'm the smart one, and Luffy isn't here.)
You know, maybe Franky could make you some better legs. He's the shipwright of our crew, and like half of his body is machine. It would probably take him like five minutes.

You know what? If you want a better set of legs, I could ask Franky to make some for you. Although they'd probably be a little extreme, like allowing you to fly, or something... That's just his style.
I'm 20. I know, I don't look a day over 18. It's strange that nobody asked my age at the entrance.

case.state: Oh, I'm actually 20. I wouldn't blame you for thinking I'm younger, considering how cute I am.

state.text: Well, whatever you are, it's a fact you're super cute!
Uh... I don't know that much about how ships are built, but I didn't understand a word of that. Maybe Franky, the shipwright of our ship, could. Though it might be too outlandish, even for him.
Uh... The Sunny can do so amazing stuff using cola as a fuel. I don't know what a... energy fusion core is. I'm not sure Franky does either.
Oh, y-you know her? I'm still shaking... I've never seen an actual ghost before. Though there have been a lot of times in which I thought I saw one. Too many.
Oh, I see... So you recognize her? If I'd known that I probably wouldn't have screamed... No, I definitely would've.
Either way, I don't care. It looks valuable, that's all that matters.
O-okay, you don't have to give me that much detail. I'm perfectly fine with it, but I think that's too much information.
Please, don't curse me. I was just kidding earlier... Haha... ha...
Y-You didn't take what I said earlier seriously, right? You're actually scary... Unless you don't want to be scary, in which case... I'll just keep my mouth shut.
Gahhh!!! A zombie! I didn't think I'd have to deal with them after Thriller Bark!
Why did you do that? You almost killed me! Just when I was okay with you being a zombie.
I bet it's a rare, expensive jewel. Don't worry, I'm not gonna steal it. I'll just admire it for a while...
When I see an airhead girl, my maternal instincts naturally kick in. I can't help it.
Explosions now? Are you insane?
Huh, so sweaters are good for concealing the size of your breasts... I should remember that the next time I need to avoid drawing attention to myself.
You could always buy new clothes that fit you better. But that's so painful...
Going shopping because your old clothes no longer fit you must be so painful...
Only the top half? I guess it's fair if it covers your whole body.
Hmmm, I'm not gonna complain that you only removed the top half. It's a bodysuit, so it seems fair to me.
I have no idea what that symbol means. It looks like a bat, I guess. Am I missing something?
I apologize for coming to the wrong conclusion. I guess I wouldn't be a good detective.
Winter clothing can be so cozy... Though I still prefer the warmer weather.
I can't believe this type of game is too soft for someone...
I'm sure if it was up to you, the rules of this game would be drastically different.
Oh... What's that you were hiding under your armor? It looks shiny.
Hey, careful! You almost kicked me in the face.
Not really, but it's pretty obvious.
That skull doesn't mean you're a pirate, right? I mean, I don't think it does. But I'm sure a moron would make that mistake.
That definitely surprised me. So you can turn into a monkey... As far as Devil Fruits go, that's very cute.
Oh, you have a Devil Fruit power! A monkey, huh? I'm not sure how powerful that ability would be, but it's really cute.
(It seemed like she was going to remove her tights, but then she stopped. Maybe she remembered she didn't shave her legs...)
(What happened there? She stopped, as if she remembered something embarrassing... I probably shouldn't pry.)
But it is a nice... crown... Oh, sorry!

case.state: Yeah, take it all off at once to get it out of the way! Mmph, dammit...

state.text: Those spats are so tight they could be painted. Hmmm... Oh, I guess they're not.

case.state: You took that bra off surprisingly fast, even with that thing over your head. People have the weirdest talents...

state.text: You're a real piece of work, aren't you?
Take this game seriously, please...
W-What's that? Did someone do that to you? Or did you...? Either way, it's not good.
Those scars... I guess they could be an accident, so I won't pry.

case.state: Azami...! There's something on your head. It looks like... a spiral.

state.text: I don't know what that was, and I don't think you can explain it to me... So I'm gonna assume it's something with a very normal and reasonable explanation.

case.state: Now that you're without your ~clothing~, let's keep going!
I will claim victory one small step at a time.
I will make you lose the number of times it takes to beat you, ~name~. Which judging by your remaining clothes, would be...
By the way, where did you get your ~clothing~, ~name~?
Hmmm, I wonder if your ~clothing~ would fit me.
I am forced to dress depending on the weather of the islands we go to, anyway.
Different types of people with different fashion styles. But they all have to undress...
I hope Sanji and Brook aren't hiding somewhere, waiting for me to lose again.
The game is moving a little slow, isn't it?
Isn't this a nice day? And it seems to get nicer the more I win.
Normally I'd be glad there's not much control in this game, but who's going to make sure there aren't any cheaters playing?
So how much did your ~clothing~ cost? Oh, is that a tasteless question?
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ not for sale, right? I had to ask.
What would you say is your size? Oh, sorry. We'll talk about that later.
Even in my current position, I respect this. Girls need brains to survive, after all.
Game recognize game. But let's keep going.
A most noble effort, fellow player. Let's continue.
Ah, things were so different when I still had my top.
I still remember when I wasn't topless. Feels like a year ago.
Now's not the time to worry. I still can win, and that's what I'm gonna do!
I wish I could take your ~clothing~ so I'd have at least something to wear.
Ah, clothes... I wish I'd valued them more when I still had them.
Aren't clothes the best? They make feel nice to wear, they give you style. They save you from being naked in front of others, like a weirdo...
(I pity whoever wins this game. I'm still going to take that prize, after all.)
Watch where you put your ~clothing~, ~name~. It might get wet.
Be careful you don't trip, ~name~. After all, It's slippery, heheh...
Oh, were you stripping, ~name~? I didn't even notice.
Oh, I guess I wasn't paying attention to you, ~name~. I was thinking about what my friends are up to.
I was thinking about something else. Did you strip? Good.

state.text: Ah...! Your outfit is...disintegrating?
W-what's happening? Your outfit is...

case.state: Huh, I guess I underestimated you, ~name~.
That's a fair choice, ~name~. Very fair.
Now this is feeling more like a Strip Poker game.
You really know how to put the "Strip" in "Poker".
Why are you taking off your ~clothing~ now, ~name~? Are you trying to challenge me to strip something big too? Good thing I'm not an idiot.
Is that supposed to impress me, ~name~? Well, I'm thankful that it's you instead of me that's removing something big.
That's what you're taking off? My, my.
Oh, look who's one big step closer to being naked.
Hey, I expected nothing less now that I'm showing this much.
Who's a good boy, ~name~? You, of course!
Your ~clothing~, huh? I see you want to die...
Oh, so it's your ~clothing~. I know who I'm zapping first with my Clima-Tact after the game ends.
Are you worried about losing yet, ~name~?
Didn't you enjoy seeing me lose all my clothes? Now I'm gonna do the same.
Oh... I guess you're not so bad after all, ~name~.
This makes me happy, but I don't know why.
The ~clothing~ it is, then. Let's see what you have to offer.
Oh, that's what you're taking off, huh? You don't mind if I look, do you?
Heheheh... Let's see what you have under there.

state.text: Hey! I have a pair that looks just like that one, heheh...
W-what...? What's this little flying kitten? Nice to meet you, I guess.
W-where did this floating little kitten come from? Uhhh... nice to meet you, I suppose.

case.state: Although I don't have much choice. If I lose again I'll have to take off my skirt.
I've known men that make a big deal out of the way I dress. This would be a good moment for me to do the same.
My, you're making me blush. If you strip again I don't know what I'll do.
I appreciate that you are playing the game right, but I hope you're not a guy that enjoys showing his body in front of strangers.
I'm not here to strip, but feeling comfortable in my own skin helps me believe I'm gonna win.
I'm not afraid to lose. For now, at least.
Although I don't have much choice. If I lose again I'll have to take off my jeans.
I've known men that make a big deal out of the way I dress. This would be a good moment for me to do the same.
Are you worried yet, ~name~? Maybe you're not doing so well.
Maybe this is the most undressed you'll be, ~name~. But don't count on me helping you with that.
I have to win, and take what I want!
I'm enjoying the game now! Let's go!
Just kidding! That's actually a nice choice. Isn't it amazing that I still have my sense of humor?
It's a joke. I'm just happy because this is good for me.
Is there a name for wanting to see a man naked not because you're interested in him, but because you want him to lose? No, it's not resentment.
Just to clarify, I'm not interested in your body. In fact I'm okay if you don't show it all. No, actually I'm not okay with it! I showed everything, and so will you.
I didn't give you enough credit earlier, but now that I look at you, you're kind of cute. I mean it.
Were you always this handsome, ~name~? I'm not lying, I have no reason to anymore.
What? It's not like there's much to do now that I'm out of the game.
Why? Because I'm... intrigued. In a mostly intellectual way.
Are you feeling flustered yet, ~name~? Then you gotta keep playing, of course!

state.text: Perona, don't...! Dammit, now those things are gonna start flying everywhere... Huh?
No, Perona...! Ugh, I hate those things... If you're gonna start sending them around... Huh?
Oh... Sorry, Perona. Wait, do you know my name? Huh?
I'm sorry, I guess. Perona... What about you? Do you know my name?
Nayru! What...?!
I have no idea who your target is. I'm just glad it's not me.
RPGs...? Platformers...? What kind of games are those? I thought you were gonna name another card game, or something.
What are those? I've never heard of RPGs or platformers... Do I not know about modern games? I thought you were gonna name a different card game...
One more fight? What kind of fights do you partake in... with your red knife?
What do you mean this is one fight of many? Against who do you fight... and why?
See?! That right there! The eyes going blank and all. It's like you're... empty. I've never met another person like this.
That, right there! The empty eyes, like looking into an abyss... I've never met anyone like you. So... empty.
A planet full of women... Wait, then how do you survive? Don't tell me you have male slaves only for procreating, or something. That would be awful...
If that's true, then how can your population survive only with women? Do you procreate with... male slaves, or something? With all the awful things I've seen, that wouldn't surprise me...
Sounds like a nice guy. So he doesn't mind that you have trouble talking? Or are you comfortable enough to talk to him directly?

I'm happy that you found such a good friend. Do you feel close enough to him so as to talk directly? Seems to me that if there's one person who can help you overcome your trouble, it would be that closest to you.
I know, I need support too. To help with the, ummm... bouncing.

case.state: That's it? Geez, you're lucky... Do you at least wear shorts or a mini skirt when you're out of your school uniform? If you're fortunate enough to have such gorgeous legs, there's no reason to hide them.
Nothing more than that? I'm a little jealous... But are you used to showing your legs, Yuri? You don't strike me as the kind who wears mini skirts or shorts when dressing casually.

state.text: That must feel lonely... But even if there are no more like you, you can still find your own family. You just need others who accept you the way you are.
I see... Though you don't really need others who are exactly like you to form a family. Sometimes all it takes is a group of people who accept each other for who they are.
Oh, do you wish you had more people to talk to? Maybe at work? I'm assuming it can be lonely if you're the only one with your position.
Do you not have a lot of people to talk with, Wiki? Like family, or friends? Neighbors...?
Ahhh! What's happening?!
(I wonder if she's wearing panties underneath.)
But... you won't be able to stand up anymore. Should we get you a chair, or...?
No kidding. You really are a terrifying opponent in this game.
Is that drawing on your shirt your crew's logo or something?
That logo on your shirt isn't your crew's flag, right? Because wearing it like that...
I think you're getting more confident, Hanako. You don't look scared to take off your shirt.
It's okay, Hanako. You're doing great.
Gah! The psycho woman is back.
W-what's wrong? Are you gonna explode?
Huh? What's happening? Flashing lights make me nervous...
W-what? Your body?
Makes sense that you're wearing a jacket on top, or you wouldn't last very long in this game with just a swimsuit.
Good thing you put on a jacket over your swimsuit. Or this game wouldn't even be a contest.
What...? Oh, are you going to show your true colors?
Oh, I thought you were gonna commit to this ploy for longer. But this is better.
Hey, that's a cute pair of underwear. Wait, are those... strawberries?
At least it's a friendly ball of light. Wait, how is it gonna strip?
So how did you change clothes earlier? It must be a useful skill for a fashion designer.
(I hope she doesn't have a demon head, or something...)
(What if she has demon horns? Or horrible monstrous ears? I should try to avoid screaming...)
What the...?! This is like the transformation of the Germa 66 members.
Ah!!! Your uniform is alive! Is it a g-ghost?
Your makeup? Come on, that's not enough. You have to remove your clothes.
Come on, Saki. Makeup is not clothing. I doubt you'll even look that much different without it.
