This was the first time that I've had an orgasm while thinking of other women... I think this is because of you, ~player~. I feel like I need to reexamine my preferences. It's intimidating, but also exciting...
When I pleasure myself, I always picture men. But today, I was thinking about women... What was different? Was it you, ~player~? Maybe trying to seduce you awakened something in me...
I can't believe I pictured myself with other women while I was touching myself... My friends, nonetheless! How can I look at their faces now? M-Maybe it will be harder to look only at their faces...

I'm embarrassed that I masturbated while thinking of my female friends... And I've never thought of women that way before. Perhaps I should try it again, to see if it wasn't just a thing of the moment.
~Player~, if you have the day free, do you want to spend some time together? We can go take a walk, or go eat something... Or we can just go to a hotel, and...
You have today free, don't you ~player~? If so, we gotta spend some time together. Do everything we left unfinished last time... Everything.
This is so humiliating...! I won't forget this, Ghost Girl!
D-Don't make fun of me... Don't you know how a good winner acts? Dammit...
Oh, good for you, Perona. I think you've really grown as a person. Congratulations!
Huh, you're acting like a proper adult, Perona. I'm proud of you. Congratulations!
I'm just taking all your stuff. We're friends, Chun-Li! That's why I made an exception for you. Take care!
Oh, so you don't hate me anymore? That's good. I also don't find you as annoying now. It was worth it coming here, even if ~player~ is taking the prize home.
So we've buried the hatchet, huh? I'm happy we can get along now, Perona. I'm not even mad that ~player~ won. You could come by the Sunny later if you want to see some familiar faces again.
Congratulations, ~player~! I'm happy at least a girl won the game. But next time I'll get you!
Congratulations, ~player~! Sorry for thinking you were naive enough to fall for my tricks earlier. At least you proved me wrong!
You just came here like nothing and kicked our ass, ~player~! But next time it'll be me who wins!
Congratulations, ~name~! You were shrewd enough to see through my clever tactics, so I'll say you've earned this...
Well, well... How did this guy end up on top? Heheh, I'm kidding! Well played, ~player~. Maybe next time I'll play against someone who will be gullible enough to believe my lies.
Hey, you won, ~player~! Didn't you have a good time? You don't even care about the prize, don't you?
Congratulations, ~player~. Consider what you saw today your reward for winning this game. (The only one you'll have...)
Friends?! What kind of bull crap is that?! That's not real treasure! Gosh, I hope the One Piece is an actual treasure...
Congratulations, Shantae! And thank you again for the dancing lesson. I'll make sure to remember what you taught me so I can put it in practice one day.
I'm happy for you, Shantae! Thank you for teaching me how to dance. I think I'll continue practicing in private... and fully clothed.
Fine, a deal is a deal, Mae. Let me grab my clothes and I'll tell you what you want to know.
Uh... Time to get out of here!
I still can't believe how close I was to winning. But no hard feelings, ~name~. None at all...
Friends?! What kind of bull crap is that?! That's not real treasure! Gosh, I hope the One Piece is an actual treasure...
Shantae, do you mind giving another dancing lesson some time? I think I took a liking to it that I wasn't expecting.
Congratulations, ~name~. I still finished second, so that's enough reason to try again. That prize will be mine!
I have good news and bad news. The good is that I won't steal the prize, the bad is that I'm taking your stuff instead. But I left your underwear. Oh, shoot! I forgot to get dressed first.

Bye, everyone! Nice to meet you all! Oh, this? I'm just taking your valuables. Since I lost, I don't want to leave empty-handed. But I like you, so I'm leaving your underwear. Damn, I forgot my own clothes!

You remember when I said you didn't have to worry about me being a pirate? I guess I exaggerated, 'cause I'm taking your stuff. Minus your underwear, of course. But I feel like I'm forgetting something...
Congratulations, ~name~! Well played. (Time for me to steal that prize and get out of here!)
Well done, ~name~. This was all part of my plan... losing so you could win. No need to say thanks. I'm a pirate, if you want to thank me, you'll have to do it with valuables.
This was quite the adventure! But now it's time to return to my own adventure. Bye bye, everyone! (There's the prize! Showtime...)

state.text: A-Are you sure, Perona? You want me to give you advice? O-Okay... That Pokmon thing must've put you in a good mood.
Really, Perona? You're asking me for help? Ummm, okay. Are you feeling more confident now that you're getting a Pokmon?
Woah... It came out of that little ball. So that's a Pokmon? It's not what I was expecting...
Huh...? That thing came out of that tiny ball. How...? And what an usual creature... I have never seen anything like it. So that's a Pokmon...
Did you really name him after Moria? Ummm, I think he's nice. That smile is kinda creepy... He seems to be very clingy to you already.
Your Pokmon is very... unusual, Perona. I wonder if there's one I would like... One that resembles a cat, and likes money. But I doubt there's a Pokmon like that.
Ummm, y-yeah. We did kiss... {small}among other things.{!reset}
W-Well, kissing wasn't the only thing we did. But we did do that too.
You're welcome... and please, don't.
I didn't do anything! Seriously! No need to remember any of this ever happened...
I'm not gonna lower myself to your level, Revy. Beating each other senseless doesn't prove anything. And Meia, I expected better from you.
Nobody should steep as low as you, Revy. Including you, Meia. Even if men beat each other up for stupid reasons, we women should know better.
Mary, are you okay?
You're wrong, Perona! I'm confident in my body both from the front and back... I don't mind showing you again, see?
I disagree, Perona! I know I have an attractive body. S-So what if I'm not perfect? I still like how my butt looks when I look in the mirror.
I'm serious, Perona! Look how gorgeous your figure is. Maybe you think your butt looks big because you have a small waist. And your skin looks so soft...

I absolutely meant it, Perona. You said my body is attractive, but yours doesn't look that different to me! And guys like girls with more generous proportions. Especially if their skin is as smooth as yours.
The cutest thing I've seen? Well, my sense of cuteness is not as peculiar as yours... But I once saw Chopper and Carrot taking a nap together after they got tired of playing around.
I doubt anyone here shares of idea of what is "cute"... For me, I'd have to say it was when Chopper and Carrot were head patting each other.
Perona! You have a gorgeous figure. Don't doubt yourself too much. I'd even say that your butt is... cute.
You have a beautiful shape, Perona! We all feel a bit insecure sometimes, but remember this when you doubt yourself: You have a cute butt.

I'd never fight another girl unless I had a serious reason. If I had a problem with one of my female friends, we'd just talk it over. I don't think being pirates means we have to solve our disagreements with our fists.

Do you really want to hear my advice, Neptune? I already lost, so my way clearly isn't flawless. But if you really want some help, I'd say don't take too many risks. You just gotta beat one person, right?

epilogue.hint: Win a game against Nami as a male player
epilogue.title: Adventure in Vortex Island: Director's Cut

scene.name: Intro
scene.directive: ------WARNING------ This epilogue is considered loooong (approximately 30 minutes). Only watch it if you have the time to spare. Epilogues can be viewed from the Gallery any time after they've been unlocked.
On an island, somewhere in the Grand Line...
This seems to be a lovely town.
Families are shopping at the market, and everybody is having a good time.
But all of a sudden the atmosphere changes drastically.
Everyone on the street goes quiet and starts moving to the side as a woman walks by.
She's followed by two big men. As she looks around the faces of the townsfolk, they avert their eyes.
Finally, she sets her eyes on you.
You, sugar... Are you new in town?
Usually I don't like new faces in my territory. It's just my nature I suppose...
...But I guess I can make an exception for such a pretty face.
I just have one question: Do you know a woman with orange hair?
You see... she was very rude to me, and took something that doesn't belong to her. So naturally, I have to punish her.
I see... She doesn't seem like your type anyway.
Well, enjoy your stay, sugar.
The woman and the two men go. As they get farther away, the people on the street relax and return to their usual bantering.
Wait... did she say she was looking for an orange hair woman? Could it be...?
You overhear a conversation between two old men.
Sinclair seems to be in a bad mood today. That can't be good for us.
Didn't you hear? It looks like the Straw Hat pirates are on this island.
Straw Hat? I thought she was in a bad mood because of the Marine ship that arrived yesterday. They've settled at the abandoned base on the edge of town.
Either way, this is going to get ugly.
While you're distracted, you feel something pressed against your back.
A woman behind you whispers in your ear.
Don't make any sudden moves, or I'll kill you. Now walk.

scene.name: Alley
scene.directive: The woman leads you to an alley.
You feel the object behind you let go, and the woman walks in front of you.
~Player~... What are you doing here? Are you here for revenge because I took the prize you won at the poker game?
That was only fair after what you saw me do! I earned that money. Either way, I spent it already, I can't give it back.
More importantly, I saw you talking to Sinclair!
If you two are working together, that means you're my enemy too.
You explain to Nami that you have no idea what she's talking about.
What? So we really ran into each other by accident. Talk about a coincidence!
You probably shouldn't be near me. They're looking for me, you know?
That woman you talked to is "Black Rose" Sinclair. She's a powerful pirate, and has made this island her base of operations.
When my crew reached this island she stole my Log Pose, so we came here to get it back.
And I did, only I also took something else as compensation: a key. From what I heard, it opens up a secret door to Sinclair's treasure, so I'm gonna take it!
Anyway... because of that, Sinclair is now looking for me.
Funny how we keep meeting in these weird circumstances, huh?
Oh, did you hear that? I think someone is near.
Hmmm, maybe it was just my imagi-
AHH!!!
Two men grab your arms from behind. And...
Well, well... Seems like I was wrong about you, boy. You do like the sleazy type after all.
Ugh! My Clima-Tact!
Don't let him go, men. I'll have to take care of him too later.
N-no...
As for you,"Cat Burglar"...
You stole from me first!
I was just going to kill you and take back my key... But I still have a score to settle with your captain.
I know I wouldn't win in a fair fight against Straw Hat Luffy. However, if I use you as bait... perhaps I can even the odds.
Heh, as if! You're severely underestimating Luffy, but you haven't realized it yet.
Oh, I'm not. Trust me.
But for now, I'll just get back what you took from me. Now where are you hiding my key?
Whatever, I don't have to bother searching you. I have something better.
What...?
My... my clothes!
This is the ability of the Strip Strip fruit. When I touch someone I can remove all their clothing in an instant.
I know, very useless compared to most Devil Fruits. But it does come in handy sometimes. Now where's my key?
Nami gives you a suspicious look. You notice a weight in your front pocket. When did she...?
I can't believe those breasts are real... Wait, you don't have my key? I'm sure you took it. Unless...
Men! Bring him over here.
Didn't you hear me? I said bring him here!
Sinclair's men are looking at Nami.
T-that body...
So hot...
Stop looking at me!
Idiots! Have you never seen a naked woman? Now...
Before Sinclair can finish her sentence, her men pass out with a stupid smile on their faces.
Those useless morons!
Quick, ~player~! Grab my Clima-Tact!
You pick up Nami's weapon. As soon as you grab it, the pole extends and...
Ugh!
Son of a...
Good job, ~player~! We need to get out of here! Come on!
Nami holds your hand as you run down the alley. Did she forget she's naked?

scene.name: Escape
scene.directive: Crap! I forgot I'm naked.
I can't run in public like this! Come on, let's take a detour.
You continue running through the back alleys of the city until you arrive at the end of town.
Running like this is way too exhausting.
Did we lose her? Give me my Clima-Tact.
Oh, you're kidding me! She's coming this way.
I can't keep running like this. This vent is loose. Quick, let's hide in here.

scene.name: Vent
scene.directive: I didn't know it would be this narrow in here.
Why didn't you go first? Well, it's too late now...
Don't you dare look forward, or I'll make you pay me 300.000 beli.
Let's just keep going. Maybe I can find some new clothes to wear in this building.
Oh, I think I found an exit!
Ahhh! Hey!
W-what the hell?!
Well, I did tell you not to look forward, so I guess it was my fault.
Let's just get out of here.

scene.name: Base
scene.directive: A storage room? At least the air duct didn't lead to a lobby, or something.
But we don't even know what kind of building this is.
~Player~, why don't you go see if you can find any clothes for me. I'll examine this room.
You exit the storage room.
There's no one around. You decide to look for a closet or a locker room.
Recruit! Hold it right there!
You hear a woman's voice coming from down the hall.
What are you doing here? Why aren't you in uniform?
Hmmm, I don't think I recognize you. Are you new? I'm sorry, I'm afraid I forgot your face.
Captain Tashigi! We've received information about Sinclair. She has been seen around town.
Excuse me, I must go. The unifoms are in that closet behind you.
The woman leaves around the corner.
You go into the closet, pick up two uniforms, and return to Nami.
Oh, good. It's you.
Did you find clothes for me?
Wait, this is a Marine uniform. Is this a Marine base?!
That's not good for me. At least we can be sure Sinclair won't follow us in here. Let's change.
You both put on the uniforms.
Ah, clothes... I'll never take you for granted again. This uniform is a little tight around the chest, but I think it'll do.
For a Marine base they really need better security.
You still have Sinclair's key, right?
Good thing I put it in your pocket before she ambushed us. You hold on to it for now.
By the way, while you were looking for clothes I found this...
It's a map of this island. Why don't you keep it too? It might come in handy later.
Now let's get out of here.
Let's just walk slowly, not make eye contact, and...
Nami sees Captain Tashigi approaching from down the hall.
Crap! She is here?! She knows who I am. ~Player~, just don't talk and maybe she won't recognize me.
Ah, I see you've put on your uniform.
Is this also a new recruit? You seem a little familiar, though.
I-I brought you coffee earlier... ma'am.
Ah, that must be why.
purururu purururu
gacha
This is Tashigi.
Captain! Sinclair is right outside the base!
She came to us? I don't like this. Tell the men to stand down, I'll take care of her.
You two come with me. I might need someone to call for backup.
Yes, ma'am...
(Uh-oh...)

scene.name: Outside
scene.directive: Finally. I was just about to leave.
Sinclair! I'm here under orders from Marine HQ. We've received information of your criminal activities on this island.
Surrender now, or I'll capture you by force.
Really? You're here to fight against a pirate when you're siding with one at the same time? Isn't that a double standard?
What are you talking about?
You're either a moron or you should get better glasses, sugar.
Oh no...
Rose flash!
Dammit! I just put those clothes on.
The Straw Hat girl?! You were right under my nose! Are you here to steal our uniforms?
Why would I want to steal Marine uniforms?
No, she's only stealing from me.
Listen, Marine lady, I only have business with her. If you look the other way I'll forget about you. What do you say?
Of course I won't! My duty is to capture you. But I can't just ignore the Straw Hats... I'll take you both!
You can't be serious! You know she's way worse than us.
I know, but...
I don't have time for this...
~Player~, stay close to me!
Shit! I can't see!
My glasses got foggy!
Run, ~player~!
I won't let you escape again, thief!
You're the one that's not getting away, Sinclair!
Damn!

scene.name: Forest
scene.directive: I don't think they followed us. Hmph, I can't believe I'm naked again. But at least we got out of the town.
~Player~, do you still have that map I gave you? Now is a good moment to look at it.
So the town where we met is here.
Now we've entered the forest, so we're currently here.
According to what I heard, Sinclair's treasure is at the center of the island, in this small piece of land in the middle of a lake. It's right at the top of the mountain.
Now the only bridge to get there is this one, but it's on the other side of the island.
Also, most likely it's surrounded by Sinclair's men.
That's why I think it would be easier to find a way to cross the lake from this side.
So we need to get to the shore first.
~Player~... I know you got dragged into all of this, and it's partly my fault.
If you want to step down, now's the time. Sinclair will continue chasing me, so you'll be able to get away.
Do you want to come with me?
Heh, I was hoping you'd say that.
I promise you'll get your part of the treasure.
Give me Sinclair's key. I'll hold on to it. If she catches up to us, she won't search me again.
Let's go, then!
Nami gets up and starts running.
You're going to follow her when you realize you can't move.
You see two hands growing from the ground are grabbing your legs.
Two more hands appear on your shoulders and start choking you.
What have you done to Nami?!
Robin, wait! He's not an enemy.
Are you okay, Nami?
Yes, he's a friend. He's been helping me.
The hands grabbing your neck and legs disappear.
Sorry about that. I thought you were chasing Nami, and with that uniform...
He's not a Marine. He's just wearing the uniform.
And what happened to your clothes?
Sinclair destroyed them with her ability.
I see. I apologize for misunderstanding the situation, ~player~. Do you want me to give you my clothes, Nami?
Thanks, but I think I'll manage. I'm glad I ran into you, Robin. Where are the guys?
They've been busy fighting Sinclair's men and looking for you. We had to move the Sunny because the Marines arrived.
Good. I'll just go and take Sinclair's treasure. ~Player~ has been a big help so far.
Oh yeah?
He's also kinda cute. Isn't he, Nami?
I-I guess. I haven't really noticed.
Anyway, tell the others I'll be back soon. We have to go.
I won't let you!
Nico Robin, so you're here too. I lost sight of Sinclair, but I can still capture you two.
Don't you ever give up?
Is it a good idea to fight us? You're outnumbered.
That doesn't matter! You kidnapped one of my men!
You mean him? I didn't kidnap him! He isn't even a Marine.
And your indecent exposure? Running around the island completely naked?
There's nothing I can do about that! You think I want to go around naked?
Nami, it seems there's no point in reasoning with her now. You go, I'll handle her.
Thank you, Robin. Come on, ~player~!

scene.name: Whirlpool
scene.directive: You follow Nami into the trees. Behind you, you hear Robin and Tashigi start fighting.
After running for a while, Nami stops.
I think we're out of the forest.
That means we must be close to the... lake?
Wow...
So this is why it's called Vortex Island...
There is no way we can swim through this whirlpool.
~Player~, I'm going to create a bridge of clouds with my Clima-Tact.
You keep your eyes open in the meantime.
While Nami is making a bridge, you hear rustling coming from the trees.
It's Tashigi and Robin who are still fighting.
This isn't gonna go like in Alabasta. I'm stronger now.
So am I.
Damn. I can't fight until I'm done with this.
Aren't you getting tired of this?
N-no... I need to finish this fast so I can go after Sinclair.
Did you call, sugar?
Huh?
Huh?
Oh my...
What the hell...?!
Ugh, this is bad...
I thought y'all forgot about me.
You're the other woman in Straw Hat's crew, aren't you? I'll have to get rid of you too.
Being naked won't be enough to stop me. I've fought in worse conditions.
M-me too, probably... I have no choice but to focus on you now.
A pirate and a Marine joining forces against me, how troublesome..
Fortunately, I don't care much for playing fair.
Sinclair quickly moves behind you and puts her sword to your neck.
~Player~!
I'm sure none of you would be fine with me killing this poor man, right?
I barely know him. Do whatever you want.
No! He's innocent, don't kill him!
I was trying to bluff so she would lower her guard.
Oh...
Now let's see where you're hiding my key...
Sinclair touches you and makes your clothes disappear.
Where's my key?! You had it, didn't you?
All I see is your... Mmm...
She's distracted! Now!
Right!
Robin uses her ability to separate you from Sinclair. And...
Tashigi attacks Sinclair and sends her flying against the trees.
Ugh, dammit!
Are you alright, ~player~?
I'm glad she didn't hurt you.
But you should cover yourself now. Well, we all should.
I can use my ability to cover myself.
Do you want me to help you too?
I... don't think so.
Thank you both for saving him!
~Player~, ehm... the bridge is finished. We should go.
You start crossing the bridge of clouds with Nami.
No...
You won't...
...get away!
Sinclair manages to free one of her arms, picks up her sword, and throws it.
The sword hits the base of Nami's cloud bridge.
Huh?!
The bridge...! Nami!
Watch out!
Ahhhh!!!
Right before you're dragged by the unrelenting force of the whirlpool, you manage to grab Nami's hand.
Then, everything fades to black.

scene.name: Dream
scene.directive: What's this place?
You hear voices calling your name.
~name~!
Were you just going to leave without doing anything to me?
Hmmm, I love how these hands make me feel.
But I'd rather have your hands all over me. Why don't you come closer?
Mmmm, why have I never done this before?
I'll need to train so I can get better at it.
But I don't think I'm doing that bad. What do you think, ~name~?
Hey, don't listen to them. You know I'm the one you want.
You can't abandon me now, ~name~. We still haven't done that.
Just listen how wet I am just thinking about it.
~Name~
Oh, ~name~...
~Name~!

scene.name: Night
scene.directive: ~Player~!
~Player~! Wake up!
Oh, good. You're alive.
You looked so peaceful and blissful that I thought you were dead.
I don't know where we are, but at least we're not hurt. This whirlpool is incredibly strong.
Good thing I didn't lose Sinclair's key. But first we need to figure out our location.
I can't believe I've spent almost the entire day naked.
You, uh... are probably more used to being naked in public since you like playing that strip poker game.
Brrr... This forest is scary at night. If you want to stay closer to me, I don't mind.
We still don't know if we are on the center of the island or not.
I doubt Sinclair would be able to defeat Robin and that Marine woman, but maybe she got away and is still following us. That's the worst case scenario.
Right after Nami said that, you hear something rustle in the trees.
Why do I always have to be right?
Quick, let's hide! Behind that rock.
You hide with Nami in a tight spot between a rock and a tree.
(Shh... don't make any noise and don't move.)
Because of how narrow this spot is, Nami's body is very close to yours.
You can hear her heartbeat, feel the warmth coming off her body, and the soft fruity smell of her hair.
(Hey... Is that what I think it is? Let me turn around.)
(Oh boy... I know you can't control it, but now's not the time.)
(Ummm, how do I get it to go down?)
(We shouldn't do this now...)
(I mean, this isn't how I thought we would...)
I know you two are there! Come out!
(Crap! She found us!)
(There's no point in staying here. Let's go out.)
You made it way too easy for me to find you this time.
Huh? Who are you?
Oh, I'm sorry!
I was playing hide and seek with my daughters and I thought I'd found them.
I didn't know it was two lovebirds. Forgive me for interrupting you.
No, we're not...
Wait, maybe you can help us. Can you tell us where we are?
You mean you don't know? We're near the mountain at the center of the island.
The center! Then we're close to our goal, ~player~. We were washed by the whirlpool and ended up here.
You really fell in the whirlpool? It's a miracle you survived without any injuries.
This is called Vortex Island because of the whirlpool at the center of it.
And then, at the center of the whirlpool, there's this smaller island.
Because of how strong the whirlpool that separates both islands is, it's almost impossible to cross from one side to the other unless you go through the bridge.
But ever since Sinclair made this island her territory five years ago, only she has control over who uses the bridge.
Ugh, that Sinclair really is the worst! I'll make her pay me back for my clothes.
Ah, so that's what happened.
Mom! Why did you stop looking for us? We got bored.
Are you tired, mom?
Sorry, girls. It seems we have two guests for tonight.
Eh? Can we see them?
We're really, really sorry...
Don't worry. I'm Debra by the way. These are Peg and Meg.
We don't have much, but at least we can give you a roof and some clothes to wear.
Thank you. I'm Nami, and his name is ~player~.

scene.name: House
scene.directive: She wasn't exaggerating. This house isn't in very good condition.
But I'm not complaining, it's much better than having to sleep outside naked.
Hey, about what happened earlier in the forest...
No this isn't the time for that. We have more important stuff to worry about now.
Knock, knock!
Yes?
Umm, excuse me...
My mom sent me to ask if you're both comfortable.
Oh, thank you! We're great. Tell your mom we're grateful.
Okay...
Ehmm... are you an adventurer?
Uhh... yes. I guess you could say that.
I bet you've seen lots of amazing places.
I wanna travel the world someday, but all I've seen is this island.
You're very young, you'll have the chance to travel.
And at least this island has lots of places to explore, and a nice town...
A town? Oh, I've never been there. We can't cross the bridge because we can't pay the toll.
The toll?
You don't know? The lady with the red glasses asks for money to cross the bridge to the other part of the island.
But we don't have money, so we can't leave. We're the only family that still lives here.
You mean you've never been outside this area? But what about food and supplies?
The whirlpool brings new things every now and then. It's fun to look for new stuff. Last week I found a mirror.
But we never see other people.
It was nice talking with you. I gotta go sleep. Have a good night!
Good night, Meg...
They're prisoners here because Sinclair doesn't let them cross the bridge.
All because they're poor. These clothes they gave us are probably the best they have.
We should get some rest, ~player~.
Tomorrow we'll head straight for Sinclair's treasure.

scene.name: Summit
scene.directive: Come on, ~player~! Just a little more! How can you be tired already?
Nami's eyes look weird.
Finally we've arrived!
This felt like such a long journey, but now-
Now what? Now it's over?
Not so fast, thieves.
I had a feeling falling on the whirlpool wouldn't be enough to get rid of you, you filthy cat.
Then I figured instead of chasing you, I'd just wait for you here.
Getting away from your friends wasn't easy, but fortunately nobody knows this island like me.
I suppose having access to the bridge helps. Unlike those who can't pay...
That's the way the world works, naive girl.
The strong take their place at the top, and the weak have no choice but to submit.
Let me show you what I...
...mean!
Mgh...!
Heh, I knew you were weak.
Hard to believe that someone like you has made it to the Grand Line.
You gotta help Nami! You run towards Sinclair.
But before you can do anything to her, Sinclair grabs your neck.
And you...
You're even weaker, sugar. You can't do anything to me.
Leave him out of this!
Sinclair throws you away. Nami uses the opportunity to back away.
What... is this?
Mirage tempo!
Don't think we're done yet.
Do you really think this cheap trick will work on me?
How stupid do you think I am?!
Sinclair attacks Nami's copies, but as they vanish she keeps making more.
Annoying. I have a better way to find the real one.
Take this!
Sinclair shoots her beam at Nami's copies. However...
What?! My beam bounced back! What did you do?!
Heheheh...
I knew borrowing this mirror would be a good idea.
Let's see if you're used to fighting naked now that the tables have turned.
All this humiliation... I won't rest until I've made you pay for all of this!
Sinclair explodes in a flash of pink light. You feel a strong wave of energy pushing you back. Pink light covers the hill.
When you can open your eyes again you see Nami has been cornered by Sinclair.
Now it's really over. I'm going to enjoy this.
You're right, it's over. And I've won.
What...?
I knew a simple attack wouldn't be enough to defeat you, so I've been creating these clouds since I saw you here.
Too bad you were too distracted to notice.
You should always pay attention to the weather, you know?
Thunderbolt Tempo!
Ahhhhh!!!
Ahhh...
Who's the weak one now, huh?
Have a safe landing.
Gust Sword!
Gahhhh...!!! Damn you!!!
Nami falls to the ground. You quickly run to her.
Phew, that was close...
I'm okay, don't worry about me.
More importantly, now it's finally time to check the treasure.
Hmmm, where did Sinclair hide her treasure? There's nothing here...
Maybe... under that rock? Help me move it, ~player~.
Yes! This has gotta be it. I have the key right here.
Under the trap door there are stairs that lead to a room. And inside is...

scene.name: Treasure
scene.directive: Ohhh...! This is so much better than what I imagined!
Treasure!
So much...!
...treasure!
Nami wanders around the room in excitement.
After a while, she gets tired and walks over to you.
~Player~, I only made it this far with your help. Thank you.
A promise is a promise, I'll pay back what I owe you.
Buuut... I was thinking... Since we're here maybe I can give you another reward too.
Okay, maybe it's also a reward for me. But I want it...
Nami leans close, puts her arms around, and kisses you.
The unexpected gesture catches you by surprise at first, but you return her advances nonetheless.
After all that has happened between us, we should've started with that. Too bad it took so long.
But I don't want to stop here. Let's take this to the bed.
We've seen a lot of each other's bodies by now.
I hope you're not tired of looking at me yet. I know I still enjoy looking at you.
Hey there. I don't like how we left things back at the forest.
Have you caught me sneaking a peek every now and then, ~name~? I thought I was being subtle, but maybe not so much.
Mwah!
What? I just wanted to kiss you there too.
But also...
M-mmmh...
Nami's movements are clumsy at first. But soon she starts moving her tongue around the tip.
Mmmmh...
It doesn't seem like you'll be able to last much longer.
You tell Nami, but she doesn't stop.
Mmmm...?
gulp
It doesn't taste like I was expecting. And it was so much...
It's only fair that you return the favor now, don't you think?
I'll just let you take the lead.
It's true that I'm good at seducing and teasing men, but when it comes to actually sealing the deal, I'm... a little less confident.
This is the closest you've ever been to me, so it's still embarrassing.
Normally I'd punch anyone for even trying to see me like this. But not you...
Mmm, my breasts? I've noticed you're always looking at them...
So I figured you'd want to touch them. So predictable...
Ah!
You're an idiot...
What else do you think I might like?
Mmmmh...!
Don't act so surprised...
You already know I get wet easy, don't you?
Okay, I feel more relaxed now. Let's do it.
Ngh... Slowly, please...
Mmmm...
This is not bad...
~Player~...
Don't let me go, okay?
I can barely stand like this.
As the day goes on, you spend it exploring Nami's body in different ways.
Mmh... This position...
It feels really good too...!
But I want to look at you while we're doing it.
Can we switch?
If you say anything about me being too heavy, we'll stop right here.
I still can't believe how good this feels...!
Finish inside me, ~player~!
Kyaaaahhh!!!
You were amazing, ~player~.
I hope I didn't disappoint you either.
Let me rest like this for a while.
It's so comfortable. And I'm so tired...

scene.name: Ending
scene.directive: You wake up. Seems like you've been sleeping for a while.
Where's Nami? Most of the treasure is gone too.
On top of the chest there's a letter. It's from her.
Dear ~player~. I'm sorry for leaving like this again.
I've never been good at saying goodbye.
You'd have noticed most of the treasure is gone. I didn't want to wake you up. You look so cute when you're sleeping. So I took it, though I left more than enough to pay you back for what I owe you.
But the thing is... I don't think I can carry all that treasure by myself...

So I decided to leave it with Deb and the girls. It's not out of generosity or anything! It would just be too much of a pain to carry all of that back to the ship and... well, they need it more than you or me. I'm sure you'll understand.
With Sinclair gone, they'll finally be able to have the life they deserve.

If Sinclair survived our fight, I'm sure she has been captured by the Marines by now. I don't think that swordswoman would come for my crew after all this. She takes her job seriously, but I still feel we have a sort of understanding.
As for me, it's funny to think that I'm leaving this island with less material possesions than I had when I arrived.

But even so, I don't feel like I've lost anything. On the contrary, our little adventure was so much fun... It just goes to show what I already knew: that there are more valuable things in life than money. I have my friends, and now also my memory of you. And even if a part of me wanted to stay with you in that room, my journey must continue.
Nami, we're about to set sail.
Okay! Let's go.
This sea is a vast place, but even so I'm sure we'll meet again by accident. After all, it wouldn't be the first time, right?
So... until we see each other again, ~player~.
THE END

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING! Nami has a full art rework in development right now. As such, this epilogue will be getting a remake in the future. If you have any suggestions for more scenes you'd like to see, or parts that could be changed/improved, you're welcome to give your feedback here:
https://forms.gle/Znp3vXa7xK5Brfzg8
See you soon!
